how_to_use: Not found

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Lierac Premium The Eye Cream Absolute Anti-Aging 20ml (0.67 fl oz) is an eye cream for normal to dry skin types, targeting various aging signs in the under-eye area. Its balm-like texture ensures a soft application, ideal for both morning and evening skincare routines. This product effectively reduces the appearance of not only fine lines and wrinkles but also improves elasticity. Additionally, it combats puffiness and dark circles, revitalizing and brightening the eye area. Also, this formula does not have fragrance and is suitable for sensitive eyes. Due to the advanced F.N.G Technology, which includes three messenger proteins, this product helps improve the vitality of cells, therefore, acting on various aging signs. Moreover, infused with Gentian extract, it reduces puffiness, wrinkles, and fine lines while improving skin luminosity. Combined with Niacinamide, it effectively prevents and corrects dark spots. Additionally, pearlescent particles provide an immediate brightening effect to the under-eye area.
In summary, this under-eye balm is more than just a solution for current skin issues; it's a preventative measure against signs of aging, ensuring the delicate eye area remains youthful and radiant..
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of the Lierac Premium The Eye Cream Absolute Anti-Aging 20ml (0.67 fl oz) onto the delicate under-eye area with delicate patting motions using your ring finger. Then use outward motions from the inner corner of the eye in order to reduce puffiness. Apply the product in the morning and/or evening routines.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Ducray Melascreen Eye Contour Anti-Spots Cream 15ml (0.50 fl oz) is a depigmenting product designed especially for the eye area. This eye cream features a powerful formula with ingredients that work together to reduce pigmentation. On one hand, it features stabilized Pro-Vitamin C that brightens the skin and helps reduce dark spots. At the same time, this ingredient boosts collagen production and provides an anti-aging action. On the other hand, Hesperidin Methyl Chalcone helps reduce dark spots and dark circles as well. Dextran sulfate also helps reduce dark circles. All in all, this eye cream mainly targets dark circles whether blue or brown, and dark spots. In addition, it also smoothes wrinkles.
In conclusion, this eye cream helps to prevent and reduce pigmentation around the eyes as well as diminish the appearance of dark circles and wrinkles, consequently providing a brighter and more even complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Ducray Melascreen Eye Contour Anti-Spots Cream 15ml (0.50 fl oz) to the eye contour and massage for absorption. For better results, apply at least for one month.

description:
Revolution Skincare Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Eye Patches x60 promise to deliver powerful hydration to the skin around the eyes in just ten minutes! For this purpose, these undereye patches are infused with Hyaluronic acid. This ingredient is well-known for its hydrating properties, having the ability to draw moisture into the skin and give a plumping effect as well. In this way, it delivers optimal hydration levels to the undereye area. So, if you're looking for a boost of hydration or your skin around the eyes is suffering from dehydration, this is the ideal product to add to your skincare routine. In just ten minutes you get to relax while taking care of the skin! Even more, these patches have a brilliant glitter design that is very eye-catchy and turns your self-care ritual more glamorous.
As a last note, these patches have a vegan formula and are fragrance-free. In conclusion, these are perfect to rescue your skin from dehydration and restore optimal moisture levels to the skin around the eyes.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Hyaluronic acid is a renowned ingredient for its hydrating properties. It is able to capture water molecules and draw moisture into the skin. As a result, not only does it hydrate the skin but also plumps it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Using the included spatula, gently lift and separate each gel patch of Revolution Skincare Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Eye Patches x60. Then, apply onto clean and dry skin of the undereye area, placing the widest part outwards. Leave them on for 10 to 15 minutes. Lastly, remove them and tap the remaining product into the skin for complete absorption.

description:
Revolution Skincare Gold Hydrogel Hydrating Eye Patches x60 promises to rejuvenate and refresh the skin around your eyes in just ten minutes! Infused with Vegan Collagen and Collodial Gold, these unique eye patches are perfect to effectively address signs of fatigue. In fact, by firming and lifting the eye area this product visibly contributes to a more awakened and younger-looking result. Even more, the presence of a powerful moisturizing complex also ensures a cooling hydrating action that plumps and smooths out the skin. Components like Glycerin, Allantoin, Algae Extract, and Hyaluronic Acid guarantee optimal levels of hydration by drawing and binding moisture into the skin. In other words, the Gold Hydrogel Hydrating Eye Patches deliver a rested and fresh look even when that is not the case! This jar contains 30 pairs that will successfully reduce tiredness and puffiness.
As a last note, the Gold Hydrogel Hydrating Eye Patches has a vegan and fragrance-free composition, approved by PETA as a Cruelty Free product.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Revolution Skincare Gold Hydrogel Hydrating Eye Patches x60 use the enclosed spatula to gently lift and separate the delicate gel patch. Apply onto a clean and dry under-eye area, with the widest part at the outside of your eye. Repeat on the other side. Relax and enjoy for 10 to 15 minutes. Discard after use and gently pat the remaining serum into the skin.

description:
Revolution Skincare Vitamin C Glow Eye Patches x60 consists of a set of 30 pairs of eye patches perfect for your eye contour. Specifically, this product has an extremely creamy and smooth gel substance that adheres effortlessly to your skin. In turn, its formulation acts on the contour of your eyes, leaving that sensitive skin much more illuminated and revitalized. In this way, signs of tiredness such as dark circles are instantly removed so that your entire complexion looks more awake. At the same time, the skin is perfectly hydrated while signs of age such as fine lines are also smoothed.
Regarding its composition, each eye patch is enriched with the main star Vitamin C. This, in turn, provides a boost of radiance to the skin leaving it much more illuminated. On the other hand, the high concentration of antioxidants revitalizes the skin leaving it more elastic and uniform. Furthermore, the presence of Glycerin attracts and retains moisture in the skin leaving it more hydrated for a long time. At the same time, Allantoin effortlessly smoothes the skin around the eyes while Vitamin E boosts the antioxidant action of each patch. Finally, it is important to mention that this jar also contains an enclosed spatula so that the whole process of handling the patches is more hygienic and practical.
All in all, these eye patches completely revitalize the skin around the eyes. They not only brighten it up but also intensely hydrate it. In addition, the skin is much smoother, softer, and without signs of fatigue and aging so noticeable. In particular, those sleepless nights will never show on your face with the help of this product.
how_to_use:
How to use
To apply Revolution Skincare Vitamin C Glow Eye Patches x60 use the enclosed spatula to gently lift and separate the delicate gel patch. Apply onto a clean and dry under-eye area, with the widest part at the outside of your eye. Repeat on the other side. Relax and enjoy for 10 to 15 minutes. Discard after use and gently pat the remaining serum into the skin.

description:
APIVITA Queen Bee Absolute Anti-Aging & Reviving Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) consists of a moisturizing cream for the eye contour with anti-aging properties ideal for more mature skin. Furthermore, this texture is easily absorbed by the skin around the eyes so that significant differences can also be quickly noticed in this area of ​​the face. Specifically, this composition with 98% ingredients of natural origin has Greek Royal Jelly and Propolis as its main stars. In turn, it is mainly these ingredients that deliver a fortifying and luxuriant formula rich in continuous and lasting benefits to the skin.
That said, this cream has the main ability to reduce wrinkles and typical crow's feet commonly found around the eyes. In this way, the skin ends up being rejuvenated, softer, and restored. On the other hand, the eyelids are also raised while morning puffiness and dark circles are diminished. This way you easily gain a more alert, awake, and cared appearance. At the same time, this eye cream deeply moisturizes and nourishes the skin. Furthermore, the eye contour is instantly also brighter, revitalized, and repaired. Damage from UV light, pollution, and even blue light is equally significantly diminished over time.
Finally, the innovative patented technology of this luxurious product consists of the controlled release of ingredients into the skin around the eyes. In other words, its benefits are offered to the skin in a continuous and lasting way for greater effectiveness against the global signs of aging. In addition, the skin ends up being more hydrated and nourished for a long time. Finally, the freshest, revitalized and rejuvenated appearance is guaranteed over time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply APIVITA Queen Bee Absolute Anti-Aging & Reviving Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) to the clean and dry skin around the eyes and eyelids, morning and night. Apply with your ring finger without exerting too much pressure.

description:
TONYMOLY Propolis Tower Barrier Build Up Eye Ampoule consists of a moisturizing serum suitable for the most sensitive skin around the eyes. Furthermore, it is ideal for weaker skin that needs to be repaired and fortified. In this way, this light serum creates a firm barrier on the skin so that it can be healthier, nourished, hydrated and with a radiant natural glow. On the other hand, fine wrinkles and fine lines around the eyes are less visible so you can look more rejuvenated.
For this to be possible, this serum contains in its composition Green Propolis extract, which is the key ingredient of this range of products. This property contains antibacterial and anti-inflammatory actions that help balance, heal and soothe all skin types. It is also ideal for skin with acne as it helps to repair the skin quickly. In short, this light serum helps to build a strong barrier against external agents, to hydrate and nourish the skin in depth. This way you end up getting a stronger, repaired appearance with a natural glow around your eyes.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Green Propolis extract helps balance the skin's barrier while repairing, healing and making it healthier. It also has great antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties ideal for skin that suffers from acne.
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing your skin, gently apply TONYMOLY Propolis Tower Barrier Build Up Eye Ampoule around your eyes. Pat it for full absorption.

description: Sensilis Upgrade [Eyes] Eye Contour Concentrate Treatment is a rejuvenating treatment for the eye contour especially formulated to help fight the signs of aging. Besides a combination of ingredients that allow a firming action of the eye contour and retard skin aging, this product also contains caffeine. For that reason, this eye contour has also the ability to reduce puffiness and dark circles, since caffeine has a decongestant and energizing power. Furthermore, this product has a soft texture adapted to the delicate skin of the eye contour.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Upgrade [Eyes] Eye Contour Concentrate Treatment in the morning and/or evening on the eye contour making small touches with the fingertips.

description: APIVITA Bee Radiant Signs Of Aging & Anti-Fatigue Eye Cream is the ideal cream to restore a youthful and restful look to the eye contour area. With a unique and complete formula, it is able to restore radiance and vitality, reduce both dark circles and puffiness, and fight aging sings. With ingredients that enhance skin hydration and elasticity, it can reduce fine lines and wrinkles, and both prevent and repair the developing signs of aging. Revitalizing the skin, it is able to reduce both dark circles and puffiness restoring radiance and vitality, and lending your eye contour a brighter look and a beautiful natural glow.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply APIVITA Bee Radiant Signs Of Aging & Anti-Fatigue Eye Cream by gently patting the product onto the eye contour.

description:
Revolution Skincare Bakuchiol Smoothing Eye Patches x60 promise to deliver anti-aging benefits to the skin around the eyes in just ten minutes! For this purpose, these undereye patches are infused with Bakuchiol which is well-known for its antioxidant and anti-aging properties. This ingredient not only helps reduce the appearance of wrinkles but also improves skin firmness and elasticity. In addition, the formula contains Cranberry extract, rich in vitamins C and E, to provide antioxidant benefits. As a result, these patches fight aging signs and smooth the skin. So, if you're looking to minimize the appearance of fine lines on your skin around the eyes, this is the ideal product to add to your skincare routine. In just ten minutes you get to relax while taking care of the skin! Even more, these patches have a beautiful purple pearlescent design that is very eye-catchy and turns your self-care ritual more glamorous.
As a last note, these patches have a vegan formula and are fragrance-free. In conclusion, these are perfect to smooth the undereye area.
how_to_use:
How to use
Using the included spatula, gently lift and separate each gel patch of Revolution Skincare Bakuchiol Smoothing Eye Patches x60. Then, apply onto clean and dry skin of the undereye area, placing the widest part outwards. Leave them on for 10 to 15 minutes. Lastly, remove them and tap the remaining product into the skin for complete absorption.

description:
Nivea Cellular Expert Filler Eye & Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) is an anti-aging cream specifically developed for the eye and lip areas. Resorting to powerful anti-aging ingredients, this cream has an innovative formula that tackles the aging signs of mature skin. On one hand, it features Hyaluronic acid, both micro, and macro, that deeply hydrates the skin as well as plumps it. Therefore, it fills fine lines and wrinkles, minimizing their appearance. On the other hand, the formula contains Folic acid that promotes plumper and firmer skin. As a result, the skin is immediately hydrated. In one week, this eye cream improves skin firmness and visibly reduces wrinkles. All in all, this product contributes to smoother and younger-looking skin.
With a lightweight formula, this cream is suitable for the most delicate eye area, including the case of sensitive skin. Most importantly, this product visibly improves the appearance of aging signs, providing a filling effect in 24 hours! In conclusion, it is the perfect addition to your routine in order to replenish the eye area with moisture and fill in wrinkles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Nivea Cellular Expert Filler Eye & Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) to the eye contour and gently pat with outward movements. Additionally, apply to the outer lip contour area.

description: Martiderm Black Diamond Skin Complex is an anti-wrinkle gel that should be used on the eye contour, lip contour and the space between the eyebrows. This formula contains peptides that relax the skin and muscles in order to attenuate wrinkles and reduce fine lines. Due to its formula in gel, it can be easily applied on the areas where the skin tends to wrinkle more easily and thanks to the hyaluronic acid in the formula it fills the wrinkle to make sure it is attenuated. Suitable for sensitive skin, as it contains soothing botanical extracts.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Martiderm Platinum Expression Gel in the morning before the moisturizer. This gel can be applied to the eye and lip contour and on the forehead between the eyebrows.

description:
Embryolisse Smoothing Eye Contour Care 15ml (0.5floz) is an eye cream specially designed for active women to counteract the stress signs on their skin. With this in mind, this product fights wrinkles, dark circles, and puffiness thanks to a natural formula with innovative ingredients. On one hand, Terminalia extract reduces the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. On the other hand, Hyaluronic acid hydrates and plumps the skin to visibly reduce wrinkles. And lastly, this formula also features Damask Rose extract that provides the skin with radiance. As a result, the eye area is not only hydrated but also luminous. 
In other words, this product has a smoothing action and hydrates the skin to fight tiredness signs. Additionally, it is suitable even for the most sensitive eyes! In the end, it provides a well-rested look, being a great ally for busy women that notice fatigue signs on the skin as it revitalizes the eye area with a simple gesture!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Embryolisse Smoothing Eye Contour Care 15ml (0.5floz) on the eye contour area, both morning and evening. Gently massage in circular motions until complete absorption.

description: ClarinsMen Line-Control Eye Balm 20ml is a powerful eye care balm that keeps aging at bay, especially on thicker men's skin. Formulated to tackle deep lines and wrinkles around the eyes, this refreshing balm is a must for any man's anti-aging strategy. While plant-based anti-fatigue extracts work on minimizing dark circles and puffiness, revitalizing active targets the effects of aging on the eye area. The lightweight matte cream formula absorbs quickly and fades into the skin, a barely-there feeling. As a result, wrinkles and fine lines are smoothed out and the eye contour is re-firmed and tightened. Day after day, your eyes begin to recover their intensity and spark.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply ClarinsMen Line-Control Eye Balm 20ml to the eye contour area, taking care not to pull on the skin, morning and/or evening.

description:
Mádara Smart Anti-Fatigue Eye Rescue Cream counteracts localized imperfections such as dark circles and under-eye puffiness. Essentially, its anti-inflammatory components detoxify and boost skin cell's energy. Hence, your complexion becomes extra radiant after just a few applications. Plus, the Smart products' range targets initial aging and fatigue signs, while deeply moisturizing. Its effects are long-lasting thanks to a simple but highly effective formula. Supple, strengthened skin is easier to achieve without having to relinquish protection against external threats. Additionally to the push-up feeling, the vitamins and botanical complex nourish your complexion extensively. Issues like wrinkles, fine lines, or dullness are solved effortlessly. 
100% natural in origin, Mádara's quick-absorption cream puts a high-quality as well as affordable treatment at your disposal. Moreover, it's suitable for both men and women and also emphasizes the brand's mission of sustainability and transparency. In fact, their founders' efforts of extracting resources consciously are as strong as the results of this cosmetic. While looking after the planet's well-being, you'll simultaneously enhance your comfort level. To summarize, whether you're starting or ending your day, this eye cream is a focal ally to soothe/improve your appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small portion of Mádara Smart Anti-Fatigue Eye Rescue Cream on your under-eye area. Delicately tap your ring finger around the eyes and wait until the cream is fully absorbed. For optimal results, use it in combination with other products from the same range. If you wish, apply two or three drops of Custom Actives caffeine concentrate for the complete revitalizing beauty ritual.

description: Galénic Ophycée Smoothing Eye Cream is an eye-contour care that reduces wrinkles, expression lines, dark circles, and bags. This formulation is based on the healing and skin-repairing properties of Blue-Green Algae, which is able to correct the wrinkles in depth thanks to an exclusive mimetic galenic structure called Lamellar Bilayers, that helps it to perfectly and rapidly penetrate into the heart of the cells. Vitamin E contributes to reducing the appearance of wrinkles caused by free radicals, while moisturizing molecules help hydrating and filling in the wrinkles caused by dryness. Optical powders reflect the light, illuminating and reducing the appearance of dark circles and bags. This fresh, light and non-greasy blue-tinted cream provides comfort, restores radiance to the eye contour, and smoothes lines and wrinkles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Galénic Ophycée Smoothing Eye Cream in the morning and night on the eye contour.

description: La Roche-Posay Hyalu B5 Eyes is a tinted care for the eye contour that deeply hydrates, repairs and revigorates the eye contour. Perfect for those who have an eye contour that has signs of fatigue and aging, this product deeply cares for the sensitive skin on the eye contour, repairing it and having a filling effect to attenuate wrinkles and signs of dehydration. Thanks to the light pigments, it helps to lightly fade dark circles, making the skin look less tired.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply La Roche-Posay Hyalu B5 Eyes in the morning and evening on the eye contour, lightly tapping the product onto the skin.

description:
Talika Eye Therapy Reusable Smoothing Instant Patch is your ticket to refreshed, youthful, and vibrant eyes in just 15 minutes. In fact, these patches are designed for the delicate skin under the eyes, delivering hydrating, brightening, and plumping effects. So, if you're preparing for a special occasion and want to revitalize your look, these patches are here to help. The key to these effects is the blend of ingredients. Accordingly, rosehip, wheat germ, and avocado oils, along with ceramides and shea butter, work in harmony to soften, plump, and nourish the skin. The result? Under-eye skin that's not only refreshed but also visibly brighter, with fine lines visibly smoothed. 
However, what sets these patches apart is that they are reusable! Simply rinse them with water after each use, and enjoy each patch up to three times. So, whether it's a special occasion or just a desire to look and feel your best, these eye patches are a great solution. With just 15 minutes of pampering, your eyes will radiate a youthful vibrancy that's hard to ignore.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Talika Eye Therapy Reusable Smoothing Instant Patch onto clean dry skin of the undereye area, with the narrowest part facing the inner corners of the eyes. Then, leave the patches on for 30 minutes and remove them. To clean the patches, rinse with water and leave to air dry. Each patch is usable for 3 times.

description:
Talika Bio Enzymes Ultra-Hydrating Eye Patch x1 is a quick solution that helps you achieve a hydrated and plump look in just 15 minutes. In fact, these patches give a boost of moisture to the skin, addressing dehydration fine lines around the eyes. These patches' bio-cellulose fabric has an ultra-fine three-dimensional structure that retains a high dose of ingredients, easily infusing them into the skin. The formula is packed with ingredients that provide intense hydration and soothing relief to the delicate undereye area. With the inclusion of soothing and hydrating ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, aloe vera, and chamomile, as well as probiotics to maintain a healthy skin barrier, these patches leave your under-eye skin not only hydrated but also plumped, soothed, and protected. 
So, treat yourself to a pampering session that fits into your busy schedule. In just 15 minutes, you can revitalize your under-eye area and achieve hydrated and protected skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Talika Bio Enzymes Ultra-Hydrating Eye Patch x1 onto clean, dry skin of the undereye area. Then, leave the patches on for 5 to 15 minutes and remove them. Do not rinse the skin.

description:
Clarins My Clarins Re-Fresh Fatigue-Fighter Eye Care 50ml (0.5 fl oz) is a revitalizing gel that instantly awakens the eye area with its refreshing texture and incredible formula. This eye care product is formulated with plant extracts that notably help to visibly reduce dark circles and decrease the appearance of puffiness, promoting a fresh and rested look. Additionally, its melting texture offers an immediate sensation of freshness, making it an ideal solution for combating signs of fatigue around the eyes, including dark circles and puffiness. In detail, at the heart of this eye care gel is the Healthy Plant complex, featuring coconut water and alpenrose, to offer nutrition and antioxidant benefits. Another key ingredient in this formulation is plant-based caffeine, recognized for its ability to visibly diminish signs of fatigue.
Furthermore, user feedback highlights the eye cream's effectiveness in addressing eye contour concerns. According to 91% of these women, the skin around their eyes felt soothed and more comfortable after application. Additionally, 88% reported that the eye contour appeared less fatigued, showcasing the product's impact on revitalizing the eye area. As a last note, the formula is vegan and features a subtle floral and fruity fragrance. All in all, this product provides an immediate boost to the eye area, addressing common concerns like dark circles and puffiness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clarins My Clarins Re-Fresh Fatigue-Fighter Eye Care 50ml (0.5 fl oz) to the eye contour with light pressure.

description:
La Roche-Posay Hyalu B5 Eye Serum 15ml (0.50 fl oz) corrects dark circles and wrinkles in the eye area. For this purpose, this serum has a powerful effective formula. First and foremost, it contains a duo of Hyaluronic acid that immediately hydrates and plumps the skin. Then, Vitamin B5 soothes the skin while an Anti-Dark Circle complex that combines Caffeine, Niacinamide, and Hepes, acts specifically on dark circles. As a result, this eye serum immediately hydrates the eye area and, in two weeks, visibly reduces dark circles and wrinkles. 
It has a cool gel texture and, equally important, an exclusive metal massage applicator that will provide a cool feeling and stimulate microcirculation. In turn, this contributes to further improving the appearance of dark circles and revitalizing the eye area. Suitable for sensitive eyes, you can count on this eye serum for hydrating and complete anti-aging action.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply La Roche-Posay Hyalu B5 Eye Serum 15ml (0.50 fl oz) morning and evening to the eye contour, using the applicator in circular motions. Finish the application with your fingertips until complete absorption.

description: Dr. Hauschka Daily Hydrating Eye Cream is the perfect partner for all skin types, as it targets dehydration and nurtures the eye contour area. Thanks to the blend of nourishing oils and natural extracts, this eye contour cream intensely nourishes the delicate skin around the eyes. Moreover, this eye cream is perfect for those who tend to have wrinkles and fine lines on this area due to dehydration, making it ideal to serve as a first wrinkles prevention cream.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Daily Hydrating Eye Cream by gently patting a small amount of the product onto the eye contour, starting on the inner corner and working towards the outer corner.

description: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Antifatigue Eye Contour 15ml is an invigorating eye cream suitable for all skin types, including sensitive ones. This formula, rich in Hyaluronic Acid and Trehalose, acts like a shot of hydration to the under-eye area. These ingredients help to retain water and plump the skin, which provides a refreshing effect on the skin and smoothes out signs of fatigue. The presence of Beeswax forms a protective barrier on the skin, therefore preventing the loss of water.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Neutrogena Hydro Boost Antifatigue Eye Contour 15ml  in the morning and/or evening with your fingertips from the top of the cheekbone to the under-eye area. Since this area is very sensitive, use your ring finger o lightly tap in the product.

description:
Mádara Time Miracle Wrinkle Resist Eye Cream 20ml (0.68 fl oz) is an anti-aging cream that counteracts aging signs in the eye area. This eye cream contains an innovative formula inspired by nature, that counteracts fine lines, wrinkles as well as signs of fatigue such as puffiness and dark circles. Firstly, the formula contains multi-molecular Hyaluronic acid and plant extracts that will hydrate, depuff and firm the skin around the eyes. In addition to this, the formula is also packed with cell-repair bio-complex as well as nutritious oils and vitamins. But most importantly, it features a filler-like molecule that provides an effective relaxing effect on the skin. Consequently, it helps reduce wrinkles in depth and gives a smooth appearance. 
Dermatologically tested, 85% of consumers say this product improves skin firmness whereas 93% felt immediate comfort after application. The texture is lightweight and quickly absorbs. Suitable for all skin types, this eye cream firms and smoothes the skin around the eye area and provides a fresh, radiant, and youthful look. In short, this natural and vegan product offers intense hydration and anti-aging benefits for mature skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a pea-sized amount of Mádara Time Miracle Wrinkle Resist Eye Cream 20ml (0.68 fl oz) to clean skin and use the metal applicator to distribute the product and massage the eye contour.

description:
Garnier Skin Active Moisture Eye Sheet Mask Orange Juice is a sheet mask that awakes the eye contour and minimizes the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. The lightweight formula comes soaked into the sheet mask that instantly refreshes the skin as you apply it - creating a -4ºC skin-cooling effect. The ingredients are key for an amazing sensation and visible results: Orange Juice and Hyaluronic Acid work in synergy to intensely hydrate the skin while helping to reduce eye bags and dark circles.
Sheet masks are easy to apply, satisfying and fuss-free! This particular eye mask is ideal for those in need of a boost of energy to awake the look. Additionally, the cooling effect instantly invigorates the skin and brightens the eyes. This single-use mask instantly awakes the eyes, invigorates your look as well as reduces dark circles and puffiness.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Orange Juice and Hyaluronic Acid work together to reduce eye bags and dark circles.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, open and unfold the mask - store it in the fridge for an intensified cooling effect. Then, apply the Garnier Skin Active Moisture Eye Sheet Mask Orange Juice onto cleansed skin, with the white protective film facing outwards. Smooth the mask gently to ensure that it touches the skin. The following step is to remove the protective film and adjust the mask to guarantee it covers the entire eye area. Allow it 15 minutes before removing the mask. Lastly, massage the excess product left on the skin until it absorbs. Single-use mask.

description:
Revolution Skincare Overnight Squalane Eye Cream 9ml has a specially moisturizing, creamy and fluid formula for the contour of your eyes. In turn, this product has a typical lipgloss format that provides a faster and simpler application of the product. At the same time, its doe-foot applicator becomes a hygienic and very gentle option for the eye area. Furthermore, its main ability is to deeply hydrate and nourish the sensitive skin around your eyes overnight. At the same time, it leaves it much smoother and softer without any kind of stickiness or oiliness. Thus, it becomes perfect for all skin types, even the oiliest ones.
Regarding its composition, the main star of this cream is Squalane. This ingredient works deeply during the night so that in the morning you wake up with extremely hydrated skin. In addition, you don't have to worry about anything as this ingredient intensely hydrates without leaving the skin heavy or greasy. Furthermore, the presence of Shea Butter helps to smooth the skin preventing dry, flaky, or dull under-eyes. Finally, Evening Primrose, Lavender, and Sunflower Seed Oils deeply nourish this sensitive skin on the face.
All in all, this night cream allows you to wake up with much more hydrated, nourished, and smoothed skin. In addition, through these benefits, the contour of your eyes is brighter and without signs of tiredness so visible. Dark circles or even that morning puffiness end up being smoothed out while the skin becomes healthier.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Revolution Skincare Overnight Squalane Eye Cream 9ml to the eye contour with your fingertip along the orbital bone, without pulling the skin.

description: Noreva Noveane Premium Multi-Corrective Eye Care is a moisturizing, anti-aging care for eyes and lips, for a visibly younger appearance. The two hyaluronic acids in its composition moisturize the skin, therefore significantly brightening and revitalizing the appearance of the delicate area around the eyes. Also, this eye contour combats sagging eyelids and targets crow's feet, bags, and dark circles. Its formula is enriched with Visio-regenol, a peptide with a draining and decongesting action, thus re-tightens the eyelids and reduces the appearance of bags and dark circles. The eye area becomes smoother and tighter, hence with a younger, less tired look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Noreva Noveane Premium Multi-Corrective Eye Care in the morning to problem areas around the eyes and lips.

description:
Filorga Global-Repair Eyes & Lips Revitalising Contour Cream is designed for the delicate areas of the eyes and lip contour. With a unique formula, inspired by aesthetic medicine techniques, this daily care not only tackles all signs of aging but also reduces signs of fatigue. With 50 meso-ingredients and four cell boosters, it helps reduce fine lines and wrinkles, enhance elasticity and firmness, unify the skin tone and illuminate the complexion. And, with three super nutrients, it helps restore suppleness and vitality to the complexion, comforting and replenishing the skin. In addition, enriched with ingredients that tackle specific concerns on those areas, it also increases microcirculation helping reduce dark circles and puffiness, and provides a smoothing effect on the contour of the lips.
All in all, with a lightweight texture, that melts into the skin and is quickly absorbed, this eyes and lip contour cream is perfect to lend your complexion a fresher, revitalized, and younger look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Filorga Global-Repair Eyes & Lips Revitalising Contour Cream morning and/or evening to both the eyes and lip contour areas. Pat gently around the eyes and lips.

description:
Clarins Total Eye Lift Concentrate is an exceptional eye serum that helps you achieve total eye radiance. Unlike other eye care products, which are designed to work under your eyes, this concentrate is suitable for the entire eye area, from temple to temple! As such, it will quickly become your best ally in the pursuit of a brighter, more youthful eye contour. The luscious serum formula features an exquisite blend of plant-based active ingredients that ward off puffiness, dark circles, crow's feet, and a wealth of other eye-related concerns. With organic albizia and harungana extracts, this concentrate is particularly adept at restoring density and firmness to the skin around the eyes. This creates an "eye-opening" effect that immediately counteracts any signs of fatigue.
After 28 days of use, 88% of women feel that this plant-powered serum makes their eyes look more serene and well-rested; 86% find their skin firmer, and 85% find their skin tighter. Last, but not least, 80% notice a significant improvement in the appearance of eye bags and puffiness, which are so often to blame for a tired, weary appearance. Say goodbye to heavy eyelids and deep dark circles, and start your day off on the right note with this exclusive concentrate!
how_to_use:
How to use
In order to apply Clarins Total Eye Lift Concentrate, dab the product gently onto the eye contour and eyelids. Then, smooth gently between the eyebrows, and on the temples.

description:
Vichy Liftactiv Collagen Specialist Eye Care 15ml (0.50floz) is an eye care specifically designed to address the five signs of skin aging in the eye area: crow's feet, wrinkles, under-eye bags, dark circles, and sagging eyelids. For that purpose, it features a unique pro-collagen blend, consisting of peptides, proxylane, and vitamin Cg. This complex plays a pivotal role in supporting collagen synthesis, therefore fighting aging signs and maintaining a youthful appearance. Furthermore, the inclusion of 4% niacinamide, helps visibly brighten the eye area and dark circles, while the 1.5%vitamin Cg, known for its antioxidant properties, also contributes to illuminating the skin besides reducing the appearance of aging signs.
Clinical evidence highlights its effectiveness against the aging signs around the eyes, with results showing up to 31% reduction in crow's feet, 28% decrease in under-eye wrinkles, 27% less under-eye puffiness, 16% improvement in sagging eyelids, and 21% reduction in dark circles. In summary, this product targets the eye contour for a comprehensive 360° correction. It not only addresses concerns like dark circles and puffiness but also works to fight the signs of aging, ensuring a more youthful and revitalized eye contour.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Vichy Liftactiv Collagen Specialist Eye Care 15ml (0.50floz) to the eye contour in the morning and evening.

description:
Vichy Liftactiv H.A. Anti-Wrinkle Firming Eye Care 15ml (0.50 fl oz) is a targeted skincare solution that specifically addresses wrinkles and lack of firmness of the eye contour area. With this in mind, the formula harnesses the anti-aging power of hyaluronic acid and Vitamin Cg. Hyaluronic acid deeply hydrates and plumps the skin whereas vitamin Cg offers antioxidant properties and enhances the overall radiance of the eye area. At the same time, this eye cream reduces the appearance of dark circles due to the decongesting action of caffeine. Upon application, this product instantly smooths the contour of the eyes. With continued use, studies have shown that crow's feet wrinkles are reduced by up to 30% after 3 months.
Overall, this eye cream improves the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, firmness, and dark circles. Its formulation is tailored to protect the skin and reduce the visible signs of aging, making it an essential product for anyone seeking to maintain a youthful and vibrant eye area.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Vichy Liftactiv H.A. Anti-Wrinkle Firming Eye Care 15ml (0.50 fl oz) to the eye contour with gentle tapping movements.

how_to_use: Not found

description: Avène Les Essentiels Intense Eye Make-Up Remover is a make-up remover especially formulated for use in the vulnerable eye contour area. This biphasic formula combines Avène Thermal Spring Water and cleansing oils, in order to remove even the most intense eye make-up without harming the skin's delicate balance. Perfect for those with sensitive eyes, or those who wear contact lenses on a regular basis, this product soothes and calms the skin without triggering itching or stinging sensations.
how_to_use:
How to use
Shake Avène Les Essentiels Intense Eye Make-Up Remover to active the biphasic formula. Apply the product to a cotton pad and swipe it gently around the eye contour area, in order to remove make-up and impurities. Do not rinse.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

Sesderma Men N9 Absolut Force Lotion 50ml
Sesderma Hidraloe Eye Contour Cream 15ml
Sesderma Dryses Men Deodorant Roll-On Antiperspirant 75ml

Sesderma Men N9 Absolut Force Lotion 50ml  is indicated to reduce wrinkles and blemishes of male skin. The new stable form of Vitamin C, which has a more prolonged action, fights free radicals and reduces dark spots. A fluid formula suitable for all skin types that is easily absorbed and has a pleasant citrusy fragrance. The skin becomes more elastic and lifted, gets smoother and younger-looking. 

Sesderma Hidraloe Eye Contour Cream 15ml is an eye cream suitable for very sensitive skins, as it contains pure aloe vera from bio plantations that ensure that the content of the aloe extract is full of nutritious minerals and molecules. The fragrance-free formula helps to erase the signs of fatigue and premature aging, making it ideal for those who suffer from very sensitive skin around the eyes.

Sesderma Dryses Men Deodorant Roll-On Antiperspirant 75ml decreases sweating, eliminates odor and refreshes the underarm area for up to 24 hours. This product has triple action, as it works as antiperspirant, deodorant and gives a prolonged cooling effect throughout the day. This antiperspirant in form of roll-on has a very high tolerance, does not have a tendency to cause skin irritations and it can be used after shaving. It maintains the mantle acid of the skin, has a delicate, subtle fragrance and it naturally restrains the sweating process and due to that, also reduces unpleasant body odors.

description:
Ziaja Lifting Solution Serum Eye And Lips Area 30ml (1.0 fl oz) is an anti-wrinkle and lifting serum specifically designed for the delicate areas around the eyes and lips. This vegan serum, formulated with 96% ingredients of natural origin, targets wrinkles and loss of firmness in these regions, providing effective care and quickly visible results. It contains ursolic acid, an ingredient that promotes collagen production. So, this helps to smooth out wrinkles and improve skin firmness. Additionally, the serum includes a polymer derived from sweet almond proteins. This ingredient creates an elastic, smooth film on the skin’s surface, delivering an immediate lifting effect. So, this lifting action provides a quick and visible improvement in the skin's appearance, making the area around the eyes and lips look more toned. Lastly, panthenol helps maintain the skin's moisture levels.
In summary, this product helps to maintain smooth, firm, and hydrated skin of the eye and lip areas.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Lifting Solution Serum Eye And Lips Area 30ml (1.0 fl oz) onto the skin under the eyes and around the lips. Then, gently tap until the product fully absorbs. Use a few times a week according to the skin's needs.

description:
The Saem Iceland Hydrating Eye Stick 7g (0.24 oz) is a portable, easy-to-use skincare product that delivers refreshing hydration to the delicate eye area. Infused with mineral-rich Icelandic glacial water and a blend of natural botanical extracts, this eye stick provides immediate relief to tired and puffy eyes. Besides hydrating and plumping the skin, it attenuates the appearance of dark circles and fine lines and brightens up the complexion. At the same time, the cooling effect upon application soothes and awakens the eye area, making it a perfect pick-me-up during a long day or after a sleepless night.
Last, but not least, it features a convenient design, allowing for easy application without any mess. Its lightweight, non-sticky texture absorbs quickly, making it an excellent addition to any skincare routine. The cute bear design is a plus!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply The Saem Iceland Hydrating Eye Stick 7g (0.24 oz) around the eye area. Then, gently massage it.

description:
Sensilis Origin Pro EGF-5 Eyes Global Rejuvenating Treatment 15ml (0.51 fl oz) is a global anti-aging cream specifically for the eye area. Formulated with peptides and luminous pigments, it fights dark circles and eye bags at the same time. In fact, the exclusive formula combines powerful ingredients such as growth factors, peptides, and stem cells extract to provide all these benefits. On one hand, Growth factors and Peptides provide anti-aging benefits by increasing collagen levels. Simultaneously, Stem cells extract promote skin regeneration and provide antioxidant benefits. As a result, this eye cream fights aging signs and reduces the appearance of wrinkles in size, depth, and number. With color and different luminous pigments, this eye cream also offers luminosity and radiance while correcting skin imperfections. At the same time, Ronaflair Flawless pigment creates a soft focus effect that visibly reduces the appearance of wrinkles.
Lastly, after 28 days this eye cream significantly reduces the appearance of dark circles and eye bags thanks to an anti-dark circles complex that acts on both vascular and hyperpigmented dark circles. All in all, this eye cream reduces the appearance of wrinkles and reduces dark circles and eye bags while increasing overall skin luminosity.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Origin Pro EGF-5 Eyes Global Rejuvenating Treatment 15ml (0.51 fl oz) both morning and evening, to the eye contour area from the inside out by using the applicator. With the applicator or your fingers, exert a slight pressure in circular movements to help decongest.

description:
Frezyderm Color Eye Balm Puffiness & Dark Circles is a tinted anti-fatigue cream that promotes a radiant and brighter eye look. The texture is a lightweight balm that refreshes and perfects the eye area, suitable for all skin types and tones.
The tinted formula contains powerful ingredients that activate and transform the appearance of the skin around the eyes. To point out, Chrysanthellum Indicum extract helps to reduce the swelling while also protecting vessels. Additionally, Lipoaminoacid promotes anti-aging and firming results, thus helping to rejuvenate the eye area. Equally important, Argan oil coupled with shea butter work to protect and nourish the skin around the eyes. As a result, this cooling tinted balm leaves the skin more radiant, refreshed and revitalized. In the long run, it helps to reduce fine lines while improving firmness and elasticity.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with your morning routine, thoroughly cleanse and tone the skin. The following step is to apply your favorite moisturizer and then apply the Frezyderm Color Eye Balm Puffiness & Dark Circles using your ring finger to massage and pat the product.

description:
Revolution Skincare 10% Vitamin C Eye Serum 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a multipurpose formula that resorts to the antioxidant benefits of 10% Vitamin C to improve the overall appearance of the delicate eye area. Thanks to the radiance-boosting abilities of this powerhouse ingredient, this serum is able to counteract countless signs of fatigue. From dark circles to puffiness, it provides a global revitalizing effect that awakens the whole eye area. At the same time, the 10% Vitamin C Eye Serum also contains Hyaluronic Acid, a well-known hydrating agent that focuses on reducing fine lines and improving texture. 
The result? According to the brand, through regular use, this composition contributes to brighter and smoother skin around the eyes, minimizes puffiness and creates a revitalized finish.  
As a last note, the 10% Vitamin C Eye Serum has a vegan composition, approved by PETA as a Cruelty Free product.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Revolution Skincare 10% Vitamin C Eye Serum 15ml (0.51fl oz) as part of your regular morning and/or evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the eye area, tapping gently to improve absorption. In case of irritation or redness, discontinue application.

description:
NUXE Merveillance Lift Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a firming cream perfectly designed for the eye contour. Enriched with 97% ingredients of natural origin, this cream specifically has a moisturizing and corrective action against wrinkles and fine lines. In addition, it leaves the dark circles area much less puffy, which ends up giving your face a fresher, rested, and energized look. Furthermore, the eyelids are also affected by this luxurious cream. In this sense, they end up being firmer, with fewer fine lines and even more improved. With all this, the eye contour is instantly more rejuvenated, firm, and revitalized, all from the first application of this concentrated cream. Furthermore, this product also has a floral fragrance with notes of white musk, magnolia, and freesia for a luxuriously sensorial experience.
The composition of this cream is enriched with Micro-Algae Oil with high concentrations of actives. This specifically consists of microscopic green algae with high regeneration abilities. In turn, this strengthens the skin's protective barrier around the eyes so that it is restored, revitalized, and radiant. At the same time, the skin gains a new firmness, which leads to a smoothing of wrinkles and fine lines present on the face. Furthermore, the presence of Biomimetic Peptide decongests the most sensitive skin, which ultimately leads to the reduction of bags under the eyes. Finally, the large percentage of Squalane intensely hydrates the skin leaving it nice and smooth without being heavy or greasy.
In summary, this vegan firming eye cream allows you to get a more awake, energized look and perfectly cared for skin. Specifically, the eye contour is firmer, with fewer wrinkles and fine lines, the eyelids are more enhanced and bags under the eyes are dramatically reduced. All this while the skin stays hydrated and radiant for a long time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Merveillance Lift Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) morning and evening to smooth, dry skin around the eyes and eyelids.

description: Clarins V Shaping Facial Lift Eye Concentrate 15ml (0.51fl.oz.) has a powerful formula that was specially developed to improve the look of puffiness, sagginess and also dullness on the eye area. In fact, with an instant lifting effect, this eye cream promises to focus simultaneously on rejuvenating, illuminating and smoothing the skin. First and foremost, the Clarins V Shaping Eye Concentrate is incredibly effective when it comes to reducing puffy eyes and overall swelling. Meanwhile, its unique formula also contributes to smoother and more radiant skin, fighting the appearance of dark circles. Lastly, this product is able to visibly lift heavy and hooded eyelids and provide anti-polution protection. All of these benefits are possible thanks to a blend of botanical extracts that even the skin texture and equally decrease swelling.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Clarins V Shaping Facial Lift Eye Concentrate 15ml (0.51fl.oz.) as part of your morning and/or evening caring routine. Apply by using the in-built applicator to enjoy a massage with draining benefits.

description: Erborian Ginseng Infusion Total Eye Cream is a revitalizing cream for the eye contour area. Enriched with a blend of traditional Korean herbs, this cream helps you achieve younger-looking eyes, due to its anti-fatigue and anti-aging benefits. The smooth formula hydrates and soothes the skin immediately upon application, therefore helping reduce the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. At the same time, it targets signs of aging such as wrinkles and fine lines, leaving the skin smoother and younger-looking as a result. The eye contour area looks brighter day after day, as it recovers its radiance and vitality.
how_to_use:
How to use
In the morning, apply Erborian Ginseng Infusion Total Eye Cream to the eye contour area, then tap gently in order to stimulate absorption. You may also use this cream as a make-up primer, under your foundation or concealer.

description: Endocare Eye & Lip Contour is a moisturizing, anti-aging care for eyes and lips, for a visibly younger appearance. With active anti-inflammatory and anti-wrinkle ingredients, this eye and lip care revitalizes and regenerates the skin, reducing fine lines and wrinkles, puffiness, and dark circles. With a soft, easily-absorbed texture, it smoothes, uniformizes and brightens the skin. Ideal as a complement after cosmetic treatments (peeling, laser, microdermabrasion, ...).
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Endocare Eye & Lip Contour to the eye and lip contour area. Gently massage into skin.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Mad Beauty Star Wars The Mandalorian The Child Coconut Under Eye Masks x3 (0.17 fl oz) is a captivating skincare product that combines the allure of the popular Star Wars series with the rejuvenating properties of coconut. These under-eye masks are designed for one-time use and are infused with the nourishing goodness of coconut, known for its hydrating and refreshing qualities. They are an ideal choice for anyone looking to reduce the appearance of tired eyes and achieve a more revitalized look. The design of these under-eye masks is a delightful nod to The Child (or Baby Yoda) from The Mandalorian series. This unique aspect not only adds a fun and whimsical element to your skincare routine but also makes these masks a fantastic gift for Star Wars enthusiasts. The design is not just about aesthetics, it also ensures that the masks perfectly fit the under-eye area.
The key ingredient in these masks, coconut, works wonders in refreshing and revitalizing the skin. This makes these masks ideal when you want to look more awake. In summary, these eye masks offer a unique blend of fun, functionality, and skincare benefits. They are designed to leave you feeling refreshed and ready for action, all while paying homage to one of the most beloved characters from the Star Wars universe. These masks are perfect for anyone looking to add a touch of whimsy to their beauty routine, while also enjoying the hydrating and rejuvenating benefits of coconut.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Coconut fruit extract is rich in sugars, minerals, and amino acids. It offers vitalizing and energizing effects on the skin, thus contributing to a rejuvenated and lively complexion. Additionally, it has hydrating properties, providing the skin with softness and suppleness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mad Beauty Star Wars The Mandalorian The Child Coconut Under Eye Masks x3 (0.17 fl oz) to the under-eye area and leave them for the time indicated. Remove and massage the remaining product on the skin.

description:
Mad Beauty Disney Villains Ursula Gel Eye Pads x2 provide a soothing experience for tired eyes, with a whimsical touch inspired by the iconic Disney Villain, Ursula. These reusable gel eye pads offer a cooling action and can be a playful addition to any beauty regimen, whether you're a Disney enthusiast or simply seeking a refreshing treatment for the eye area. Imaginatively designed with Ursula's iconic nautilus shell necklace, these eye pads represent the essence of the character. Furthermore, the shimmery blue feature captures her bold aesthetic. The vibrant colors not only make the pads eye-catching but also add an element of fun to your skincare sessions. Another key point is that these pads are reusable, being suitable for multiple uses.
To use, simply place the eye pads in the fridge or freezer. This chill treatment is key to offering a cool, refreshing sensation that helps to soothe and revitalize the eye area. The cooling effect is especially beneficial after a long day, helping to reduce puffiness and the appearance of fatigue around the eyes. Ideal for self-care moments, these gel eye pads are not only functional but also serve as a delightful beauty accessory that brings a bit of villainous charm to your routine. They are a perfect gift for Disney fans or a special treat for yourself, combining the magic of storytelling with the practicality of skincare. In conclusion, this product combines style, fun, and relaxation, taking inspiration from one of Disney's most memorable characters.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use:
How to use
Place Mad Beauty Disney Villains Ursula Gel Eye Pads x2 in the fridge or freezer for at least two hours or until temperature is achieved. Place the eye pads over the eyes and relax. If placed in the freezer, cover in a cloth for application.

description:
Diadermine Lift + Hydratant Anti-Age Eye Countour Cream 30+ 15ml (0.5 fl oz) consists of an eye cream with an anti-aging action, particularly adept at reducing signs of fatigue and wrinkles. For that purpose, this eye cream combines 90% natural ingredients with botanical and dermatological actives. To begin with, it contains ingredients that boost collagen production. Quassia amara, a plant known for its collagen-stimulating properties, is a key component. It works to enhance the skin's natural collagen production, crucial for maintaining skin elasticity and firmness. Additionally, paracress is utilized for its ability to restructure and tighten the collagen network in the skin, offering a lifting effect that combats the signs of aging. Another key ingredient is hyaluronic acid, renowned for its hydrating properties, which plays a significant role in hydrating and reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Lastly,  a specific amino acid helps reduce dark circles under the eyes.
In short, this eye cream not only promotes the skin's own collagen production but also rebuilds its collagen structure. It reduces wrinkles, lack of firmness, and visible signs of fatigue around the sensitive eye area. In summary, users can expect a tighter, firmer look around the eyes, along with a significant reduction in puffiness and signs of tiredness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Diadermine Lift + Hydratant Anti-Age Eye Countour Cream 30+ 15ml (0.5 fl oz) to the eye contour with gentle taps.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Uriage Eau Thermale Eye Contour Water Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a cream specially formulated to address concerns of the delicate eye area. It can be used in the morning and/or evening and is suitable for normal to dry skin types struggling with dryness, dehydration, sensitivity, irritation, dark circles, puffiness, and wrinkles. Aquaxyl and H2O Complex help hydrate the skin by improving water retention. As a result, it improves elasticity and helps reduce fine lines. Combined with Dextran Sulfate this cream improves the look of dark circles and puffiness, while also providing a noticeably brighter and more rested appearance. Glycerin, on the other hand, hydrates the skin and offers protection from environmental sources of aggression. Hyaluronic Acid further elevates hydration levels, lending your skin a plumper, smoother look. Lastly, Uriage Thermal Water provides soothing properties that help relieve sensations of discomfort, making this cream perfect for sensitive skin types.
Together, these ingredients not only hydrate and plump but also protect your skin from external aggressors, offering a comprehensive eye care solution. With regular use, your eye contour will look visibly rejuvenated, healthier, and more youthful.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Eau Thermale Eye Contour Water Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) onto clean and dry skin in the morning and/or evening. Apply a small amount of the product on the under-eye area and gently pat the product with your fingers. Use outward motions from the bridge of your nose to your temples in order to improve lymphatic drainage.

description: B-Lift Age Supreme Eye Contour Lifting Micro Gel 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a fast-absorbing anti-aging microgel specifically formulated for the delicate eye contour area. In addition to having an effective lifting effect, as a result of reducing wrinkles, puffiness and dark circles, it guarantees a younger and refreshed look. The gel has a complex formula, which stands out for the presence of a 5% peptide solution of Acetyl Octapeptide-3. Due to this peptide, it manages to reduce wrinkles and fine lines, for a good lifting effect. At the same time, the action of the peptide solution is enhanced by the presence of other ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, with a moisturizing and revitalizing action, and beta-glucans with a repairing and antioxidant action. This microgel is suitable for all skin types.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply B-Lift Age Supreme Eye Contour Lifting Micro Gel 15ml (0.5 fl oz) in the morning and/or in the evening on the previously cleansed eye contour. Place a small portion on your fingertip and smooth it delicately with light touches. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

description:
Caudalie Vinergetic C+ Brightening Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) promises to improve the overall look of your eye area by smoothing and revitalizing the skin. If on one side, this cream visibly reduces blue circles, at the same time it equally decreases wrinkles. Even more, the Vinergetic C+ Brightening Eye Cream focuses on creating optimal hydration levels, as well. The result? Soft and refreshed skin that is full of energy, after each application! All of these benefits are possible thanks to an advanced composition that blends the benefits of multiple powerful ingredients. The presence of Coffee is responsible for targeting puffiness and dark circles. Simultaneously, Olive Squalene moisturizes and Niacinamides unify the complexion.  
To finish, the Vinergetic C+ Brightening Eye Cream follows the brand's guidelines regarding sustainability. This vegan composition contains 97% of ingredients from a natural origin and comes in packaging made from recycled plastic. Furthermore, all the Caffeine present in the formula is completely natural and extracted by green chemistry.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Caudalie Vinergetic C+ Brightening Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) as part of your morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the skin around your eyes, blending outwards. Pro-tip, store this product in your fridge for an extra refreshing feeling. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain maximum results.

description:
Nivea Q10 Power Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Eye Contour 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a gentle yet efficient formula that was specially developed to target signs of aging and dark circles on the delicate skin around the eyes. In fact, after each application, this eye cream visibly revitalizes that area by reducing wrinkles, improving firmness and decreasing tiredness. Even more, it instantly supplies optimal levels of nourishment to the skin. 
This multipurpose action is possible thanks to the power of the Coenzyme Q10 that prevents oxidative as well as UV-induced damage, targeting age spots as well as increasing firmness. 100% identical to the one produced by the skin itself, the brand's Q10 works to harmonize your complexion, making it appear extra healthy. Furthermore, Creatine equally plays a crucial role when it comes to eliminating wrinkles and sagginess around the eyes.  
Finally yet importantly, the Q10 Power Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Eye Contour is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested, does not contain perfume and is suitable for contact lens wearers.
how_to_use:
How to use 
 Apply a small amount of the Nivea Q10 Power Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Eye Contour 15ml (0.51fl oz) to the skin around your eyes. Then, to ensure a maximum absorption of the formula, gently tap the area. Complement its use with other products from the same range in order to obtain optimal results.

description: Embryolisse Intense Lift Eye Cream relies on 98% natural ingredients to provide an effective push-up effect that re-sculpts one's facial appearance. Enriched with Chestnut blossom, Hyaluronic Acid, or Lychee Extract, this option smooths out wrinkles located in a delicate area. In fact, it densifies the surrounding eye section in order to rejuvenate it, preventing further aging signs and suiting all skin types. Moreover, even the most sensitive complexions can benefit from this fragrance-free plumping cream as it moisturizes deeply. Focusing on the eye contouring area, the firming formula enhances one's eyelids while also minimizing dark circles/puffiness. Finally, while Organic Horse Chestnut Extract invigorates and refreshes, Evening Primrose Oil tends to increase flexibility as well as softness!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small portion of Embryolisse Intense Lift Eye Cream as delicately and evenly as possible all over the eye contour area. Remember to include your eyelids when massaging the product into the skin. In order to create a lifting effect, spread the cream upwards, from the corner of the eye to the tip of the eyebrow. Moreover, this can also be applied to the contour of the lips. Finally, feel free to use this as a trustworthy makeup base but shy away from exploring the rest of Embryolisse's anti-aging options.

description: Sensilis Supreme [Eyes] Detox Eye Contour is a global treatment for dull and tired eyes. Now with a new packaging made from 100% sustainable glass, this product maintains its unique formula that combines the hydrating and filling effects of hyaluronic acid with the revitalizing action of caffeine and hibiscus extract. Furthermore, it contains an exclusive Block-Line complex (Syn-Ake + Magnesium Gluconate), which prevents the appearance of expression wrinkles and lines. After 4 weeks of daily application, studies found 30% decrease in expression wrinkles and 14% decrease in wrinkle depth. They also reported a 43% increase in the skin's levels of moisture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Supreme [Eyes] Detox Eye Contour to the clean, dry skin around the eyes using gentle circular movements. You may also use this product on the lips, rictus, and between the eyebrows.

description: Topicrem Hydra+ Radiance Eye Contour is a moisturizer for the periocular area that specifically cares for that delicate skin by depuffing, softening dark circles, and providing long-lasting hydration.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Concentrated Bio-Active Water is an exclusive patent that releases bioactivators, which pull water into the core of the cell. The above-mentioned bioactivators are three. Firstly, Taurine, which buffers and balances the Ph. Secondly, Inositol, a humectant that actively helps the skin to cling onto moisture. Lastly (but not least!) Betaine, another powerful ally in harnessing the precious water content. Thus, the tissues retain hydration, remaining supple and firmer for longer;
Caffeine, often present in stimulating drinks, is featured in this treatment thanks to its relevant antioxidant properties. Hence, it keeps the undesired free radicals at bay, while also activating microcirculation, which helps to recover a well-rested gaze.
Bisabolol comes from Chamomile and just like it happens when it's delivered in an infusion, it has very valuable anti-inflammatory and soothing properties. Therefore, if you think an underslept night or an exhausting day can be detected through your gaze, then think again. One layer of this cream can change that.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a pea-sized amount of Topicrem Hydra+ Radiance Eye Contour around the eyes, with a patting movement. Thoroughly remove any traces of makeup before proceeding with the application of this emulsion.

description:
Rilastil Hydrotenseur Antiwrinkle Eye Contour Cream is a gentle formula that offers multiple benefits to the delicate skin around the eyes. On one side, this treatment targets aging signs like wrinkles and loss of firmness. Simultaneously it has anti-dark circles and anti-puffiness action. Therefore, with each application, your eye's skin will be not only younger-looking but also refreshed and nourished. The Rilastil Hydrotenseur Antiwrinkle Eye Contour Cream is part of the Rilastil's Hydrotenseur range, a set of products that focuses on neutralizing signs of aging. With time, the elastic fibers and collagen fascicles tend to be influenced by the skin's aging process, no longer being able to contrast the force of gravity. 
The Hydrotenseur line targets aging signs like gravitational wrinkles offering a firming, lifting, and filling effect for an overall younger and plumper look. It does so thanks to rich formulas with nourishing and replenishing ingredients such as Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, and the exclusive CALMOSENSINE™.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Rilastil Hydrotenseur Antiwrinkle Eye Contour Cream in the morning and at night by applying an appropriate amount to the skin around your eyes. Then, massage it in gently for maximum absorption. Do not apply it to the eyelid. Complement its use with other products from the same range to achieve optimal results.

description: Lierac Dioptiride Wrinkle Correction Filling Cream restores flexibility of the skin under the eyes by increasing the level of synthesis of connective tissue fibers (collagen and elastin). Repeated movements of the eyelids and the adverse environmental factors make the contour of the eye exposed to the earlier appearance of wrinkles. In addition, the problem of wrinkles under the eyes may be associated with local drying of the skin. This eye cream reduces the visibility of wrinkles, improves elasticity, and moisturizes and protects the skin under the eyes from the damaging effects of external factors. The creamy texture reduces crow's feet and makes the skin look younger. Now with innovative anti-aging peptides that protect against the harmful effects of blue light - protects from oxidative stress and premature aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Lierac Dioptiride Wrinkle Correction Filling Cream to the area under the eyebrow, gently massaging into the temple. Repeat in the lower eyelid, massaging from the inner corner to the area of occurrence of crow's feet. Continue intensive treatment for 1 month.

description: Esthederm Excellage Eye Care is a silky cream especially designed to re-densify and illuminate the eye contour area on mature skin. This unique formulation, which includes exclusive complexes such as Repair Technology and Global Cellular Protection, re-densifies the skin while boosting its natural defenses, therefore improving its resistance against external aggressions. The addition of stimulating ingredients such as caffeine, carnosine, ruscogenin provides the delicate eye contour area with triple anti-fatigue action. Furthermore, this cream is formulated without fragrance, ensuring optimal ophthalmological tolerance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Esthederm Excellage Eye Care in the morning and evening to the eye contour area. First, using the applicator provided in the package, remove a small amount of cream and apply to the inner corner of the eye, eyebrow line and upper and lower eyelid. Smooth from inner corner to outer corner 3 times in a row. Then draw small circles under the eyes and on the top line of the eyebrow 3 times in a row. Lastly, pinch the top of the eyebrow between your thumb and forefinger. Without moving your finger, flatten deeply with your thumb, stretching as far up as possible.

description: APIVITA 5-Action Intensive Care Eye Serum is a white lily serum that revitalizes and rejuvenates the eye contour area. The key ingredient in this formula, white lily, has been renowned since antiquity for its age-defying properties; not only does it reduce signs of fatigue, it is also able to counteract some telltale signs of aging around the eyes. Lightweight and comfortable, this formula provides the delicate skin around the eyes with 5 unique anti-aging actions. It restores firmness, reduces wrinkles and fine lines, offers long-lasting hydration, minimizes dark circles, and downplays signs of fatigue. Thanks to its exclusive antioxidant base, which contains 3 different species of Sideritis, this serum is also packed with antioxidants, to give the eye contour area a welcome boost.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply APIVITA 5-Action Intensive Care Eye Serum to both eyelids, then tap lightly. You may use this product on its own, or under your usual eye cream.

description:
DR. GRANDEL Hydro Active Eye Contour Gel is a revitalizing eye treatment that replenishes the skin with radiance and hydration. The texture is refreshing and weightless, suitable for normal to oily skin types, including sensitive skin.
The skin around the eyes is very delicate and requires tailored-made care. This revitalizing gel addresses some common issues: eye bags as well as dehydration lines. In order to minimize the appearance of eye bags, to hydrate and to smooth the skin, the formula is enriched with powerful ingredients. To point out a few, Hyaluronic Acid protects and intensely hydrates the skin. In addition, Ivy extract drains and helps to reduce swelling while Field Horsetail extract tightens and repairs the eye area, promoting a rejuvenated look. Use it along with your hydrating routine to achieve both energized and replenished skin!
how_to_use:
How to use
Use the DR. GRANDEL Hydro Active Eye Contour Gel onto cleansed skin around the eyes. In order to achieve the best results, distribute a small amount of the product and gently massage it around the eyes with your ring finger.
