description:
Mizon Phyto Plump Collagen Eye Gel Patch x60 is specifically for the delicate under-eye area. These easy-to-apply patches boast a potent blend of ingredients that target multiple signs of aging and fatigue. Firstly, formulated with collagen amino acids derived from plants, these patches help improve skin elasticity and hydration, helping to restore youthful plumpness to the under-eye area. Furthermore, the inclusion of three types of hyaluronic acid ensures deep, lasting hydration, diminishing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by plumping the skin. These patches also contain Centella asiatica leaf extract, known for its soothing and calming properties. The addition of niacinamide brightens and evens out skin tone, reducing the appearance of dark circles and rejuvenating tired-looking eyes. These gel patches are further enriched with panthenol and seaweed, which contribute additional hydrating and soothing benefits, while moringa seed extract adds antioxidant benefits. The result is a more refreshed, revitalized, and resilient under-eye area.
In summary, these patches are perfect for anyone looking to address issues such as dark circles, under-eye bags, fine lines, and wrinkles around the eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
 Using the spatula, apply Mizon Phyto Plump Collagen Eye Gel Patch x60 to the eye contour and leave the patches for 15-20 minutes.

description:
Ziaja Sage Anti-Puff Eye Gel 15ml is a lightweight eye gel designed for the daily care of the delicate skin around the eyes. This vegan formula, composed of 98% ingredients of natural origin, provides gentle care for this sensitive area. It helps to reduce puffiness under the eyes, thus minimizing the appearance of signs of fatigue. In other words, it helps revitalize the appearance of the eyes, making them look refreshed. In addition to reducing puffiness, this product also helps to smooth and moisturize the skin around the eyes. 
This product boasts a lightweight gel texture that absorbs quickly. Moreover, it is suitable for use by contact lens wearers. In summary, this is an eye care product that helps to reduce signs of fatigue and maintain a smooth, hydrated appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Sage Anti-Puff Eye Gel 15ml onto the skin of the undereye area. Then, gently pat the skin until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Ziaja Parsley Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream 15ml is an eye cream designed for the daily care of the delicate skin around the eyes. This cream helps prevent and eliminate fine lines and wrinkles while providing necessary hydration, so that the skin stays soft and smooth. This vegan formula contains 90% of ingredients of natural origin, such as parsley leaf oil, which protects the skin against dryness and offers antioxidant benefits. Then, a retinol derivative further enhances the antioxidant benefits of the cream, boosting the anti-aging properties. Panthenol's hydrating and soothing properties help to keep the skin calm and comfortable.
As a last note, this cream is suitable for contact lens users. All in all, this eye cream hydrates the skin while helping to prevent signs of aging around the eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Parsley Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream 15ml onto the skin of the undereye area. Then, gently pat the skin until the product fully absorbs.

description:
NUXE Prodigieuse Boost Multi-Correction Eye Balm Gel 15ml (0.51 oz) is an eye contour cream that helps to maintain a youthful appearance in this area. For this purpose, the formula contains a blend of natural ingredients that work together to brighten and decongest the eye area. The combination of Jasmine flower and Calendula flower extracts makes for an antioxidant-rich formula, that neutralizes free radical damage and protects against oxidative stress. In addition, Calendula flower extract improves collagen levels whereas Ribose promotes the synthesis of structural proteins. In this way, these ingredients achieve an anti-aging action to fight against skin aging. Furthermore, Caffeine in the formula decongest the eye area and, consequently, reduces puffiness and the appearance of dark circles. 
In addition to the features of the formula, this product provides an amazing sensoriality with its balm gel texture and beautiful scent. All in all, this eye cream helps protect the delicate skin of the eye area against environmental aggressions while fighting the appearance of fatigue and aging signs.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of NUXE Prodigieuse Boost Multi-Correction Eye Balm Gel 15ml (0.51 oz) on the eye contour, tapping the product onto the skin with your index fingers.

description: Allegro Natura Organic Eye Contour Serum 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a serum that targets signs of fatigue in the undereye area, such as puffiness, wrinkles, and lines. So, this product's formula contains a selection of ingredients that help to plump the skin and deliver a refreshed look. Accordingly, hyaluronic acid is able to attract and retain water on the skin, making it more hydrated and smooth. Therefore, it helps to plump the skin of the undereye area, decreasing the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. Additionally, plankton extract also helps to diminish the appearance of eye bags, undereye wrinkles, and dark circles. Even more, aloe vera provides additional hydrating and soothing benefits to the skin, while pomegranate and bilberry waters help to refresh the skin. In summary, this product is ideal to give a boost of hydration to the undereye area, decreasing signs of fatigue and the appearance of wrinkles.
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing, apply a few drops of Allegro Natura Organic Eye Contour Serum 15ml (0.5 fl oz) onto the fingers or directly on the undereye area, without touching the dropper to the skin. Gently tap the skin of the eye contour, using your ring fingers, until the product is completely absorbed.

description:
Uriage Age Lift Smoothing Eye Care 15ml (0.5 fl oz) replaces Uriage Age Protect Multi-Action Eye Contour. That said, this product allies lifting anti-aging properties to environmental protection. First and foremost, the formula contains a Retinol derivate coupled with Hyaluronic acid for an intensive anti-aging action. As a result, it helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while improving skin firmness. Furthermore, this eye cream reduces puffiness and dark circles given the presence of decongesting and blurring ingredients. Last but not least, the formula also protects from daily environmental aggressions namely from blue light and pollution thanks to a patented complex.
In conclusion, this eye cream lifts and smoothes the eye contour area, visibly reducing lines and wrinkles. At the same time, you get a well-rested look with dark circles and eye bags diminished.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Age Lift Smoothing Eye Care 15ml (0.5 fl oz) in the morning and/or the evening to the eye contour area.

description: Noreva Sensidiane Palpebral Anti-Itching Cream is specifically formulated for sensitive, dry, fragile or irritated eyelids. With its duo of hyaluronic acids (high and low molecular weight) in the product's composition, it moisturizes, restores and protects the sensitive eye area against environmental factors. Also, embodied with SkinAP, its fresh and light texture, soothes the skin since day one. 100% Preservative-free thanks to a unique UHT sterilization process. Ophthalmologically and dermatologically tested, it guarantees effective, harmless and safe results. Additionally, with very high tolerance, this product is ideal for the most sensitive skin. Moreover, this cream has an anti-wrinkle action. Suitable for the whole family.
how_to_use:
How to use
Gently press down once on Noreva Sensidiane Palpebral Anti-Itching Cream and apply it onto both cleansed eye contour and eyelid area. Do not open the bottle and do not use if the system has been altered: damaged bottle, clogged pump or similar that may increase microbial contamination risk). Also. keep away from heat.

description: Clarins Total Eye Contour Gel 20ml (0.68fl oz) is a refreshing and ultra-light formula that not only fights signs of tiredness, but also protects the sensitive skin around the eyes. First and foremost, this cream blends the decongestant benefits of plants extracts with the stimulating power of caffeine. As a result, it is able to visibly reduce dark circles and puffiness for a brighter and awakened look. At the same time, the Clarins Total Eye Contour Gel contains the Clarins Anti-Pollution Complex. This technology is responsible for shielding your skin from the harmful effects of pollution and blue light exposure. As a last note, these results are provided by a non-greasy and refreshing formula that is suitable for all skin types, even sensitive ones.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Clarins Total Eye Contour Gel 20ml (0.68fl oz) as part of your morning and/or evening routine before your selected moisturizer. Apply a small amount of formula to the eye area, patting gently for absorption. Start at the inner corner and move outwards.

description: Clarins Total Eye Hydrate Mask-Balm 20ml (0.68fl oz) is a versatile and multipurpose product that moisturizes, revitalizes and soothes the eye area simultaneously. As a ten-minute boosting mask or as an overnight treatment, the Total Eye Hydrate Mask-Balm promises to improve the overall condition of your skin no matter how you choose to apply it. In fact, this all-in-one formula not only targets dehydration lines but also reduces dark circles. The result? Supple and comfortable skin that appears more awakened and refreshed. Last but not least, the Total Eye Hydrate Mask-Balm also contains the Clarins Anti-Pollution Complex. This technology is responsible for shielding your skin from the harmful effects of pollution and blue light exposure.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Clarins Total Eye Hydrate Mask-Balm 20ml (0.68fl oz) as a ten-minute treatment whenever you are in need of a hydration boost. Alternatively, use it as an overnight mask, once or twice a week. Apply a generous amount on the upper and lower eyelids. Remove the excess formula with a cotton pad.

description:
Mizon Multi Function Formula Snail Repair Eye Cream consists of a moisturizing cream for the eye area suitable for all skin types. In addition, it is a cream with several actions as it is indicated to treat wrinkles and fine lines and is also repairing and regenerating. In this way, the sensitive skin around the eyes becomes softer, soothed, hydrated and without so many visible signs of age. On the other hand, this cream also helps to lighten the eye area helping to smooth dark circles and signs of tiredness such as puffiness and dullness. Its formula is easily spread on the skin, quickly absorbed and does not leave the skin sticky or oily.
For all these actions to be successful, this cream is enriched with 80% of Snail Mucin extract. This component helps repair the skin while deeply moisturizing it. Moreover, it is thanks to it that this cream is able to repair from dry patches, acne breakouts to signs of aging. In addition, this moisturizer also contains Glycerin and Sodium Hyaluronate, two ingredients that reinforce the moisturizing action. In short, this cream is ideal for repairing, regenerating, intensely hydrating and providing a more rejuvenated and radiant appearance than ever before.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mizon Multi Function Formula Snail Repair Eye Cream to clean, dry skin around your eyes. Gently pat with your ring finger until the product is absorbed.

description:
Noreva Norelift Chrono-Filler Eye & Lip Care 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a perfect anti-aging cream for the contour of the eyes and lips. With advancing age, it is perfectly normal for certain areas of our body to acquire some wrinkles and fine lines, which is what happens in these regions. In this way, this cream helps to firm the skin by increasing its production of collagen and elastin. Through this, the skin ends up looking more rejuvenated and fuller and with fewer fine lines and visible wrinkles. 
All this is possible thanks to the presence of the active ElastigenFGF, an ingredient that stimulates fibroblast growth factors in order to provide a greater production of collagen and elastin. Furthermore, the presence of Hyaluronic Acid helps to provide an enormous hydration boost to the skin so that it ends up feeling more hydrated, smoothed, and supple. In addition, thanks to the strong presence of an anti-radical power, the area around the eyes ends up with fewer dark circles. Finally, the texture of this cream penetrates easily into the skin without leaving it sticky. All in all, this anti-aging product leaves the eye and lip contour visibly more rejuvenated, the skin firmer, hydrated, and with less visible wrinkles and fine lines.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Noreva Norelift Chrono-Filler Eye & Lip Care 15ml (0.51fl oz) in the morning and/or at night on the marked areas around the eyes and lips.

description: Martiderm Platinum Eye Correct is a combo of two different formulas: Martiderm Platinum Eye Correct Day to brighten the eye area and correct unevenness in tone and Martiderm Platinum Eye Correct Night to refresh the eye contour and fight fatigue signs. The combination of both formulas helps to reduce the dark circles by 67%, reduce eye bags by 50%, unify the skin tone by 86% and luminosity is boosted by 45%.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Martiderm Platinum Eye Correct Day in the morning before the moisturizer, by applying the amount corresponding to half a rice grain on the eye contour and blending until it's uniform. Apply Martiderm Platinum Eye Correct Night in the evening by applying a portion corresponding to half a rice grain on the eye contour.

description:
Diadermine Lift+ Botology Eye Contour Cream consists of an eye cream with an anti-aging action and indicated to prevent and combat mainly wrinkles and fine lines. The eye contour is the place most likely to lose its elasticity and thus gain some fine lines. Over time, these fine lines deepen until they become wrinkles. That said, this cream helps to stimulate the skin's own collagen production so that it becomes firmer, rejuvenated and revitalized. Furthermore, this area of ​​the face becomes more relaxed and fine lines and wrinkles are visibly smoothed. The skin is also more hydrated and without so many signs of tiredness.
Regarding its formula, this eye cream combines 92% natural ingredients with botanical and dermatological actives. In this case it has Aminobutyric Acid, Fermented Green Tea and Black Tea. Basically, all these ingredients work towards the same goal - to improve the skin's collagen, leaving it firmer and rejuvenated. Finally, this cream is easily absorbed into the skin without leaving it sticky, greasy or oily
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Diadermine Lift+ Botology Eye Contour Cream in the morning and evening to your clean, dry skin on your eyes contour.

description: NUXE Nuxuriance® Ultra Eye and Lip Cream Global Anti-Aging is an anti-aging eye and lip contour cream with the powerful anti-aging innovation of the Bi-Floral Cells of Saffron and Bougainvillea. These ingredients end up smoothing out wrinkles and loose skin. Furthermore, this formula also fights dark circles and puffiness around the eyes. For the lips, this luxurious cream helps to smooth the skin and soothe discomfort due to dryness. Due to its prolonged-release technology, the effects last for several hours and the cream has a continuous anti-aging action that replumps the skin and attenuates wrinkles. Finally, with 7 registered patents in France, this innovative range is a must have for those who are fighting advanced signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply NUXE Nuxuriance® Ultra Eye and Lip Cream Global Anti-Aging in the morning and evening by dispensing 1 pump of the product and applying small dots on the eye contour. Pat those dots until fully absorbed and then repeat the process on the lip contour.

description:
Lierac Lift Integral The Eye Lift Care 15ml (0.51fl oz) is specially formulated to target loss of firmness and wrinkles in the eye area. In fact, this eye cream has a smoothing and lifting effect that tightens the skin and reduces the appearance of wrinkles. For this purpose, this new and exclusive formula combines powerful ingredients that act on the essential elements of skin structure. With this in mind, Rose RNA and Black Tulip promote the synthesis of both elastin and collagen. Likewise, these extracts also promote the synthesis of the associated glycoproteins that connect them, and that is the distinctive feature of this product. By stimulating the synthesis of these elements, this range is able to reinforce the skin structure. Besides, this natural and vegan formula also contains Hyaluronic acid which is also an essential element to support the skin. 
Additionally, this eye cream can also be applied to the area around the lips to smooth and firm the skin. With a lightweight texture that melts on the skin, this cream smoothes and hydrates the skin. Besides, it contains a ceramic applicator that provides instant freshness and makes it much more practical to apply. In conclusion, day after day this eye cream reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fatigue signs as well as firms the skin and reduces eyelid sagging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Lierac Lift Integral The Eye Lift Care 15ml (0.51fl oz) in the morning and evening to the eye and lip contour.

description: Evolve 360 Eye And Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a double-action cream that tackles dark circles, puffiness, fine lines, and wrinkles around both the eyes and lips. This lightweight product uses natural ingredients to help your skin age as gracefully as possible, with minimum disruption. This unique formula features a rejuvenating Probiotic Complex that not only helps improve the microbiome but also minimizes signs of aging and fatigue around the eyes. Besides, this product also contains firming Peptides and re-plumping Hyaluronic Acid, in order to restore elasticity and firmness to the skin and smooth out the appearance of wrinkles. Lastly, it has a lightweight formula that is easily absorbed, leaving a comfortable feeling on the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Evolve 360 Eye And Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) to the previously cleansed skin of the eye and lip contour areas. Then, use your ring finger to gently massage the product in order to improve absorbtion.

how_to_use: Not found

description:
NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Eye & Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.51oz) is particularly formulated to address the main signs of aging specifically around the eyes and lips, areas most susceptible to expression lines. At the core of this cream is ALFA [3R] technology which harnesses the power of three key ingredients: alfalfa seed extract, hyaluronic acid, and Hemerocallis fulva extract. These components work synergistically to provide a comprehensive anti-aging action. It revitalizes, renews, and resurfaces the skin. This product proves its efficacy with 87% of women observing a noticeable reduction in crow’s feet, frown lines, and peribucal wrinkles, showcasing its ability to tackle signs of aging not only on the eye area but also the lip contour. In addition to this anti-aging effect, this eye cream also helps reduce the appearance of dark circles and decrease the volume of puffiness.
The product’s texture is a micro-emulsion, ensuring it is comfortable and non-sticky upon application. Moreover, the subtle and fresh fragrance enhances the application experience, providing a scent that is both modern and delicate, ensuring optimal tolerance for the fragile eye and lip areas. In summary, this product is ideal for those seeking to rejuvenate their eye and lip contours with a product that blends efficacy with sensory pleasure.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply the equivalent of 2 grains of rice of NUXE Nuxuriance Ultra The Eye & Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.51oz) to the eye and lip contours.
Notes
This product has a new packaging and formula.

description:
Rilastil Difesa Eye Contour Cream 15ml (0.51floz) is a hydrating and soothing treatment expertly designed for individuals with sensitive skin, particularly in the eye area. This cream stands out due to its formulation, making it especially beneficial for those with a delicate palpebral and periocular area prone to intolerance, eczema, reactivity, or allergic tendencies. At the heart of its formula is witch hazel extract, which positions this cream as the ideal solution for addressing dryness, redness, and irritation around the eyes, thereby restoring comfort to the periocular zone. The addition of trehalose further enhances the cream's moisturizing properties, ensuring that the skin around the eyes remains adequately hydrated.
The effectiveness of this eye cream is underscored by its ability to increase hydration by 33%, reduce itching by 44.8%, and diminish swelling by 14%, showcasing its potent soothing and emollient capabilities. Designed with the needs of sensitive and reactive skin in mind, this cream is hypoallergenic, fragrance-free, and nickel-tested. In summary, this product offers a targeted approach to eye care, providing soothing hydration and relief to the most sensitive of skin types, making it a great ally in the fight against irritation and discomfort around the eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Rilastil Difesa Eye Contour Cream 15ml (0.51floz) to the area around the eyes and/or eyelids, morning and evening.

description:
Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin Brightening Eye Cream 15ml (0.5floz) is particularly formulated to rejuvenate and illuminate the delicate eye area. The formula distinguishes itself by including the hero ingredient, Papayaluronic™. In detail, this ingredient harnesses the nourishing and soothing properties of papaya extract, alongside a potent blend of eight types of hyaluronic acids. This powerful combination ensures deep hydration, offering both instant and long-lasting moisturization. Additionally, the inclusion of retinol in the formula delivers age-renewal benefits, smoothing the skin to reduce the appearance of fine lines. Furthermore, the formula contains Aloe Vera, known for its hydrating and soothing properties. The benefits of this eye cream are multifaceted, focusing on hydration, moisturization, and the reduction of dark circles to reveal a brighter, more youthful appearance.
This lightweight, vegan formula is suitable for all skin types. Whether you're looking to maintain your youthful glow or combat the first signs of aging, this eye cream is an essential addition to your skincare regimen, offering targeted care for visible results.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. PawPaw Your Gorgeous Skin Brightening Eye Cream 15ml (0.5floz) to the eye contour.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

1x Sensilis Supreme Renewing & Antiaging Detox Day Cream SPF15 50ml
1x Sensilis Supreme [Eyes] Detox Eye Contour 20ml


Sensilis Supreme Renewing & Antiaging Detox Day Cream SPF15 is a regenerative and revitalizing day cream that helps improve wrinkles and loss of firmness. Infused with Argan Oil and Chondrus crispus, this product is able to not only hydrate and regenerate the skin but also prevent the formation of wrinkles. In association with Vitamin C and E, this cream is granted great antioxidant properties. Besides, the Vitamin C also helps improve radiance and reduce the appearance of dark spots. Lastly, the combination of Glycerin, Allantoin, Hyaluronic acid, and Panthenol is responsible for the soothing, hydrating, plumping, and protective abilities of this product. Also, due to the presence of sunscreen filters, this product is capable of offering some protection against UV rays (SPF15).

Sensilis Supreme [Eyes] Detox Eye Contour is a regenerating and decongesting eye cream. Thanks to the presence of Hyaluronic Acid, Caffeine, Argan Oil, and Peptides, this cream helps fight wrinkles and expression lines, while working to reduce the appearance of eye bags. It also features reflective pigments to enhance the radiance of the eye area.

description:
Ziaja Olive Oil Intensely Nourishing Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is an eye cream designed to help the delicate skin around the eyes stay soft, smooth, and hydrated. This vegan formula includes olive oil and olive oil-based emulsifiers, which nourish the skin, providing softness and comfort. So, the cream's hydrating properties ensure that the skin remains supple and smooth, while also helping to reduce the appearance of eye wrinkles. Additionally, this cream also helps to minimize the signs of fatigue that often appear around the eyes, promoting a revitalized look. 
Moreover, this product also has soothing properties, which are especially beneficial for reducing any irritation of the skin. All in all, this eye cream boasts a nourishing formula that leaves the skin soft and comfortable while also addressing eye wrinkles and fatigue. It is especially recommended for those with dry to normal skin.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Olive Oil is rich in nourishing fatty acids such as oleic and linoleic acid. It also contains antioxidants like polyphenols, vitamin E and carotenoids, and squalene.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Ziaja Olive Oil Intensely Nourishing Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) onto the skin of the undereye area. Then, gently pat the skin to promote absorption of the product. You can also apply it to the eyelids.

description:
Ziaja Goat's Milk Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a fragrance-free cream specifically designed for the delicate skin around the eyes. This eye cream moisturizes, soothes, and helps reduce the appearance of eye wrinkles and fine lines. Its formula consists of 95% ingredients of natural origin. It includes goat milk, a milk derivative, and panthenol, which work together to nourish and soothe the skin as well as improve its elasticity and firmness, which in turn reduces the visibility of eye wrinkles and fine lines. 
All in all, this eye cream offers a gentle yet effective solution for the delicate skin around the eyes, providing nourishment while reducing the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. Regular use will ensure that your eye area remains soft, smooth, and youthful-looking, making it a valuable addition to your skincare regimen.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Goat's Milk Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) onto the skin of the eye contour. Then, gently massage the skin until the product fully absorbs.

how_to_use: Not found

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser X3 Eye Care is an intensive anti-aging cream that will renew your eye contour area. Its enriched formula with 3% of Pro-Xylane™ a patented active ingredient penetrates deeply into the skin and energizes the molecules accountable for protecting the skin against water loss by reinforcing the extracellular matrix. By doing so, this cream will keep your skin hydrated and will minimize its natural aging signs. Moreover, the caffeine present confers antioxidant properties to the skin as well as it is an outstanding eye bags and dark circles reductor once it promotes the microcirculation of blood vessels. Also, the fragmented hyaluronic acid in its composition is able to deeply moisturize the skin, thus reducing wrinkles and fine lines. This combination of active ingredients will lead to visible wrinkle reduction, a re-densified skin, and a renewed firmness.
Furthermore, the ingenious metal applicator confers a cooling effect, thus helping deflate the eye's puffiness. Its dermatologically tested formula is also suitable for sensitive skin. This eye contour cream smooths, supples and restores firmness to the eye contour area for a younger and radiant look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Laser X3 Eye Care every morning and evening in the eye contour area. First, softly press the product so a small amount of cream appears on the edge of the metal applicator. Then, gently massage the cream around the eye area with the metal applicator, starting from the inside and making way to the outside.

description: It'S Skin Collagen Eye Mask Sheet firms the delicate skin around your eyes, keeping it clean, soft and hydrated. Thus, within a few minutes, this brightens dark circles while also de-puffing and rejuvenating a very specific area. In fact, this is ideal for all skin types, particularly before going to sleep or resting for a long period of time. Besides, this disposable option is dermatologically approved, clearing all kinds of small imperfections. Other than delaying aging signs, the delicate fabric allows active ingredients to penetrate the skin easily, plumping it fully. All in all, it not only offers a rested look but also combines Licorice with Ginger and Hydrolyzed Collagen.
how_to_use:
How to use
Before applying the It'S Skin Collagen Eye Mask Sheet, cleanse your face and eye section with warm water. Then, take the mask off the packaging and carefully place it under your eyes. Make sure to press the mask to create a snug fit, allowing it to rest on your face for 15 to 20 minutes. Finally, remove it and clean the area by tapping water into it. Don't forget to complement the treatment with other products from the same It'S Skin Collagen range!

description:
Topicrem AH Global Anti-Aging Eye Contour 15ml has a fragrance-free melting balm texture perfect for not only moisturizing but also rejuvenating and revitalizing the sensitive area around the eyes. In particular, this product helps provide 24-hour hydration to this area of ​​the face while protecting it from pollution and daily external aggressors. Furthermore, it helps to reduce the appearance of dark circles by brightly illuminating this region. Finally, highly concentrated in reference to anti-aging dermatological active ingredients, this balm provides a global response to all signs of aging and contour concerns of sensitive eyes. Specifically, it fights and prevents wrinkles and typical crow's feet, loss of firmness and radiance, and also puffiness. After a few days of use, the skin is instantly plumper, hydrated, and completely revitalized.
The composition of this balm has the presence of three types of Hyaluronic Acids. In particular, these penetrate deeply into several layers of the epidermis in order to intensely hydrate the skin and, ultimately, give it a fuller and even radiant appearance. On the other hand, Vitamin C, a powerful antioxidant, prevents hyperpigmentation while leaving the skin radiant and bright. Finally, Caffeine keeps the undesired free radicals at bay, while also activating microcirculation, which helps to recover well-rested gauze. All in all, all these ingredients help to rejuvenate, hydrate, and brighten the eye contour. Basically, the entire complexion ends up gaining greater luminance and a more awake appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Topicrem AH Global Anti-Aging Eye Contour 15ml morning and evening after cleansing the face and before the day or night cream. Remove some product and place your fingers on the lower bony part of the eyes and make very light tapping motions from the inner to the outer corners. Repeat the gesture under the eyebrows in the exact same way. Finally, smooth the skin with your index fingers, above the eyebrows, from the base, stretching towards the temples.

description:
Noreva Iklen+ [Pure-C-Reverse] Eye Contour Care 15ml (0.51fl oz) consists of a specific cream for the eye contour with a powerful anti-aging action. That said, this cream has the ability to not only brighten this entire area of ​​the face but also reduce puffiness and dark circles. In this way, the face ends up looking more radiant and more awake. At the same time, this cream has the ability to reduce signs of age like small wrinkles and fine lines better known as crow's feet. Thus, the skin is not only revitalized but also rejuvenated.
Regarding the composition of this cream, the main star is Pure Vitamin C. This, in turn, brightens the entire complexion around the eyes while preventing and protecting the skin from the common signs of aging. In addition, biometric Hyaluronic Acid provides enormous hydration and a boost of firmness. Furthermore, both Vitamin PP and Resorcinol reduce skin hyperpigmentation and limit the appearance of skin blemishes. Finally, the presence of an Eyecare Complex reduces puffiness, dark circles and typical crow's feet. All in all, this cream not only takes care of the skin around the eyes, but also gently revitalizes and rejuvenates it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Noreva Iklen+ [Pure-C-Reverse] Eye Contour Care 15ml (0.51fl oz) to clean, dry eye contour skin every morning and/or night.

description: Nivea Cellular Luminous 630 Anti-Dark Spots Eye Treatment Cream addresses hyperpigmentation, dehydration, puffiness, and dullness. While Caffeine energizes the skin and visibly reduces eye bags, Hyaluronic Acid moisturizes deeply and diminishes fine lines as well as wrinkles. Thus, the delicate eye area is rejuvenated within four weeks as the brand's innovative technology contours specific aging signs. Ideal for all skin types, including sensitive ones, a small portion on a daily basis is enough to improve the skin on a cellular level, brightening instantly. For optimal results on your entire face, pair this with the Luminous630® day and night creams to lessen UV-induced damage. To the same extent, this also helps to control hormonal factors for a vibrant, youthful-looking eye contour that is effective on all skin tones. Finally, this eye treatment is both dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved thanks to 10 years of dedicated research!
how_to_use:
How to use
Before applying a small portion of Nivea Cellular Luminous 630 Anti-Dark Spots Eye Treatment Cream, cleanse the surrounding eye area as well as possible. Then, massage the product with the proper applicator covering the entire eye contour evenly and delicately. For better results, resort to the whole Luminous630 Anti-Dark Spots range.

description: Skin Generics Antiaging Eye Contour Serum Tetrapeptide 20ml (0.68fl oz) relies on 30% active properties to reduce dark circles, wrinkles, and puffiness in a very delicate skin area. Filled with rejuvenating qualities, a few drops of this serum promote natural collagen production, firming saggy sections around your eyes. Moreover, Meadowfoam Extract and Hyaluronic Acid join forces in order to moisturize deeply, revitalizing dull skin. To the same extent, Hygroplex restructures aging tissues, offering an effective push-up result. The inclusion of Argilerine elevates the formula due to a clear plumping, filler-like effect. Finally, you'll also notice a great increase in firmness thanks to the pairing of Collagener and Vitamin E. All in all, this last active component allows the product's complex to have an antioxidant facet. In other words, this serum ends up removing toxins, casting away damaging free radicals to prevent the appearance of further early aging signs.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply two to three drops of Skin Generics Antiaging Eye Contour Serum Tetrapeptide 20ml (0.68fl oz) during the morning and evening, after cleansing your face. Using your ring finger, gently tap from the inner to the outer eye contour area, focusing on where dark circles tend to develop. This serum is for external use only. After each application wait for it to be completely absorbed and if you come in direct contact with the eyes or mouth, rinse off abundantly.

description:
Mizon Multi Function Formula Snail Repair Gold Eye Gel Patch is a set of multi-function hydrogel patches ideal for your eye area. In this case, they have an anti-aging, repairing, regenerating, moisturizing and illuminating action. Therefore, the contour of your eyes is instantly brighter, without looking tired and with less visible signs of age. In addition, this sensitive skin is intensely hydrated, smoothed and rejuvenated. Furthermore, thanks to its composition with hydrogel, patches adhere to your skin and the ingredients absorb more quickly and moisture is retained in that area.
These eye patches are enriched with a concentrated essence rich in Snail Secretion filtrate, 24k Gold and 5 Collagen Peptides. These ingredients have the ability to moisturize and repair the skin and also help to smooth out signs of age such as wrinkles and fine lines. On the other hand, they improve the skin's elasticity, leaving it firmer and rejuvenated. Finally, this product also contains ingredients that brighten the contour of the eyes leaving them with less dark circles and signs of tiredness such as puffiness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mizon Multi Function Formula Snail Repair Gold Eye Gel Patch after cleansing the skin on the face. With the help of the applicator provided, gently separate an eye patch and remove it from the package. Place it over the eye contour area and let it work for 20 minutes. Remove and discard the patch, massaging the skin for the remaining product to be absorbed.

description: Nuxe Nuxuriance Gold Radiance Eye Balm is an enveloping eye cream that helps to boost the eye contour radiance on fragilized skins due to the aging process. This nourishing eye cream is the perfect solution for those who wish to erase the signs of fatigue and recover the lost radiance, due to the golden micro reflective particles that illuminate the eye contour and the botanical extracts which help to have an intensive anti-aging action. With a fragrance designed specifically for the sensitive skin of the eye contour.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Nuxe Nuxuriance Gold Radiance Eye Balm onto cleansed skin in the morning and evening, by gently tapping the product onto the eye contour.

description:
ClarinsMen Energizing Eye Gel is an anti-fatigue eye gel that offers a colling and revitalizing effect. The formula is incredibly light and fast-absorbing, ideal for the thin skin around the eyes as well as suitable for all skin types. In addition to a cooling texture, the tube comes with a refreshing metal tri-ball tip that promotes product absorption all the while granting a depuffing effect. 
Clarins found that powerful botanical extracts are the answer to minimize visible signs of fatigue. Combining ginseng and bison grass, this eye gel visibly energizes the skin while horse chestnut and green coffee specifically target dark circles and puffiness. At the same time, houseleek extract deeply hydrates the skin around the eyes and oat extract works to tighten and smooth the skin. In addition, white horehound, furcellaria and succory dock-cress - part of Clarins plant-based anti-pollution complex - are responsible to shield the skin from both indoor and outdoor pollutants. Apply it carefully around the eyes and massage with the unique metal applicator. As a result, the skin around the eyes looks and feels fresher, the skin is deeply hydrated and it visibly reduces puffiness and dark circles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, thoroughly cleanse the skin. Secondly, roll the tip of ClarinsMen Energizing Eye Gel under the eyes after pressing down the tube. Work the product from the inner to the outer corner of the eyes. At the same time, apply five draining movements using the heels of your hands. Lastly, apply your favorite facial moisturizer and/or sunscreen.

description:
Galénic Flash de Beauté Express Tightening Gel is a beauty product that visibly reduces the appearance of wrinkles, lines and puffiness in just three minutes. Fully compatible with makeup, these temporary wrinkle-reducing results may improve even further your makeup looks. Use it over foundation, or over your facial moisturizer if you're not in the mood for makeup, to reduce puffiness and wrinkles in no time. 
Galénic commits to deliver the best ingredients as well as the best results and a pleasant application experience. With a fresh roll-on applicator, you may distribute the product while receiving a refreshing massage. Then, the ingredients assume their role: clay mineral powder and alginic acid polysaccharides together with hyaluronic acid and glycol help to tighten the skin and reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Use it for an express tightening result that provides temporary results that show. It visibly diminishes the appearance of lines and wrinkles, as well as puffiness.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Clay mineral powder and alginic acid polysaccharides together with hyaluronic acid and glycol help to tighten the skin and reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, apply your facial moisturizer to clean skin. Allow it a couple of minutes before moving on with the application. Then, apply a thin layer of Galénic Flash de Beauté Express Tightening Gel on the areas you wish to correct, such as under the eyes and over wrinkles. Use the rolling applicator to apply the product and then dab it with your ring finger. If you're using liquid foundation or a tinted liquid product, then apply first the moisturizer, then the foundation and lastly the Tightening Gel. Allow it to dry three minutes before accessing the results, keeping the face as still as possible. You may fan your face to hasten the drying time of the product.

description: Lierac Dioptipoche Puffiness Correction Smoothing Gel contains 25% of plant extracts for a restructuring action, it tightens and firms the skin around the eyes. The puffiness becomes less visible and the skin is lifted. This formula is fresh, light and non-perfumed. Swelling and puffiness under the eyes are reduced, and this formula works on all kinds of eye puffiness: from tiredness, excessive fat or aging. Comfort is restored and the skin becomes smoothed. Now with innovative anti-aging peptides that protect against the harmful effects of blue light - protects from oxidative stress and premature aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Lierac Dioptipoche Puffiness Correction Smoothing Gel in the morning and evening with the fingertips. Massage the product with slow, circular movements and end with a few compressions. Continue intensive treatment for 1 month.

description:
Mádara SOS Eye Revive Hydra Cream & Mask is a multi-use formula that nourishes, calms and equally protects the eye area. The skin around the eyes is thinner and more fragile than the rest of your face and, like so, requires special care. If you are struggling with an irritated and dry eye area, then keep reading because this Eye Cream by Mádara is perfect for you. 
This rich and powerful product targets taut skin, moisturizing and instantly reducing dryness, redness and discomfort. Prone to moisture loss, the eye skin area can easily develop inflammation, irritation, and puffiness. All of these conditions are intensified with lifestyle factors and exposure to damaging environmental conditions. The Mádara SOS Eye Revive Hydra Cream & Mask protects the skin against all of these stress factors, neutralizes free radicals, inhibits the growth of bacteria, and improves circulation as well. Therefore, this skin-replenishing formula strengthens the skin barrier boosting protection against outside damage and reducing aging signs at the same time. 
Your eye area will look refreshed, with a smooth touch and calm comforting feeling. 
This eye treatment is a natural clinically tested product, developed scientifically and it is suitable for every skin type. The Mádara SOS Eye Revive Hydra Cream & Mask is also very flexible when it comes to its use. You can utilize it as a part of your skin care routine, applying it at day and/or night-time; or you can apply it as a mask when in need of a hydration boost.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply Mádara SOS Eye Revive Hydra Cream & Mask at day or night-time introducing it to your skin care routine. To use it as an eye mask, apply it directly on the skin and let it act from 15 to 20 minutes.

description:
Mádara Deep Moisture Eye Contour Cream deals with localized imperfections like under-eye puffiness, dark circles, or loss of firmness in sensitive areas. Thanks to its quickly absorbed, light-textured formula, it produces immediate results, evening out skin's tone and feel. Plus, its various hydrating ingredients do wonders and put a duller complexion back into shape. All the more, the healing properties of peppermint, as well as horse chestnut extract issues, suppress wrinkles and roughness because of the exclusive Cell Repair Bio-complex.To the same extent, free radicals stop being a threat, favoring skin's balance, smoothness, and enrichment. In fact, Mádara aims to capture the beauty of northern European territories, choosing components that come directly from nature.
Thus, this organic brand believes in transparency, sustainability, and eco-friendly behaviors and is determined to deliver cosmetics that improve one's life. All the more, their female founders know that true beauty comes from within, emphasized with just a few miraculous elements. Mádara solidifies a worldwide presence through conscious practices with Ecocert's stamp of approval, as well as a great price-value relationship. Finally, it also develops simple yet effective products in the safety of an in-house lab. Indeed, this eye contour cream is a must-have that proves your skin remains healthy in a world where less is more.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, pump the dispenser one time for a small portion of Mádara Deep Moisture Eye Contour Cream and smooth it delicately on your under-eye area. Resort to your ring finger to apply less pressure and still allow full absorption. For better results, use it twice a day, in the morning and evening. Lastly, make sure your face is dry and cleansed before applying the cream. Enjoy the glow and comfort it provides.

description:
Uriage Xémose Soothing Eye Contour Care is a cream specifically designed for the eye contour and dry to extremely dry skin of babies, children or adults. This creamy, non-sticky formula is also ideal for itchy skin with a feeling of discomfort and tightness. This is because this cream not only helps to hydrate this area of ​​the face but also to calm the skin. In addition, this product also helps to nourish, decongest the skin and restore the skin barrier. Furthermore, all these benefits last up to 48h. This way all your skin gains new life, vitality and radiance that lasts.
For this eye cream to really help your skin, it contains key ingredients in its composition. In this case we are talking about a Uriage Patent CERASTEROL-2F complex, of Hyaluronic Acid, Shea Butter, Dextran Sulfte and Uriage Thermal Water. It is the combination of these ingredients that makes your skin feel soothed, hydrated, nourished and smooth. In addition, visually the entire contour of your eyes looks less heavy, more awake and vitalized.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Xémose Soothing Eye Contour Care with your ring finger around the eye area. Pat gently until the cream is fully absorbed into skin.

description: Clinique All About Eyes Rich is a moisture-rich cream that reduces signs of both fatigue and aging in the eye area. Infused with the energizing properties of caffeine, this product visibly decongests the undereye area, contributing to a bright and well-rested appearance. At the same time, it provides valuable hydration, which reduces the look of wrinkles and fine lines. The silky soft formula sinks easily into the skin, soothing and strengthening it against common irritants.
how_to_use:
How to use
Using your ring finger, apply Clinique All About Eyes Rich to the entire eye area with gentle patting motions.

description:
Endocare Renewal Retinol Eye Contour 15ml (0.51floz) is an anti-aging eye contour with a triple-action formula. It serves as an anti-wrinkle solution, retexturizing agent, and decongestant, addressing various concerns with one product. At the heart of its formula, this product leverages the innovative RetinSphere® technology, combining the potency of encapsulated pure retinol with maximum tolerance. This innovative product targets the delicate area around the eyes and the upper lip, significantly reducing the appearance of wrinkles, evening out skin texture, and enhancing its overall appearance and brightness for a rejuvenated look. Additionally, the inclusion of caffeine and Haloxyl™ contributes to the product's ability to reduce puffiness and dark circles. Furthermore, the metallic applicator not only elevates the application experience but also aids in improving circulation, further enhancing the product's effects.
In summary, this eye contour is specifically designed to combat the global signs of aging skin, including wrinkles and irregular texture. As a result, the eye area appears brighter and more youthful-looking. Besides, in addition to being suitable for application on the eye area, it is also suitable for fighting aging signs in the lip contour.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Endocare Renewal Retinol Eye Contour 15ml (0.51floz) in the evening to the eye and lip contours. Clean the applicator after applying. Avoid direct sunlight exposure and always apply SPF50+.

description: Uriage Depiderm Corrective Eye Contour Care 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is designed to address the common issues of dark circles and under-eye bags. Enriched with 95% ingredients of natural origin, this gel-cream textured product effortlessly glides onto the skin, ensuring a refreshing sensation and rapid absorption. For that purpose, at the heart of this formula lies the proprietary Mela Technology that combines pea and sucrose extract, enoxolone, and Uriage thermal water. In addition, the formula integrates vitamin C and niacinamide with brightening properties as well as dextran sulfate for a decongesting action. All these ingredients work together to reduce the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. Furthermore, this product will also enhance the radiance of the eye area. In conclusion, this eye cream offers a solution for those seeking to diminish the appearance of under-eye concerns and reveal a brighter, more refreshed gaze.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Depiderm Corrective Eye Contour Care 15ml (0.5 fl oz) to the eye contour.

description:
Ziaja Cornflower Anti-Shadow Eye Cream 15ml is a revitalizing, soothing, and moisturizing eye cream designed for the daily care of the delicate skin around the eyes. This vegan formula contains 98% ingredients of natural origin. It includes cornflower extract, which has soothing, astringent, and moisturizing properties. So, this ingredient helps to calm the skin while also reducing puffiness around the eyes. Then, panthenol enhances the cream's moisturizing and soothing effects. In other words, it hydrates the skin and alleviates irritation, promoting a smooth and comfortable feel. So, this cream brings relief and moisture to tired skin, helping to reduce dark circles and restore a refreshed appearance. Moreover, it also helps reduce the appearance of fine lines around the eyes.
This product boasts a light consistency that allows for easy application, ensuring that the delicate skin around the eyes receives the care it needs without any heaviness. Additionally, it is suitable for contact lens users. All in all, it's a product that helps to keep the delicate skin around the eyes looking fresh and revitalized.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Ziaja Cornflower Anti-Shadow Eye Cream 15ml onto the skin of the undereye area. Then, gently pat the skin until the product fully absorbs.

description:
NUXE Super Serum [10] Eye 15 ml (0.5 fl oz) is a solution specifically designed to address the unique needs of the delicate eye area. With its innovative formula, this product targets wrinkles, dark circles, puffiness, and signs of fatigue. To begin with, the formula stars hyaluronic acid, a renowned hydrating ingredient that offers anti-aging benefits due to its plumping action. Furthermore, this product combines the properties of natural hyaluronic acid with the moisturizing and soothing benefits of botanical oils. Thousands of golden micro-spheres carry the benefits of these botanical oils to the skin with ease. In addition, native Edelweiss cells provide multiple anti-aging benefits. The goal? To ensure a comprehensive anti-aging effect, addressing various concerns around the eye area.
Another standout feature of this eye serum is its texture. It possesses a unique freshness, complemented by a subtly light fragrance, both meticulously curated for the eye contour. In essence, this product fuses nature's best and scientific innovation to deliver an anti-aging solution that promises revitalized, youthful eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply one drop of NUXE Super Serum [10] Eye 15 ml (0.5 fl oz) to the eye contour.

description:
Dr. Ceuracle Hyal Reyouth Hydrogel Eye Mask 90g (3.17 oz) helps to rejuvenate and awaken the delicate skin under the eyes. With hydrating ingredients, such as the 6 Hyal Complex, a potent blend of six types of hyaluronic acid, this eye mask promises intense hydration to the undereye skin. The boost of moisture helps to plump the skin, diminishing the fine lines that often characterize this sensitive area. Its formulation also works to mitigate the appearance of eye bags and dark circles, revealing a brighter, more alert gaze. With less puffiness, the eyes reflect vitality and freshness.
These biodegradable hydrogel patches perfectly fit the undereye skin, ensuring optimal comfort and delivery of the infused essence. So, if you're looking to visibly decrease wrinkles and signs of fatigue, try this product, for eyes that sparkle with freshness!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a patch of Dr. Ceuracle Hyal Reyouth Hydrogel Eye Mask 90g (3.17 oz) under each eye, using the spatula to remove the patches from the packaging. Leave them on for 20 to 30 minutes before removing.
