description:
Collistar Lift HD+ Lifting Eye And Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) offers a revolutionary solution for rejuvenating the skin around the eyes and lips. The key to this remarkable product lies in its unique ingredients and approach. That said, this range takes inspiration from muscle memory to provide you with a lifting and firming action. The formula stars 100% Italian Tea Rose Water coupled with Tens-Activ® and Lift HD+ Complex. These ingredients work synergically to boost the production of elastin and collagen and consequently, help firm and lift the skin. As such, this cream restores firmness in the eye and lip contour areas, while also reducing eye bags and dark circles. The overall effect is a more youthful-looking complexion.
Besides the powerful formula, the texture is incredible as well. This luxurious cream has a melting and velvety texture that provides an instant feeling of comfort while providing a pleasant sensory experience. As a last note, the formula is vegan and silicone-free. To sum up, with its advanced formula and cutting-edge technology, this cream provides a firming anti-aging action.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Collistar Lift HD+ Lifting Eye And Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) to the eye contour area and lip contour.

description: TONYMOLY Panda's Dream So Cool Eye Stick is ideal for refreshing your face while providing a hydration boost. In other words, this stick contains a cooling formula that helps to revitalize and de-puff tired, dry eyes throughout the day. It is normal with the stress of daily life for our eyes to become heavier and with signs of tiredness. Therefore, just take this cute and funny stick with you in your bag and apply it around your eyes. Thanks to its composition rich in Bamboo Extract and Seawater, your skin is instantly more hydrated, smoothed and with less signs of tiredness. On the other hand, this formula does not contain harsh ingredients for the skin, so it is also suitable for the most sensitive skin. In short, if you need a solution to refresh and moisturize your eye contour throughout the day, this stick is an essential in your bag.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply TONYMOLY Panda's Dream So Cool Eye Stick to the eye area from the inner corner to the outer corner throughout the day whenever your eyes are feeling dry or fatigued.

description: Dr. Hauschka Regenerating Eye Cream is an anti-aging eye cream for mature skin. Especially designed for the naturally sensitive eye contour, this cream provides intensive care against the wrinkles and fine lines that commonly affect this area, such as crow's feet. The lightweight formula is enriched with antioxidant and nourishing botanical ingredients, which replenish the fine skin around the eyes and, consequently, restore its serene and youthful appearance. Ophthalmologically and dermatologically tested, this cream is suitable even for contact lens wearers, due to its incredibly gentle formula.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Regenerating Eye Cream with your fingertips, starting from the inside corner of the eye and working gently outwards. You may also this product as a primer for eye make-up. In order to achieve the best possible effects, combine with other products in the Dr. Hauschka Regenerating range.

description:
Mádara Time Miracle Wrinkle Resist Eye Cream with Metal Applicator 20ml (0.68 fl oz) is an anti-aging cream that counteracts aging signs in the eye area. This eye cream contains an innovative formula inspired by nature, that counteracts fine lines, wrinkles as well as signs of fatigue such as puffiness and dark circles. Firstly, the formula contains multi-molecular Hyaluronic acid and plant extracts that will hydrate, depuff and firm the skin around the eyes. In addition to this, the formula is also packed with cell-repair bio-complex as well as nutritious oils and vitamins. But most importantly, it features a filler-like molecule that provides an effective relaxing effect on the skin. Consequently, it helps reduce wrinkles in depth and gives a smooth appearance. Equally important, this eye cream has a metal applicator that allows for an extra cooling and draining action while you use it to massage the product in the skin.
Dermatologically tested, 85% of consumers say this product improves skin firmness whereas 93% felt immediate comfort after application. The texture is lightweight and quickly absorbs. Suitable for all skin types, this eye cream firms and smoothes the skin around the eye area and provides a fresh, radiant, and youthful look. In short, this natural and vegan product offers intense hydration and anti-aging benefits for mature skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a pea-sized amount of Mádara Time Miracle Wrinkle Resist Eye Cream with Metal Applicator 20ml (0.68 fl oz) to clean skin and use the metal applicator to distribute the product and massage the eye contour.

description:
Guerlain Abeille Royale Eye R Repair Serum 20ml (0.6floz) is a luxurious anti-aging serum that provides a fine eye-lifting effect. With a formula of 94% naturally-derived ingredients, this serum effectively opens up the eye area, reducing puffiness and dark circles. Therefore, is ideal to restore a youthful appearance to fatigued eyes.
It has been clinically tested and the results are clear. Firstly, 90% indicate their eyes are more luminous. Secondly, 98% notice a reduction in puffiness and dark circles. Finally, 95% claim their eye area is more open.
The making-off of this serum has been deeply researched to ensure a highly effective result. The secret of Guerlain Abeille Royale Eye R Repair Serum lies in its Blackbee Eye Repair Technology, rich in different types of honey and exclusive royal jelly, which stimulates skin repairing processes from wrinkle to loss of firmness correction. On top of this, the serum presents an innovative applicator that delivers the perfect dose of product.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Guerlain Abeille Royale Eye R Repair Serum 20ml (0.6floz) in the morning and evening. Firstly, to obtain a radiant eye contour, apply one drop under the outer corner of the eye. Then, using the applicator, smooth across the undereye. Secondly, to stimulate micro-circulation, using the application, draw small circles under the eye. Thirdly, to obtain a lifting effect, using the applicator, draw an arc from under the eyebrow to the temples. Ensure the eyebrow is as raised as possible.

description:
StriVectin Hyaluronic Tripeptide Gel-Cream for Eyes hydrates the eye area while also neutralizing the damaging effects of blue light on the skin.
It's not only sunlight exposure that causes photoaging damage to the skin. New research revealed that the blue light emanating from technological devices also contributes to early aging signs, such as discoloration, fine lines, or loss of elasticity. To prevent these effects, StriVectin developed an eye cream that hydrates the delicate skin around the eyes. Additionally, it also neutralizes the harmful effects of blue light exposure. With rich and all-encompassing ingredients, dark circles, puffiness or even new wrinkles will no longer be a problem. Moreover, it also provides a layer of protection against daily environmental damage, thus protecting the skin on all fronts.
Treat your skin with the care and gentleness it deserves. Enjoy the soothing yet rejuvenating effects only the ultimate skincare technology and investigation can provide.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small quantity of StriVectin Hyaluronic Tripeptide Gel-Cream for Eyes on the clean and delicate area around the eyes. Then, gently tap into the skin with your fingers until it fully absorbed the cream.

description:
Frudia Pomegranate Nutri-Moisturizing Eye Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) is ideal to restore a youthful look to the delicate eye area. Due to the Pomegranate Extract rich in polyphenol, this eye cream develops a strong moisturizing layer, which deeply moisturizes and nourishes the skin around the eyes. At the same time, it restores resilience and volume to the skin, fighting the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. As a result, the skin regains elasticity and firmness, becoming smooth. Additionally, this cream reinforces the skin barrier preventing moisture and nutrient losses while protecting it from external aggressions. Finally, with a soft texture and ingredients that pass the skin irritation test, it can be used daily on sensitive skin.
Frudia is a Korean skincare brand, the result of more than 30 years of development and research. Their products make maximum use of antioxidant-rich plants and fruit extracts. The patented R VITA W technology reduces the destruction of nutrients and vitamins from the fruits used in the products so that their effects are optimized!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Frudia Pomegranate Nutri-Moisturizing Eye Cream 40ml (1.35 fl oz) in the morning and evening. Take a suitable amount on the fingertips and apply it on previously dry and cleansed skin around the eyes. Then, massage it lightly in circular motions. Finally, tap gently until the skin fully absorbs the cream. It can also be applied to laugh lines, forehead lines and neck wrinkles.

description:
Arganicare Moisturizing Treatment Advanced Eye Cream revitalizes the skin around the eyes where early signs of aging or fatigue are more likely to first appear. In addition, this eye cream also hydrates and protects the skin against environmental damage.
The gentle yet active blend of Argan Oil, Peptides, and Vitamin B3 not only strengthens the skin’s elasticity but also reduces capillary fragility and irritation. Therefore, it also improves circulation around the eyes, thus smoothing the skin and reducing fine lines.
With continual use, signs such as puffiness, dark circles, or eye bags, are significantly reduced. In exchange, the skin will be softer and full of vitality. And the delicate eye area will regain its youthful and renewed look back.
how_to_use:
How to use
After washing and cleansing the skin, apply Arganicare Moisturizing Treatment Advanced Eye Cream by gently tapping a small portion of the cream around the eyes with your fingertips. For better results, apply it twice daily, morning and evening.

description:
Elizabeth Arden Prevage Anti-Aging Eye Serum 2.0 20ml offers a luxuriously designed formula to protect, hydrate and revitalize the eye contour. Namely, this serum brings together 15 years of expertise and a renewed formula that now adds five age-defying ingredients and Idebenone to protect, correct, and perfect the look of skin. In this way, the skin around the eyes can easily gain a powerful youthful glow! Specifically, Idebenone being the key ingredient in this serum, it contains a huge antioxidant ability that ends up visibly reversing signs of age like wrinkles and crow's feet. In addition, it protects the eye contour against environmental damage while illuminating this entire area of ​​the face.
Furthermore, the remaining ingredients end up promoting the antioxidant action of Idebenone, helping to hydrate and soothe the skin. In particular, Hawthorn and Jasmine extracts help to soothe this most sensitive skin on the face, promoting maximum comfort. Moreover, Peony Petal extract lightens even the deepest dark circles helping to make the complexion more awake and radiant.
Last but not least, this serum features a cooling applicator perfectly designed to reduce puffiness around the eyes. In addition, it is also indicated to refresh and soothe the skin, giving it a feeling of pure comfort. All in all, this whole serum becomes a real ally against signs of age such as wrinkles, crow's feet, loss of firmness, and loss of radiance. At the same time, it deeply moisturizes and soothes the skin keeping it looking fresher and more awake.
how_to_use:
How to use
Squeeze a small amount of Elizabeth Arden Prevage Anti-Aging Eye Serum 2.0 20ml onto your ring fingertip. Then, gently dot the serum around eyes and use the cooling applicator to de-puff and gently massage into skin.

description:
Shiseido Vital Perfection Uplifting & Firming Express Eye Mask x24 consists of a set composed of luxurious eye masks with high firming and lifting abilities suitable for all mature skin types. In particular, each of these eye maks has a serum rich in components that target dark circles, undereye bags and signs of fatigue. Moreover, this entire area of ​​the face becomes much more illuminated, radiant, and awakened. In addition, typical crow's feet disappear more easily over time while morning swelling is easily prevented.
As clinical studies prove, in just one week eye bags and dark circles are visibly reduced. After four weeks, the eye contour is firmed, lifted and the skin becomes more radiant. In addition to all this, each of these masks has a shape that perfectly adapts to this area of ​​the face. Moreover, its cotton blend material helps to hold and release more essence to the skin showing visible results in just 10 minutes.
The main star of each of these eye masks is Pure Retinol. Notably, it supports the skin's natural production of hyaluronic acid for greater resilience against signs of aging and fatigue. Furthermore, MATSU-ProSculpt Complex with Matsu Extract helps to encourage microcirculation. This, in turn, also improves the signs of fatigue by decreasing skin puffiness and dark circles. Moreover, KURENAI-TruLift Complex with Benibana flower strengthens and energizes the skin for a visibly lifted appearance. ReNeura Technology++, which features Phytoconnect, helps to prolong the efficacy of the treatment while VP8 Technology helps defend skin to visibly correct signs of aging. All in all, this luxuriously created treatment for the eye contour not only reduces and prevents signs of fatigue and age, but also hydrates, radiates and takes care of the skin in an exemplary way.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Shiseido Vital Perfection Uplifting & Firming Express Eye Mask x24 2 to 3 times a week as your final skincare step (apply your moisturizers before this eye mask). Peel open from the bottom left and position the triangular corner below the inner corner of the eye and the rounded end along the outer corner. Use immediately after opening and let it act for 10 minutes. Then remove, discard the masks and massage the remaining serum into the skin. For daytime, follow with sunscreen to ensure the effectiveness of the retinol.

description:
Shiseido Men Total Revitalizer Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a high-performance cream that mainly visibly improves dark circles on men's skin. Namely, this luxuriously rich cream not only hydrates the eye contour for up to 48 hours but also helps to improve five skin aging concerns for men in this area of ​​the face. In this case, it acts on wrinkles, sagging, dullness, roughness, and loss of firmness, leaving the skin smoother, rejuvenated, and restored. At the same time, signs of fatigue are instantly smoothed. In turn, this cream does not leave the skin greasy or sticky, having a fast absorption. In addition, free from parabens and mineral oils, it is suitable for even the most sensitive skin.
Its composition has the presence of a Rice Bran Technology with the power to rejuvenate the eye contour. Notably, Rice Bran Oil Complex helps to encourage the natural production of energy in cells that supports all cellular functions. Thus, dark circles and dark circles are avoided as the skin is energized. In turn, Xylitol enhances skin moisture and barrier function while Nicotinamide helps to encourage the natural production of collagen. In this way, the skin regains its natural firmness, becoming plumper and, thus, with less visible wrinkles and fine lines. In addition, Cornflower Extract helps to encourage the skin's restorative power against damage, leaving the skin feeling stronger. All in all, this luxurious eye cream works on the deepest layers of the skin, helping to build strength and reduce signs of age. At the same time, the skin is energized and more awake.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Shiseido Men Total Revitalizer Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) as the last step of morning and evening skincare routine. Use the small amount on the finger and smooth around the eye bone area, paying special attention to the dark circles area.

description:
Mádara Caffeine Concentrate 17.5ml (0.59fl oz) provides countless revitalizing benefits to the skin thanks to the presence of Natural Caffeine in its composition. Infused with this Coffee Plant derivative, this unique product promises to perk up your skin after each application. To begin with, Caffeine is able to boost microcirculation, helping to reduce puffiness and redness. Whether you want to improve the appearance of puffy eyes or redefine the face contours, this product is the ideal weapon against signs of fatigue. To complement that, the Mádara Caffeine Concentrate also delivers a brightening and refreshing effect on the skin. Last but not least, this serum proves to be efficient when it comes to fighting cellulite, preventing the accumulation of fat and fluid under the skin.
As a last note, this product is part of a unique collection that was specially developed to help you easily customize your skincare routine according to specific wishes. In fact, you can effortlessly mix each formula of this line with your selected moisturizer, enjoying extra benefits conveniently. Every product resorts to rich cosmeceutical additives, supplying specific properties to particular skin care needs.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Natural Caffeine, from coffee plant, has a stimulating action on microcirculation reducing, as a consequence, signs of tiredness and the appearance of cellulite.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Mádara Caffeine Concentrate 17.5ml (0.59fl oz) as part of your usual daily skincare routine on the skin of your face and body. Apply it by mixing one to three drops into your moisturizer or oil. In case of irritation, stop the application. This product is only suitable for external use.

description:
Estée Lauder Resilience Multi-Effect Tri-Peptide Eye Creme is an anti-aging treatment that minimizes lines and wrinkles, reduces dark circles and lifts the look. The texture is nourishing, comfortable, and immediately replenishes the skin with hydration. The combination of powerful ingredients and technology drives to unmistakable results. A Tri-Peptide Complex helps to amplify collagen, and consequently to achieve smoother and softer skin. Moreover, a potent blend of antioxidants protect the skin against free radicals and help the skin to preserve its natural firmness. Equally important, the IR-Defense Technology defends the skin's natural moisture barrier from infrared rays' damage.
The eyes are the main feature of your face and deserve the best care. Keep their youth and radiance with an anti-aging cream that also addresses dark-circles and puffiness. As a result, the lines and wrinkles look smoother, the signs of fatigue are erased and the eyes look more luminous with renewed radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, cleanse and tone the skin. Secondly, apply your favorite serum and moisturizer. Lastly, apply Estée Lauder Resilience Multi-Effect Tri-Peptide Eye Creme to the eye area, using your ring finger. To further enhance results, gently massage and pat the product in.

description: Clarins Total Eye Revive Cream-Gel 15ml (0.51fl oz) was specially developed to target first wrinkles while equally offering a decongestant and anti-pollution action. In fact, on one side, this eye cream proves to be efficient when it comes to smoothing out the first wrinkles and fine lines. Simultaneously, it focuses on fighting signs of tiredness for a brighter and awakened result. Its refreshing texture joins forces with the inbuilt cryo-metallic tip to provide an immediate decongestant effect that reduces both puffiness and dark circles. Last but not least, the Total Eye Revive Cream-Gel also contains the Clarins Anti-Pollution Complex. This technology is responsible for shielding your skin from the harmful effects of pollution and blue light exposure.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Clarins Total Eye Revive Cream-Gel 15ml (0.51fl oz) as part of your regular morning and/or evening routine, before your selected moisturizer. Apply it using the inbuilt cryo-metallic tip for a decongestant effect. Glide the applicator on the under eyes, starting at the inner corner and moving towards the outer corner. Repat the movement at least three times on each side.

description:
Huxley Eye Cream Concentrate On 30ml consists of a cream suitable for sensitive skin around the eyes with a moisturizing and anti-aging action. In other words, this cream takes into account that the eyes have more delicate skin and therefore it is kind to her. In addition to moisturizing and smoothing the skin, it also repairs and strengthens its protective barrier. Thus, wrinkles and fine lines are equally smoothed giving a rejuvenated appearance to the eye area. At the same time, this cream is also suitable for use on the whole face.
Regarding its formula, this cream has a light gel texture that easily penetrates your skin. In turn, the presence of Prickly Pear Seed Oil ensures an intense strengthening and repair of the skin's barrier while moisturizing it. This is reinforced through other ingredients such as Ceramide 3 which leaves the skin looking healthy. In turn, ingredients such as Glycerin and Squalane help to intensely hydrate the skin. Finally, the skin around the eyes is more protected, fortified, and given a new radiance. Also, the signs of aging are lessened as the skin becomes healthier.
how_to_use:
How to use
As the last step of your skincare routine, apply an appropriate amount of Huxley Eye Cream Concentrate On 30ml to the skin around the eyes. Gently pat into the skin until fully absorbed.

description: Noreva Eczeane Palpebral Anti-Itch Lipid 48h Replenishing Cream 20ml (0.68fl oz) is a perfect cream to care for very dry skin prone to atopic eczema on the eyelids and around the eyes. That said, this cream helps to reduce symptoms of discomfort such as itchiness, redness, and severe dryness and also protects this more sensitive skin on the face. Its innovative active ingredients also help to restore the skin barrier so that it becomes stronger and has a good ability to protect the skin from external agents. At the same time, these actives act on the skin's microbiome for an intense localized anti-inflammatory action. In this way, the skin is automatically more soothed and without any itchy feeling for up to 48 hours. Furthermore, this cream is a 100% sterile care treatment that requires constant application every two days. So, in the long run, the sensation of discomfort, dryness, and irritation is totally reduced. Finally, this product is perfect for the atopic skin of adults, children, or even newborns. Its formula does not have abrasive agents or perfume, while its fine and light texture also provides an immediate feeling of freshness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Gently apply a Noreva Eczeane Palpebral Anti-Itch Lipid 48h Replenishing Cream 20ml (0.68fl oz) nut to the previously cleaned area of ​​the eyelids and eye contour. Apply only once a day every two days.

description:
Darphin Stimulskin Plus Absolute Renewal Eye & Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a renewing cream that firms, lifts and smoothes the skin around the lips and eyes. The texture feels incredibly luxurious on the skin, leaving the skin feeling just as smooth as velvet after each use. It provides the skin with immediate comfort and allows an amazing application experience with the massaging tool. 
Technology and nature work hand in hand to deliver the best rejuvenating results. The formula contains 88% of natural ingredients that perfectly combine with technology. To point out the Volu-structure complex, which combines the power of peptides and date fruit extract to lift and plump the skin. At the same time, sea emerald algae extract replenishes the complexion with a high level of nutrients and minerals while Deep-Infusion oil technology manages to find a more direct path for the wholesome botanical components to find their way to deeper layers of the skin. Day after day, this concentrate works to minimize the appearance of lines and wrinkles, promoting plumper and firmer skin.

Sensilis Palpebral Relief [ECZ] Make-Up Remover & Treatment 100ml (3.38fl oz) is a soothing multi-purpose product that gently removes makeup while repairing eyelids prone to eczema. With a comforting cream texture, it is suitable for irritated, sensitive and eczema-prone eyelids. In order to grant both soothing and repairing results, this vegan formula contains replenishing ingredients. Babasu oil works to hydrate, repair and soothe the skin at the same time. In addition, chamomile delivers both an anti-inflammatory and natural soothing action. Each application contributes to reducing irritation, itching and redness, all the while soothing eczema. Use it to remove all types of makeup, including waterproof.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Babasu oil not only hydrates but also repairs and soothes the skin.
Chamomile provides both an anti-inflammatory and natural soothing action.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Sensilis Palpebral Relief [ECZ] Make-Up Remover & Treatment 100ml (3.38fl oz) as a makeup remover and/or as a treatment for sensitive or eczema-prone eyelids.
Makeup remover: Apply the product on a cotton round and press gently on the eyelids, without rubbing. Allow it a few seconds before gently sliding downwards.
Soothing cream: Apply a small amount of product over dry and clean eyelids.

description:
DR GRANDEL Vitamin Infusion Eye Care 20ml (0.68fl oz) is a vitamin-loaded eye cream that focuses not only on reducing signs of tiredness but also on moisturizing and brightening the skin around the eyes. 
First of all, this powerful formula contains Depot Retinol, the most active form of Vitamin A. This ingredient is responsible for reducing wrinkles and fine lines, helping you, therefore, to achieve smoother skin. Moreover, the Depot Retinol is provided by a high-tech encapsulation system that guarantees a delayed release of this active substance in precise doses and, like so, ensures optimal absorption. 
Furthermore, the DR GRANDEL Vitamin Infusion Eye Care also has Taurin Complex in order to reduce signs of tiredness and puffiness, contributing to a refreshing and glowy result. At the same time, and similarly to the Mango Extract also present in the composition, the Taurin Complex is able to protect your skin from external aggressors. 
Last but not least, a Complex of Pomegranate Flowers and Vitamin C stimulates collagen synthesis and protects existing collagen fibers. Hence, this ingredient targets wrinkles and improves skin texture.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use DR GRANDEL Vitamin Infusion Eye Care 20ml (0.68fl oz) as part of your morning and evening routine on clean and dry skin. Apply it to the skin around your eyes massaging gently. Complement its use with other products of the same range for optimal results.

description:
SHANGPREE Ginseng Berry Eye Mask is a hydrogel eye mask that promises to deliver an instant boost of energy and firmness to your skin. This water-soluble product is perfect if you want to target a fatigued eye area through a revitalizing action. 
In fact, thanks to the presence of multiple natural ingredients, the SHANGPREE Ginseng Berry Eye Mask is able to target loss of firmness and elasticity. On one side, the Ginseng Berry Extract present in the composition offers deep nourishment. This antioxidant-rich ingredient has a powerful reenergizing effect that immediately improves the look of your eye area. Furthermore, these masks also contain a Berry Complex that also beautifies and revitalizes the skin. Last but not least, the Peony Root Extract ensures a restorative action of skin elasticity. 
The SHANGPREE Ginseng Berry Eye Mask is part of the brand’s eye masks collection, a set of products specially developed to treat the delicate area around your eyes. Moreover, these masks have Shangpree’s signature hydrogel technology, a system that promotes quick absorption by the skin. Made of powerful natural ingredients, this material is temperature sensitive, which means it reacts when in contact with the skin, reviving and melting into that specific area.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SHANGPREE Ginseng Berry Eye Mask on clean and toned skin. Open the lid and take out two masks with the included spatula. Then, place it under your eyes gently. After letting it act for about 20 minutes, remove it. Do not rinse.

description:
TONYMOLY The Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Eye Cream is a cream rich in moisturizing properties specifically designed for the eye contour. In addition, its gentle formula is ideal for drier or sensitive skin. At the same time, its gel-type texture easily melts into the skin without making it sticky or too heavy. On the other hand, the entire contour of your eyes is more hydrated and thus more voluminous and full. This moisturizing eye cream is then ideal for preparing your skin for your makeup routine. 
This eye cream belongs to The Chok Chok Green Tea range. All these products have in their formulation a key ingredient specially designed for dry, dull, sensitive or irritated skin. In this case, they contain 100% of pure Fermented Green Tea. This component contains more powerful benefits than fresh green tea, which can be seen in particular in its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties. On the other hand, this property gently soothes the skin. Thus, it becomes a great choice for skin diseases including rosacea, acne and atopic dermatitis. Finally, this component also helps protect the skin from environmental factors. 
In short, this intensely moisturizing eye cream helps smooth the skin leaving it looking more radiant. At the same time, this product helps make the eye contour brighter and lift, as well as a more awake look. For a full K-Beauty skincare routine, use the rest of The Chok Chok Green Tea Collection.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply TONYMOLY The Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Eye Cream with your ring finger around the eye area. Pat gently until the cream is fully absorbed into skin.

description: TONYMOLY 2X® Collagen Eye Cream is ideal for a mature skin that needs a firming boost. In this way, this moisturizing eye cream helps to brighten the skin, improve elasticity and vitality while smoothing wrinkles and fine lines. On the other hand, the skin around the eyes is the first to show traces of tiredness, and this cream helps to provide a fresher, lighter and more alert appearance. For this to be possible, this product contains Collagen that helps to fill the skin while also creating a protective barrier to retain moisture during the day. In addition, for greater hydration and help against signs of aging, this cream also has Hyaluronic Acid. Finally, this texture is ultra light and quickly absorbed into the skin around the eyes. On the other hand, the skin is instantly smoother, glowing and radiant. For even more intense care, use the other products in the same TONYMOLY 2X® Collagen range.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply TONYMOLY 2X® Collagen Eye Cream in the morning and evening to clean, dry skin around the eyes. Gently massage until completely absorbed.

description:
Benton Snail Bee Ultimate Hydrogel Eye Patches invigorates, strengthens, and detoxifies the delicate eye skin section in a matter of minutes. Thanks to a combination of gold, pearl, diamond, and charcoal powders these multi-purpose patches illuminate the skin and prevent dark circles as well as wrinkles from forming. In other words, this product rejuvenates skin tissues erasing more visible aging/ fatigue signs. To the same extent, a selection of Seaweeds facilitates full penetration of nourishing core ingredients. However, it is the premium essence of Snail Secretion Filtrate that ensures maximum skin protection against all sorts of environmental aggressions.
At the same time, Tea Tree Leaf Water calms the epidermis, offering the ultimate refreshing outcome. In turn, this action also helps to depuff congested areas prone to inflammations and is used to counteracting daily impurities. By balancing your complexion, these beauty essentials restore tissues from within causing fewer blemishes to resurface. Thus, you'll achieve the even skin tone and texture you've always wished for, reversing the harsher effects of time.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Benton Snail Bee Ultimate Hydrogel Eye Patches on your under-eye area, forehead, neck, or other sections that need extra care. Do so after cleansing and toning and with the help of the applicator included in the packaging. Let the patches rest on the skin for about 20 minutes and gently pat the excess essence into the area to facilitate absorption. Ideally, keep the patches fresh by storing them in the fridge. Finally, make sure the cap is appropriately screwed on before/after use. This prevents the patches from drying out and losing their key essence. Alternatively, resort to the eye patches as a facial or body mist. Just place two eye patches into an empty spray bottle and blend with warm water.

description:
Darphin Hydraskin All-Day Eye Refresh Gel-Cream offers a refreshing treatment designed to calm issues in your under-eye area. This lightweight, gel-textured formula invigorates the sensitive skin around your eyes, moisturizing as well as nourishing extensively. Fundamentally, its goal is to undermine fatigue and premature aging signs. To the same extent, the core ingredients that compose this cream are botanical extracts such as Algae, Salicornia Herbacea, or Lavender. All these are incredibly soothing, thus their properties tackle namely dark circles, crow's feet, and puffiness.
While the gel is easily absorbed, the nutrients enter your complexion determined to decrease the natural loss of moisture that takes place over time. Moreover, you'll notice quick improvements like suppleness, extra radiance, and a generally more jovial look. In other words, this formula recharges dull skin, dealing with the natural urban threats that may come your way daily. Ideally, to facilitate the cooling effect near the eye area, spread the cream carefully drawing small circles Hence, the Parisian brand's 91% natural components adapt to the need of every single skin type, giving you an addictive sensory journey. Finally, in order to fully benefit from this boost in freshness, use this formula on a regular basis.
how_to_use:
How to use
After cleansing your facial skin, apply a small portion of Darphin Hydraskin All-Day Eye Refresh Gel-Cream around the under and upper eye area. To stimulate blood circulation tap gently with your ring finger, doing as little pressure as possible. Then, massage the product into your complexion drawing small circles, activating the multiple benefits within the formula. Once the cream is fully absorbed, you can move on by applying other cosmetics from the same hydrating range.

description:
Lierac Supra Radiance Eye Radiance Serum is a refreshing serum-cream with a protecting action against wrinkles, dark circles and eye bags. This formula deeply hydrates the eye contour, smoothes wrinkles and helps to decongest the eye area and activate the microcirculation, resulting in a decrease in dark circles and eye bags.
Lierac Supra Radiance is the answer to women who are 40+ and have an urban lifestyle. The environment (UV radiation, pollution, tobacco smoke, lack of sleep, stress) has been identified as one of the main perpetrators in what concerns premature aging signs, so the latest advances in antiaging technologies have been focusing in detoxifying the body and preventing free radicals. The Supra Radiance range is inspired by a key protein in fighting premature aging, the Nfr2.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Lierac Supra Radiance Eye Radiance Serum in the morning and evening on the eye contour.

description: Lierac Dioptifatigue Fatigue Correction Reenergizing Gel-Cream effectively reduces fatigue signs around the eyes leaving the area smoothed and illuminated. Its composition contains active ingredients like chamomile extract, pure caffeine and vitamin C that produce a smoothing effect and reduce dark areas caused by tiredness and fatigue. This formula acts on three different fronts to ensure all signs of fatigue are wiped out: reduces puffiness, wrinkles and dark circles. Now with innovative anti-aging peptides that protect against the harmful effects of blue light - protects from oxidative stress and premature aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Lierac Dioptifatigue Fatigue Correction Reenergizing Gel-Cream on the eye contour area, spreading from the inside to the outside. Use light patting touches in order to facilitate the penetration of the product. Continue intensive treatment for 1 month.

description:
L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Moisturizing Eye Cream provides an intense and instant anti-wrinkle action and extra-firmness around the eyes. Thus, this eye cream is ideal for all skin types that need a hydration boost. In addition, this formula provides advanced anti-wrinkle efficacy by filling them, moisturizing the skin and visibly smoothing it. Furthermore, it has a rapid absorption and does not leave a sticky or greasy residue on the skin around the eyes.  
The formula of this eye cream is enriched with Advanced Pro-Retinol which helps to improve the structure of the epidermis and promote its regeneration. In this way, this formula reduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines of expression around the eyes while reducing dark spots as well. In addition, this cream is enriched with Fibrelastyl, a firming complex to help reinforce skin elasticity for firmer skin. All in all, it provides long-lasting hydration, eliminates crow's feet and leaves the skin around the eyes firmer, more elastic and radiant. Wrinkles and fine lines of expression will be noticeably reduced day after day.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply L'Oréal Paris Revitalift Classic Moisturizing Eye Cream in the morning and at night on the perfectly clean face, from the inner corner to the outer corner of the eye, by tapping with your fingertips.

description: Galénic Beauté du Regard Crio-Booster Eye Cream is the new multi-correction eye contour care that helps minimize wrinkles, puffiness and dark circles. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, dextran sulphate, and vitamin B3, a trio of active ingredients selected for their perfect tolerance and effectiveness in combating signs of aging, this cream also features an unprecedented formulation structure inspired by two age-old beauty secrets: cold and massage. The product is provided with a unique "ice cube" base, which has been especially designed to be refrigerated before use in order to fully activate the cream. Upon application, the ergonomic metallic nozzle provides all the benefits of a massage to the eye contour area. Like an ice cube gently melting onto the skin, this product provides SOS action on all the signs of aging around the eye contour area, leaving behind a feeling of lingering comfort and a delicate floral fragrance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Place the "ice cube" base of Galénic Beauté du Regard Crio-Booster Eye Cream in the refrigerator before use. Apply to the eye contour area using the nozzle, always working from the inner corner of the eye outwards, in order to reduce puffiness and stimulate skin micro-circulation. Avoid contact with the eyes.

description:
Lancaster Suractif Comfort Lift Lifting Eye Cream 15ml will help you achieve a more awakened and younger look with just one product. IIn fact, this formula visibly reduces the appearance of dark circles and puffiness while still providing an anti-aging effect. With a comfortable texture, this product turns your delicate eye area into its brighter and more illuminated version. 
Moreover, known as a visionary when it comes to Retinol, Lancaster ensures its products are updated with the latest anti-aging technology available. The Suractif Comfort Lift range, of which the Lifting Eye Cream is a part, represents exactly that. In fact, this set of products aims to leave the skin not only more lifted but also illuminated and firmer. It achieves so by combining the power of the Retinol Matrix Complex with the innovative Double Dermo-Grip Technology. This means that the Retinol action is able to reach several skin levels, providing benefits from the surface to the very deep layers. Furthermore, the Suractif Comfort Lift range offers comfort to the skin, as well. Therefore, after each application, you will notice your complexion firmer, smoother, and feel an ultra-comforting sensation around it.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients 
 
Retinol Matrix Complex combined with Double Dermo-Grip Technology ensures a lifting, illuminating, and firming action on all the levels of the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Lancaster Suractif Comfort Lift Lifting Eye Cream 15ml in the morning and at nighttime after applying a suitable serum. Gently tap the product into the skin around your eyes. Combine its use with other products from the same range in order to achieve enhanced results.

description:
Clinique Men Maximum Hydrator Eye is a hydrating booster that provides a fresh and invigorating sensation. The cushiony watery texture embodies colorful beads and hydrates the skin for 96 hours. Most important, the beads are way more than just a texture feature. The Encapsulated Antioxidants effectively protect the skin from environmental aggressors and premature aging. The Auto-Replenishing Lipid-Sphere Technology with the pure Aloe Butter restore the skin’s lipid barrier and prevent moisture loss. The skin barrier is renovated, the skin is significantly more hydrated and refreshed as well as your senses.
The skin around the eyes is the most delicate area of the face and requires specific skincare. As the skin is more fragile, signs of aging and fatigue can easily show through. Protect your skin with a complete treatment that not only hydrates, but also delivers potent antioxidants that invigorate the skin and protect from external aggressions. As a result, the skin is revitalized and reinforced, to frame the eyes with renewed strength.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, cleanse and tone the skin. Secondly, use your favorite moisturizer. Lastly, pump the Clinique Men Maximum Hydrator Eye to the palm of your hand and help to break the spheres before applying to the eye area.

description: Gallinée Probiotic Eye Contour Cream is a feature-packed eye cream that will freshen up your outlook. Formulated with the most sensitive and reactive skin types in mind, this cream is chock-full of active ingredients. However, it doesn't compromise on tolerance. The holistic formula features not only soothing and protecting prebiotics and probiotics, as is the Gallinée way, but also algae extract to ward off dark circles and wrinkles, and squalane to deeply hydrate the sensitive eye contour area. The result is a smooth, versatile eye cream that immediate soothes and hydrates reactive skin, all the while minimizing the appearance of dark circles and wrinkles. The perfect ally for tired eyes, this cream will help you recover a young, well-rested appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Dispense a small amount of Gallinée Probiotic Eye Contour Cream, about the size of a grain of rice, onto the tip of your ring finger. Then, smooth the cream from the outside corners of your eyes to the inside, using light pressure. This should help you drain any puffiness and restore a fresh, smooth appearance to your eye contour. You may also apply this cream as a restoring eye mask after a long day: simply apply a thick layer around the eyes, then leave on for 10 minutes. Finally, remove gently with a cotton pad.

description:
Estée Lauder DayWear Eye Cooling Anti-Oxidant Moisture Gel Creme is a lightweight facial cream that instantly replenishes the skin with hydration all the while protecting from environmental damage. With a pleasant gel-creme texture, this eye treatment is ultra-refreshing and suitable for all skin types.
The skin around the eyes is thin and delicate, demanding a delicate texture as well as intense hydration and protection. This formula contains Hyaluronic Acid, a surface hydrator and protectant that also helps water-soluble actives to penetrate deeper into the skin. At the same time, Cucumber Fruit Extract provides the skin with soothing as well as emollient properties. In addition, a complex of 5 anti-oxidants shields the skin from environmental aggressions. Equally important, this formula doesn't include alcohol, essential oils and fragrance onto the ingredients list. After each application, the skin around the eyes is deeply hydrated, refreshed with radiance and protected from external aggressions. In the long run, it visibly reduces the appearance of dark circles and puffiness as well as fine and dry lines.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, thoroughly cleanse and tone the skin. The following step is to apply a small amount of the Estée Lauder DayWear Eye Cooling Anti-Oxidant Moisture Gel Creme onto the eye area, massaging in circular motions to improve absorption.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
DR. GRANDEL High Excellence The Face & Eye Serum 30ml (1.01floz) is a global anti-aging solution that addresses a spectrum of concerns including wrinkles, age spots, eye puffiness, moisture loss, and dullness. For that purpose, the formula features a blend of high-tech active ingredients that not only smooth, firm, and tighten the skin but also ensure more moisture, evenness, and radiance. To begin with, Retin Royal, an ester of retinol, smooths lines and wrinkles while promoting a smoother complexion. Moreover, the serum's Multiple Hyaluron delivers a profound moisturizing boost for lasting hydration. Then, an Even Glow complex enhances the skin's evenness and radiance while a biomimetic peptide works to visibly reduce wrinkles. Lastly, the innovative Eye Fit complex effectively reduces puffiness, leaving the eye area noticeably smoother.
Featuring a light, creamy texture, this serum is suitable for all skin types, providing intense nourishment for the skin. Equally important, it is suitable for both the face and eye areas. In summary, this serum stands as a solution for a comprehensive anti-aging action.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply 2 pipettes of DR. GRANDEL High Excellence The Face & Eye Serum 30ml (1.01floz) around the eyes and to the face, neck, and décolleté in the morning and evening after cleansing.

description:
D'AVEIA Ceutics Absolute Eyes Daily Cream 15ml addresses various signs of aging and fatigue around the delicate eye area. In detail, this product effectively targets wrinkles, under-eye bags, and dark circles, while also offering hydrating and soothing benefits. To begin with, the cream's formula features high molecular weight hyaluronic acid, which maintains skin hydration. Simultaneously, low molecular weight hyaluronic acid is included for its filling effect, therefore visibly reducing wrinkles and fine lines. A notable feature of this cream is its 'Botox-like' effect, derived from GABA (Gamma-Aminobutyric Acid), a natural anti-aging factor. In addition, a specialized polymer creates a tensor effect, forming a network that tightens the skin within 5 minutes of application. This immediate action results in a lifting effect!
To address concerns like dark circles and under-eye bags, the cream includes ingredients that reduce melanin, iron, and bilirubin levels, which are often responsible for dark circles, and it has draining properties that improve microcirculation, thereby reducing puffiness. Moreover, the cream employs a 'Soft Focus' effect, which diminishes the visibility of wrinkles through optical illusion, simultaneously imparting a silky touch to the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply D'AVEIA Ceutics Absolute Eyes Daily Cream 15ml to the eye contour.

description:
Talika Eye Detox Contour Gel 10ml (0.3 fl oz) will help you fight eye puffiness and dark circles. It helps to achieve refreshed, toned, and brighter eyes. In fact, the formula with 95% natural ingredients is packed with selected ingredients that work in harmony to rejuvenate and awaken the delicate eye area. Toning caffeine and Chromadetox, a brown algae extract, join forces to target dark circles and puffiness. Moreover, hyaluronic acid helps to provide hydration and plumpness to the undereye skin. Last but not least, niacinamide helps to brighten the skin, and cornflower water delivers soothing benefits.
The result? Reduced eye bags and the eye contour is smoothed and toned. All in all, this gel provides a way to refresh and awaken the eyes, leaving them looking less fatigued and more vibrant. So, say goodbye to tired-looking eyes and achieve a revitalized and energized appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Talika Eye Detox Contour Gel 10ml (0.3 fl oz) onto clean, dry skin of the undereye area. Gently massage the skin with your finger until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Talika Eye Quintessence Day Cream + Night Serum 2x10ml (2x0.3 fl oz) is an eye product that addresses tired-looking eyes and signs of aging around the eyes and eyelids. This product combines two different specialized formulas in a double bottle, making it easier than ever to achieve rejuvenated, refreshed eyes. So, it offers both a day cream and a night serum, each packed with ingredients that work in synergy to combat the signs of aging. From the first application, you'll notice an immediate refreshing sensation, and with continued use, signs of aging such as wrinkles and sagging eyelids decrease. Even more, dark circles and visible puffiness diminish, radiance is restored, and the skin is repaired and protected. Moreover, hydrating ingredients deliver moisture and plumpness, leaving the skin perfectly hydrated and noticeably smoother.
All in all, this double eye cream is the ultimate solution for addressing multiple concerns such as puffiness and dark circles, and aging signs such as wrinkles and lack of elasticity. Embrace the power of these formulas and give your eyes the quintessential care they've been waiting for.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Talika Eye Quintessence Day Cream + Night Serum 2x10ml (2x0.3 fl oz) onto clean, dry skin of the undereye area and the eyelids. In the morning, apply the day cream (gray) and gently massage the skin with your finger, using upward movements, until the product fully absorbs. Then, in the evening, repeat the process with the night serum (dark blue).

description:
Sensilis Skin Glow [K Eyes] Intensive Corrective Treatment 15ml (0.51 fl oz) combats signs of fatigue and aging in the eye area, excelling at correcting the appearance of dark circles. For that purpose, it infuses the power of illuminating beige pigments with a unique formula. These pigments impart instant luminosity and correct the color of dark circles. At the heart of the formula is a Revitalizing complex that stimulates skin vitality, consequently reducing the appearance of fatigue signs. Moreover, among its key ingredients is vitamin K oxide which addresses vascular dark circles whereas niacinamide mainly targets pigmentary dark circles. Simultaneously, caffeine and ginkgo biloba offer a decongesting action, helping to rejuvenate the eye area and reduce the appearance of fatigue. Equally important, hyaluronic acid elastomer plays a pivotal role in bolstering hydration levels.
Beyond its primary benefits, this product also offers antioxidant and antipollution protection, ensuring the delicate skin around the eyes is shielded from external aggressions. In conclusion, this eye cream provides instant and lasting hydration and luminosity, being a great ally for those struggling with dark circles and dullness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sensilis Skin Glow [K Eyes] Intensive Corrective Treatment 15ml (0.51 fl oz) on the eye contour.

description:
Thank You Farmer Miracle Age Repair Eye Cream 20g (0.70 oz) is meticulously formulated to provide attention to the delicate eye area. Its formulation is a blend of ingredients chosen with the utmost care, specifically targeting lack of elasticity, dullness, and wrinkles. The formula features a 5 NMF complex that comprises ceramide NP, glycerine, sodium hyaluronate, cholesterol, and lecithin. Together, these ingredients work synergically to maintain the skin's hydration, ensuring it remains supple and moisturized. Furthermore, the brightening properties of the formula revitalize the eye area and lend radiance to the skin for a rejuvenated appearance.
The texture of this eye cream is another aspect that distinguishes this product. The luxurious rich texture wraps the skin in moisture and provides a soft, comfortable feel with a long-lasting protective effect.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Thank You Farmer Miracle Age Repair Eye Cream 20g (0.70 oz) onto the eye contour and tap gently. Then, gently press the skin with your palms. Additionally, apply the eye cream to the lips and leave it on for 1 to 3 minutes as a lip mask. You can also apply it in the nasolabial fold or on the neck.

description:
PURITO Centella Green Level Eye Cream 30ml (1.01 fl oz) is an eye cream that helps moisturize and nourish the delicate area around the eyes while smoothing wrinkles and fine lines. This cream's formula is rich in antioxidants and nourishing ingredients, which help soften and protect this fragile skin. A key ingredient is 49% Centella asiatica extract, an ingredient with hydrating and calming properties. This ensures that the skin around the eyes is hydrated and soothed, particularly from the stresses caused by environmental damage. Additionally, the eye cream boasts a blend of four types of peptides, which help improve the skin's texture and elasticity. So, this helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and promote a smoother, firmer look.
Panthenol offers further hydrating and soothing benefits, contributing to maintaining a plump, hydrated appearance. In essence, the result is smoother and plumper skin around the eyes, with diminished signs of wrinkles and fine lines. All in all, this eye cream helps achieve a revitalized and more youthful-looking eye area.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of PURITO Centella Green Level Eye Cream 30ml (1.01 fl oz) onto clean skin of the undereye area. Gently massage the skin using your ring finger until the product fully absorbs.

description:
PURITO Centella Unscented Eye Cream 30ml (1 fl oz) is an eye cream that nourishes the delicate area around the eyes and helps smooth out wrinkles and fine lines. Its formula is free from essential oils and artificial fragrance, making it a great option for those who are sensitive to or prefer products without these ingredients. It is also an unscented alternative to the Purito Centella Green Level Eye Cream. So, this eye cream's formula features 47% Centella asiatica extract, which plays a role in hydrating and calming the skin of the undereye area. It also helps restore and strengthen the skin barrier. 
It also incorporates four types of peptides that work to improve the skin’s texture and elasticity. So, this helps reduce the appearance of eye wrinkles and expression lines, providing a smoother and more youthful look. Additionally, panthenol delivers additional hydrating and soothing properties, working in harmony with the rest of the ingredients to ensure the skin around the eyes remains supple and well-cared-for. In essence, this eye cream helps smooth wrinkles and fine lines, while ensuring the skin is nourished and comforted.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of PURITO Centella Unscented Eye Cream 30ml (1 fl oz) onto clean skin of the undereye area. Gently massage the skin using your ring finger until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Isntree TW-Real Eye Cream 30ml is a great choice for fighting eye wrinkles and brightening tired-looking eyes. In its formula, it contains 61% bifida fermentation lysate, an ingredient that works to maintain the skin's elasticity. Therefore, it helps to prevent wrinkles and keep the skin firm and resilient while also fortifying the skin's protective barrier. Moreover, it boasts the 3GF-complex of peptides. These peptides also boost skin elasticity and work to reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Then, to keep the delicate skin around the eyes soft and hydrated, this cream includes shea butter and mango seed butter. These nourishing ingredients deliver the moisture that the skin needs, leaving it feeling supple and well-hydrated. 
The cream's packaging contains a special applicator tip. It dispenses just the right amount of cream, making it easy to control and apply precisely where you need it. And the best part? This cream is not limited to the eye area. You can also use it on the skin around your mouth, smile lines, and neck wrinkles, making it a versatile addition to your skincare routine. All in all, it is a solution to wake up your look and maintain elastic skin, so that you can prevent and target eye wrinkles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Using the applicator tip, dispense an appropriate amount of Isntree TW-Real Eye Cream 30ml to the eye contour area. Gently pat the skin until the product fully absorbs. You can also apply the cream to the skin around the mouth, smile lines, and neck wrinkles.

description:
Teaology Hyaluronic Tea Smoothing Eye Mask offers a quick solution for those looking to rejuvenate and refresh their eye contour. These patches are specially designed to smooth the eye area while combating eye bags and dark circles, offering a revitalized and more youthful appearance. Drawing inspiration from a classic beauty tip, these maxi eye patches reimagine the traditional use of tea bags for reducing puffiness and eye bags around the eyes. So, they are made with soft, 100% biodegradable fibers obtained from plant cellulose. The formula contains a patented infusion of Organic Blue Tea, a natural source of antioxidants. These antioxidants play a crucial role in defending the skin against oxidative stress, one of the primary contributors to aging signs. In addition to Organic Blue Tea, the formula includes a blend of six different types of teas, working together to smooth out fine lines. 
Then, niacinamide and caffeine help reduce the appearance of dark circles and diminish eye bags and signs of tiredness. Ectoin helps protect against damage caused by blue light, and hyaluronic acid of three different molecular weights delivers deep and effective hydration. This ingredient plumps up the skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and making the eye area look more refreshed. Last but not least, cornflower and chamomile are also part of this rich formula. Known for their soothing properties, they calm and relax the skin. After just one application, these patches leave the eye contour looking rested, fresh, and relaxed.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply both patches of Teaology Hyaluronic Tea Smoothing Eye Mask under the eyes and leave them on for 10 to 20 minutes. Finally, remove them and don't rinse the skin. For an extra refreshing effect, place the patches in the fridge for 30 minutes or in the freezer for 5 minutes before application. The patches can also be applied to the eyelids for a decongesting action or to the nasolabial fold to smooth and plump.

description:
Teaology White Tea Miracle Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz)  is an eye contour cream that helps rejuvenate and revitalize the delicate eye area. It addresses common concerns such as wrinkles, eye fatigue, bags, and dark circles, offering a comprehensive solution for a refreshed and youthful appearance. Its nourishing formula softens the skin of the eye contour. It is enriched with an Organic White Tea infusion. This infusion is created using Teaology's patented Tea Infusion Skincare technology, ensuring that the maximum beneficial ingredients from the tea are harnessed. White Tea is particularly rich in antioxidant polyphenols like Epigallocatechin, which deliver potent antioxidant effects to protect and revitalize the skin. In addition, the cream incorporates plant collagen and hyaluronic acid of medium and high molecular weight. These ingredients are known for their moisturizing and plumping actions, enhancing the overall smoothness and hydration of the skin around the eyes.
Further enhancing the cream's efficacy is Beautifeye®, a complex of stimulating plant extracts, as well as revitalizing peptides. These components work synergistically to reduce and prevent the appearance of eye wrinkles, bags, and dark circles, providing an instant "youth effect" that leaves the eye area looking brighter and more revitalized. Comprising 93% ingredients of natural origin, this eye cream aligns with Teaology's commitment to utilizing naturally derived ingredients. In essence, this eye cream delivers a gentle yet effective solution to awaken, enhance, and protect the delicate eye area.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Teaology White Tea Miracle Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) onto the skin of the eye contour. Then, gently massage it using light tapping movements, starting from the inside and working towards the outside of the face.

description:
Chasin' Rabbits Bunny Line Smoother 15ml (0.50 fl oz) is an innovative anti-aging corrector designed specifically for targeting bunny lines and the eye region. With this in mind, the unique aspect of this product is that it offers a targeted application for localized areas. It features a metal ball roll-on type applicator, which not only ensures convenient application but also doubles as a tool for a gentle massage. Then, the formula features niacinamide, known for its anti-wrinkle and brightening properties, as well as adenosine with anti-wrinkle action. It also contains ingredients like Sacha Inchi seed oil, probiotics, and matcha. As a result, this product works effectively to soften wrinkles around the eyes, glabella, and nose.
The cooling effect of this product is another feature that makes it an excellent addition to both morning and evening skincare routines. In the morning, it works to depuff the eye area, providing a fresh and awakened look. In the evening, it serves as a soothing treatment for tired eyes and helps to alleviate dark circles. All in all, this product, with its advanced formula and unique applicator, offers a practical solution for improving the appearance of wrinkles and enhancing skin brightness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Press the button of Chasin' Rabbits Bunny Line Smoother 15ml (0.50 fl oz) 1-2 times to dispense the product. Then, apply on the wrinkle area by gliding the roller ball along the nose and the eye area.

description: BeautyLab Black Diamond Eye Serum 15ml (0.50 fl oz) is ideal for eyes in need of revitalization. In fact, this lightweight serum completely transforms the eye area by brightening it and evening the skin tone. Due to the presence of advanced peptides in its formula, it attenuates the depth of wrinkles while improving the production of collagen. Thus, it is responsible for great firmness and elasticity. At the same time, it ensures the skin has optimal moisture levels. Moreover, the Coffee Extract features anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties that tackle any undereye puffiness or dark circles. On top of that, Diamonds also work on restoring radiance levels and leaving the skin even and glamorous.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply BeautyLab Black Diamond Eye Serum 15ml (0.50 fl oz) in the morning and evening to previously cleansed and toned skin. Firstly, take a small amount and, using your ring finger, pat gently around the eyes.
