description: Eve Lom Radiance Antioxidant Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is an eye cream that brings radiance to the eye contour area. This soft cream quickly absorbs into the skin and diminishes puffiness, wrinkles, fine lines, and dark circles. In fact, a peptide complex increases the amount of collagen in the skin, counteracting wrinkles and expression lines. The skin becomes brighter thanks to antioxidants from ginseng and microalgae. Additionally, this product improves blood circulation, helping to diminish puffiness and the appearance of dark circles. Even more, hyaluronic acid plumps the skin and hydrates it up to 48 hours after the application of this cream. All in all, this cream is suited for all skin types, to brighten the skin and fight signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a pea-sized amount of Eve Lom Radiance Antioxidant Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin, dotting around the eye contour area. Use your ring fingers to gently pat the skin, following the bone, until the product is fully absorbed.

description:
Bobbi Brown Hydrating Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a nourishing eye cream that hydrates and moisturizes the delicate skin around the eyes. Due to a formula rich in Jojoba Oil, it soothes and hydrates the skin. Moreover, Avocado Oil and Squalane, which are rich in fatty acids and antioxidants, nourish and protect the skin from environmental aggressors.
The cream has a lightweight and fast-absorbing texture that provides a surge of hydration to the eye area, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. It also brightens and soothes the skin, making it look more refreshed and revitalized. In the end, the skin is ready for corrector and concealer.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Bobbi Brown Hydrating Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) to previously cleansed and dry skin. Firstly, take a small amount onto your fingertips and using your ring finger, gently tap the cream along the orbital bone around the eye. Avoid applying the cream too close to the lash line or directly onto the eyelid. Then, continue tapping the cream until it fully absorbs into the skin. Finally, allow the cream to fully absorb into the skin before applying other eye products or makeup.

ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description: Dr. Hauschka Eye Balm is a deeply nourishing eye contour solution for those who seek to strengthen the delicate skin around the eyes. Given the extremely rich formula, this balm is able to deeply nourish the eye contour using the littlest amount each time. The beeswax in the formula, coupled with cocoa butter, ensure that the delicate skin around the eyes is deeply nourished and protected from external aggressors, making this perfect for winter, sailing or to use in the sauna.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Hauschka Eye Balm by warming between your fingertips an amount of the cream equivalent in size to a rice grain. Gently pat the cream onto the eye contour area, starting from the inner corner and working it to the outer corner of the eye contour.

description: Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Premiere Regeneration Eye Cream is a regenerating cream to strengthen specifically the thin skin around the eyes. As the years go by, skin changes its needs, demanding more rich textures and more complete formulas when it comes to skincare. To address mature skin needs, this cream has a thoughtful combination of ingredients. Brown Algae coupled with Premiere Retinyl Complex support collagen and elastin, improving the overall appearance of the skin, while reducing the look of age spots and improving skin's firmness. The Triple Ceramide Complex is key to restore natural ceramides' balance and Calcium and Amino Acids provide important nutrients. As a result, the skin is strengthened, looks more firm and supple, and the texture appears more even.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with your routine, cleanse and tone your skin. The following step is to apply Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Premiere Regeneration Eye Cream around the eye area. For the best results, pat it gently with your ring finger and emphasize the massage on the outer corner.

description:
Collistar Pure Actives Hyaluronic Acid + Peptides Eye Contour 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a gel-serum specifically for the eye contour that fights signs of aging. For that purpose, this product features Hyaluronic acid and Peptides, which work together to improve the appearance of the eye contour. On one hand, Hyaluronic acid in four molecular weights is responsible for deeply hydrating the skin, having the ability to retain water in the skin. Besides keeping the eye contour hydrated, it will also plump the skin. On the other hand, three Peptides have a lifting effect and also reduce puffiness and dark circles. And an extra tip, you can store this product in the refrigerator to enhance its decongesting action. Additionally, the formula also contains Ginseng extract that helps protect against blue light damage.
In conclusion, this eye contour cream provides a lifting effect that rejuvenates your complexion. As a last note, this product has a formula with 97% ingredients of natural origin, including Ultra-Pure Water from the Dolomites.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Collistar Pure Actives Hyaluronic Acid + Peptides Eye Contour 15ml (0.5 fl oz) on the upper and lower eye contour area. Then, gently dab with your fingertips from the inner to the outer corner to evenly distribute. Use both in the morning and evening.

description: Juvena Juvelia Nutri-Restore Eye Cream 50ml (0.5 oz) completely regenerates and rejuvenates the eye area. The cream provides intense firming and lifting properties that open up the eye area. Besides attenuating fine lines and wrinkles, it reduces eye puffiness and dark circles. Due to Juvena's exclusive SkinNova SC technology, the cream provides lush nourishing and moisturizing. As a result, the skin around the eyes is more resistant to damage caused by fatigue or aging. In the end, you'll get a fresh look with a smooth feeling.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Juvena Juvelia Nutri-Restore Eye Cream 50ml (0.5 oz), whenever necessary, to the eye area and gently massage it.

description: Sisley Paris Eye Contour Mask 30ml (1.16 fl oz) is a high-end eye mask that targets fatigued eyes. Hence it efficiently attenuates under-eye puffiness. In just ten minutes, the mask refreshes the area around the eye as it smoothes fine lines and reduces dark circles. At the same time, the mask enhances the eye contour's defenses and hydrates the skin. On top of that, after removing it, the mask leaves an imperceptible layer that keeps on working and bettering the skin. In the end, this gentle mask creates a special well-being moment in the skincare routine for both the face and mind. It is dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested and specially designed to suit and be gentle to the delicate area of the eye.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sisley Paris Eye Contour Mask 30ml (1.16 fl oz) two or three times a week, in the morning and evening, on previously dry and clean skin. Firstly, apply a thick layer of the mask around the eye contour and eyelids. Then, let it sit on the skin for ten minutes. Finally, wipe the excess without rinsing it.

description:
Payot My Payot Super Eye Energizer 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a radiance treatment that energizes the skin around the eyes. Infused with 96% of ingredients of natural origin, this product is 2-in1 care. In this way, it can be used either as daily care or occasionally as a night mask, to deliver a refreshed and radiant look.
On one hand, this unique formula proves to be efficient in restoring the radiance of the eye area. As a matter of fact, 100% of consumers report their eyes are visibly refreshed and full of energy, more rested, and the natural radiance is revived. At the same time, thanks to the presence of ingredients like organic Goji, organic Pomegranate, and Açaí, this eye cream equally fights dark circles and puffiness while hydrating this delicate area. Therefore, with each application, you will be fighting not only dullness but also dark circles, eye bags, and dehydration.
As a last note, this fragrance-free eye contour care has a pleasant texture, between a cream and a balm. Therefore, it melts on the skin upon application, delivering a nice sensorial experience.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Payot My Payot Super Eye Energizer 15ml (0.5 fl oz) as a daily care every morning and evening, or apply a thick layer as a sleeping mask and leave it on overnight.

description:
Arganicare Collagen Boost Anti-Wrinkle Eye Serum 30ml (1.0 fl oz) restores vitality and youthfulness to the face. With active ingredients such as Argan Oil and Hyaluronic Acid, this eye serum provides a lifting effect and maintains optimal levels of moisture in the skin, preserving its elasticity.
Argan Oil is a great ingredient to smooth out wrinkles and fine lines. Mostly due to the omega 6 and vitamin E present in its constitution. Additionally, Hyaluronic Acid plumps up the skin, helping reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Besides, this formula is free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and mineral oils, thus being suitable for all skin types.
Thus, the skin will feel renewed and more luminous. Moreover, Arganicare Anti-Wrinkle Eye Serum also improves the appearance of dark circles, bags, and overall puffiness around the eyes. By helping in the elimination of the pigments responsible for darkness under the eyes and local inflammation, this serum will make the skin visibly firmer, smoother, and more luminous
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small quantity of Arganicare Collagen Boost Anti-Wrinkle Eye Serum 30ml (1.0 fl oz) around the eyes twice a day, morning and evening. Gently tap the area until the serum is fully absorbed.

description:
Arganicare Collagen Boost Perfecting Eye Cream 30ml (1.0 fl oz) hydrates the skin and smooths expression lines. This gentle cream also both improves the elasticity and firmness of the skin and provides up to 24 hours of intense hydration. Therefore, it is suitable for all skin types.
With a delicate blend of soothing ingredients, moisturizers, and collagen boosters, this luxurious cream reduces puffiness and the appearance of bags under the eyes. Additionally, it also minimizes inflammation. That is only possible thanks to the peptides in its formula that prevent the leakage of fluids and damage to the skin complexion.
As it is, this eye cream hydrates and protects the delicate area around the eyes. It also visibly minimizes the signs of aging and smoothes expression lines. For a refreshing, rested, and radiant look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Arganicare Collagen Boost Perfecting Eye Cream 30ml (1.0 fl oz) to the eye contour area. Then, in order for the cream to be fully absorbed, gently pat it with your fingertips.

description:
Arganicare Aloe Hydra Eye Cream 30ml (1.0 fl oz) is a soothing and restorative eye cream for all skin types. Due to its high concentration of antioxidants and revitalizing vitamins, it helps soften fine lines and wrinkles around the eye area while also providing a healthy and hydrated look overall.
Among its main ingredients is Hyaluronic Acid. Naturally found in the skin, it stimulates collagen production, strengthening the skin while keeping it hydrated. In addition, Arganicare Aloe Hydra Eye Cream also includes Aloe Vera Extract and Vitamin E. The result is a rich, nourishing cream that reduces the appearance of dark circles under the eyes, and also tones the skin, making it more elastic.
Moreover, the advanced formula also does not include parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and mineral oils in its constitution. Undoubtedly, this eye cream will improve the skin, resulting in a smoother and firmer complexion. With regular use, the existing wrinkles around the eyes will appear less visible. And, last but not least, the appearance of new wrinkles, due to loss of moisture, will also be prevented.
how_to_use:
How to use
After washing and cleansing the skin, apply Arganicare Aloe Hydra Eye Cream 30ml (1.0 fl oz) by gently tapping the a small portion of the cream around the eyes with your fingertips. The eye cream should be applied twice a day, so as to have maximum efficacy.

description:
Atashi Antioxidant Longévité Therapy Eye Contour 15ml is an anti-wrinkle eye contour cream that tackles puffiness and dark circles. As a result, the eye area opens up and regains its brightness and vitality. Due to the Pomegranate Extract present in its formula, this cream attenuates expression lines. In this way, the skin is firmer and more elastic. On top of that, the cream deeply hydrates the skin with its lightweight and melting texture that absorbs into the skin immediately.
On another note, it slows down signs of aging caused by radiation and pollution, by filling the epidermal cells with vitality and stopping the destruction of collagen and elastin. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to stimulate its synthesis.
Due to its fresh and velvety texture and its scent of the lily of the valley, it caresses the skin and provides moments of comfort. It is suitable for all skin types but is especially effective on sensitive and dry skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Atashi Antioxidant Longévité Therapy Eye Contour 15ml in the morning and evening on previously cleansed skin. Firstly, take a small amount onto the palms. Then, gently massage it all over the eye contour area from the tear duct to the temples without applying pressure.

description:
YOUTH LAB Retinol Reboot Eye Serum 15ml provides a global anti-aging effect to the delicate eye area. First and foremost, this eye treatment is part of the  Retinol Reboot  collection, a line of products that resorts to a new generation of Vitamin A in order to recharge cellular functions. In fact, this composition promises to improve the cellular renewal process without causing irritation. As a result, the Retinol Reboot Eye Serum is efficient when it comes to reducing lines, wrinkles, crow's feet and even loss of firmness.
To complement this action, this rejuvenating formula equally focuses on improving both hydration and radiance. By targeting an uneven skin tone and dryness as well, the Retinol Reboot Eye Serum delivers a beautiful awaken look that displays extra plumpness and also luminosity.
Finally, the Retinol Reboot Eye Serum comes in a smart and luxurious airtight packaging that avoids contamination, dehydration and also the oxidation of the cream from air exposure and contact with hands.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply YOUTH LAB Retinol Reboot Eye Serum 15ml at night on the skin around your eyes.

description: It'S Skin Hyaluronic Acid Moisture Eye Cream 25ml moisturizes deeply and restores the vitality of a delicate facial section. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid as well as Acerola Fruit Extract, this aims to repair the skin's natural defensive barrier against external threats. In fact, its antioxidant ingredients are rich sources of Vitamin C while the formula is fast-absorbing, penetrating vulnerable tissues easily. Moreover, this targets initial aging signs around the eye areas such as crow's feet, dark circles, or lid creases, minimizing them for a more youthful look. Hence, it delicately smoothes fine lines or wrinkles if used on a daily basis, unraveling dewy as well as softer skin. Ideal for dehydrated or dull complexions, a moderate amount introduces unprecedented revitalization!
how_to_use:
How to use
After using the same range's toner, apply a suitable portion of It'S Skin Hyaluronic Acid Moisture Eye Cream 25ml. Then, massage the formula around the eye area, gently tapping for better absorption from the eyelid all the away around the under-eye section. Finally, explore the rest of the Hyaluronic Acid Moisture options to see if these also appeal to you!

description:
Elizabeth Arden Advanced Ceramide Lift and Firm Eye Cream 15ml is an anti-aging cream for the delicate eye contour area. This eye cream features 3D FIT Technology that combines Ceramides, Tetrapeptides, and Edelweiss Extract. With this in mind, this product firms and lifts given the presence of Ceramides and Tetrapeptides. These ingredients will strengthen the thin skin around the eyes for a visibly firmer look. Then, Red Algae intensely hydrates the skin by providing lasting hydration. Lastly, the Edelweiss extract tightens and tones the skin for a more sculpted look.
Furthermore, this eye moisturizer contains five times the ceramides of the original formulas for an advanced correction. As a matter of fact, 99% of the users saw a reduction in lines, wrinkles, and crow's feet in just two weeks. Not only does it reduce these aging signs in the eye area but also reduces signs of fatigue, dark circles, and puffiness. Meanwhile, it provides all-day hydration despite its fast-absorbing lightweight texture. All in all, this eye cream addresses all concerns of this area, contributing to a lifted, firmer and youthful look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Elizabeth Arden Advanced Ceramide Lift and Firm Eye Cream 15ml  around the eye area. For the best results, pat it gently with your ring finger and emphasize the massage on the outer corner.

description:
Biotherm Life Plankton Anti-Aging Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) is able to reduce and prevent signs of tiredness and premature aging in all skin types of all ages. With an intensely hydrating composition, this eye cream provides, first of all, a comforting nourishing feeling. Additionally, the Life Plankton Eye Cream proves to be efficient when it comes to counteracting evidence of fatigue like puffiness, eye bags and dark circles.  
Last but definitely not least, this eye cream inhibits premature aging by using the power of Life Plankton™ to boost the skin’s self-regenerating processes. In fact, this exclusive ingredient not only reinforces the skin barrier but also stimulates cell renewal and preserves the skin structure by fighting metabolism slowdown. At the same time, it plays a crucial role in fighting prominent signs of aging such as crow’s feet and wrinkles. The result? According to the brand, with eight days of use, your eye contour will be visibly smoother, brighter and overall younger-looking.  
As a final point, the Life Plankton Eye Cream has a dermatologically and also ophthalmologically tested composition. Suitable for sensitive skin and contact lenses users, this cream has a light texture that supplies a pleasant absorption process.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients 
 
 Life Plankton™ is a natural living ingredient that contains 32 nutrients and has astonishing healing properties. This component is, therefore, able to boost the skin’s vital functions that are essential to its health and quality.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Biotherm Life Plankton Anti-Aging Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) as part of your morning and/or evening routine. Apply it to the clean and dry skin around your eyes. Then, massage carefully for maximum absorption.

description:
Holika Holika Honey Royalactin Intensive Eye Cream 30ml (1.01fl oz) will help you achieve more hydrated, smoother and brighter skin after each application. With a multi-action formula, this eye cream focuses simultaneously on fighting dullness, sagginess and fine lines. It does so through a special composition that blends the natural properties of Honey and Royal Jelly Extract, with the power of the Intensive Triple Care™ system.  
This exclusive technology is made from a mix of Idebenone, Collagen and Peptides and offers a potent rejuvenating action. Besides protecting the skin form damage, it also stimulates collagen production, reduces wrinkles and fine lines and it even brightens dark circles. Therefore, after each application, the Honey Royalactin Intensive Eye Cream takes you one-step closer to younger-looking eyes that display a refreshing awakened look.
how_to_use:
How to use 
 Use Holika Holika Honey Royalactin Intensive Eye Cream 30ml (1.01fl oz) as part of your morning and/or evening skincare routine before your selected moisturizer. Apply to the skin around your eyes. Then, using the fingertips to gently tap the formula in. Avoid the waterline.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products: 
 
 YOUTH LAB Dry Oil 100ml 
 YOUTH LAB Candy Scrub & Mask 50ml 
 YOUTH LAB Peptides Spring Hydra-Gel Eye Patches x2 
Beauty Pouch 

 
 YOUTH LAB Dry Oil  is a nourishing dry oil suitable for the face, body, and hair. This fragrant oil consists of a mixture of vegetable oils and fat-soluble actives which, when combined, moisturize and nourish the skin without creating a greasy or oily finish. The rich formula offers intensive and long-lasting hydration, all the while lending the skin a luscious yet natural-looking glow. When applied regularly, this oil enhances the skin's resilience and protects it against free radicals and premature aging. Read more about  YOUTH LAB Dry Oil  here. 

 YOUTH LAB Candy Scrub & Mask  allows you to rapidly achieve a radiant, refreshed and also smoother skin. Although it is suitable for all skin types it will be ideal for oily and acne-prone skin. Formulated with Perlite granules and Salicylic Acid it provides both mechanical and chemical exfoliation. In synergy, they will deeply exfoliate the skin stimulating cell renewal, which will help even out the complexion, and effectively remove impurities and also release clogged pores. In addition, Salicylic Acid also as anti-inflammatory properties helping prevent imperfections. Its unique formula, not only provides a gentle but deep exfoliation but also, when applied longer, works as a mask. Read more about  YOUTH LAB Candy Scrub & Mask  here. 

 YOUTH LAB Peptides Spring Hydra-Gel Eye Patches  are hydrogel patches that refresh, hydrate and rejuvenate the eyes all the while reducing signs of fatigue. Suitable for all skin types and even for sensitive skin, this treatment replenishes the eye area in just 20 minutes. Read more about  YOUTH LAB Peptides Spring Hydra-Gel Eye Patches  here.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description: Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing Eye Cream is a gentle cream that cares for the delicate eye area. Especially formulated for those who are just beginning to spot the first signs of aging around the eyes, this cream aims to hydrate and soften this expressive area. It features eyebright, a botanical ingredient named after its benefits for the eye contour area; it is effective in reducing eye bags and puffiness, therefore creating a relaxed, well-rested appearance. Meanwhile, the second key ingredient in this formula, wild rose seed oil, sinks beautifully into the skin in order to minimize fine lines and wrinkles before they have a chance to take over the eye contour area. Fragrance-free and infused with all the calm that nature has to offer, this eye cream will restore the vitality to the expressive, delicate skin around your eyes; from now you, you'll always look as serene as you feel.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a pearl-size amount of Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing Eye Cream to the eye contour area. Tap gently in order to stimulate absorption.

description: YOUTH LAB CC Complete Cream for Eyes is a pigmented new-technology eye cream that offers a youthful and healthy look with just one gesture. It ensures hydration and elasticity of the eye contour area and reduces crow's feet. It provides natural coverage and a glowing natural look while minimizing the appearance of signs of fatigue. With a natural and discreet finish, this vegan cream is also suitable for men with dark circles, as it discreetly covers and reduces them. Dark circles are visibly reduced by 25% after 60 days of continued use.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of YOUTH LAB CC Complete Cream for Eyes on the eye area on clean skin. May be used with or instead of a concealer.

description: Neostrata Biónica Eye Contour Cream is an eye and lip cream which has an intensive anti-aging action suitable for all skins, especially sensitive skins. This intensive treatment is able to correct dark circles and eye bags and also reduce the appearance of wrinkles on the eye and on the lip contours. This cream is also suitable for improving the recovery after dermatological procedures like blepharoplasty.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Neostrata Biónica Eye Contour Cream daily, morning and evening around the eyes, with a light massage.

description: Dr. Hauschka Eye Revive Ampoules helps any skin type to regain its vitality and reduce signs of tiredness, particularly around the eyes. In other words, it is normal with a busy day to day this area of ​​the face gets more signs of tiredness such as puffyness, dull or red skin. In this way, this eye cream helps soothe the skin and comforts eyes exposed to pollutants and irritants. In addition, it hydrates the skin, revitalizes it, relaxes and refreshes. All this thanks to its composition with natural ingredients such as extracts of eyebright, fennel, chamomile and black tea. Furthermore, it is these ingredients that help provide a cooling refreshment for tired eyes. Finally, this vegan eye cream is dermatologically tested and suitable for sensitive skin, for contact lens wearers and those who work regularly at a computer screen.
how_to_use:
How to use
To apply Dr. Hauschka Eye Revive Ampoules you have to twist the top from an ampoule and thoroughly moisten a cosmetic pad. Pull the cosmetic pad apart (top and bottom sections) and place over closed eyelids. Allow the preparation to work for approximately ten minutes.

description:
Uriage Toléderm Control Fresh Soothing Eyecare is a minimalist eye cream that soothes, moisturizes and protects the delicate skin around the eyes. Ideal for sensitive, intolerant and/or hyper-reactive skin, this lightweight formula provides efficient care with a natural formula. Featuring 97% of natural ingredients, it is so gentle on the skin that is also suitable for contact lens wearers.
More than soothing the skin, the formula also helps to reduce the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. The secret is the combination of three natural actives. A base of Uriage Thermal Water, naturally rich in mineral salts and trace elements, contributes to soothe the skin and helps to relieve discomfort. At the same time, algae polyuronides and plant squalane contribute to strengthening the skin's barrier, promoting smooth and healthy skin. Apply it to improve the condition of your skin, soothe irritation and sensitivity as well as reduce the appearance of signs of fatigue.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Uriage Toléderm Control Fresh Soothing Eyecare onto the area around the eyes. In order to achieve the best results, pat the product delicately with your ring finger.

description: Elizabeth Arden Advanced Daily Youth Restoring Eye Serum is a concentrate to significantly reduce fine lines and wrinkles, puffiness, and also to restore firmness to the under-eye area. The skin around your eyes is the thinnest and more delicate, hence deserving the best care to keep your eyes looking youthful. A concentrate of powerful vitamins, such as Vitamin A & E, but also Tsubaki oil rich in Oleic Acid, Vitamins A, B, D & E, and nourishing Omegas 3, 6 & 9, provide what it is needed for an under-eye area visibly rejuvenated. This comfortable texture is not only effective, but also extremely hydrating and nourishing.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, open your capsules by twisting the tab around twice. Secondly, apply Elizabeth Arden Advanced Daily Youth Restoring Eye Serum onto your fingertips and pat it gently around the eye area with your ring finger. Work the product starting in the inner corner and moving outwards. External use only, do not ingest.

description: YOUTH LAB Wrinkles Erasure Cream for Eyes is a rich vegan cream formulated specifically for the delicate eye area. It reduces the appearance of crow's feet, smoothes down wrinkles and fine lines due to the presence of New Technology Hexapeptide (Receptor Uphold against BioAging), Stem Cells plant extract, and bio-mimetic Amino Acids, which fill wrinkles and instantly moisturize the eye contour area. This unique formula also reconstructs the natural skin barrier and improves micro and lymphatic circulation of the lower eyelid area, minimizing the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. Squalene, Vitamin E and Abyssinian oil extract restore the skin’s elasticity and secure its moisture, restoring radiance and softness to the delicate eye contour area.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply YOUTH LAB Wrinkles Erasure Cream for Eyes daily to the eye contour area after cleansing. Gently pat a small amount onto the brow bone and beneath the eye.

description:
Evolve Hyaluronic Eye Complex 10ml (0.34fl oz) is a lightweight eye serum with a powerful 3-in-1 action. Because the eye contour area is usually the first to show signs of aging and fatigue, this serum is specially formulated to provide holistic benefits; not only does it brighten dark circles, but it also helps drain puffy eyes and minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The formula contains hyaluronic acid, to provide an instant boost of hydration while also improving the appearance of wrinkles. Combined with Tuberose Stem Cells it helps reduce the appearance of eye bags, fine lines, and puffiness while also brightening and giving firmness to the eye area. In addition, Cucumber Extract helps cool and soothe the skin.
As for the packaging, it features a metal rollerball that works with synergy with these powerful ingredients to drain and de-puff the eyes. At the same time, the metal provides a pleasant, refreshing sensation, offering instant comfort and relief whenever you need it!
how_to_use:
How to use
Shake well in order to distribute the product around the rollerball. Then, apply Evolve Hyaluronic Eye Complex 10ml (0.34fl oz) gently to the previously cleansed skin of the eye contour area. There is no need to layer on too much product; a thin film will provide all the benefits without creating a sticky finish. You may also apply this product throughout the day if you feel to need to refresh your eye contour.

description:
coxir Vita C Bright Eye Cream 30ml (1.01floz) is an eye cream designed to hydrate and brighten the delicate eye area, targeting the common concern of dark circles. This cream's formula is infused with vitamin C, a powerful antioxidant known for its ability to protect the skin against free radical damage and enhance the skin's radiance. So, it works to illuminate dark circles, promoting a more energized and vibrant look. The benefits of vitamin C are amplified with the addition of vitamin E, another antioxidant that supports skin health by fighting off free radicals. This combination ensures the skin around the eyes remains resilient against environmental stressors. Last but not least, niacinamide further enhances the formula by addressing darkness under the eyes, thanks to its ability to target hyperpigmentation. It also helps improve the skin barrier, contributing to maintaining hydration and overall skin health.
In essence, this eye cream not only helps maintain hydrated skin but also helps energize and illuminate the eye area, delivering a more revitalized appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of coxir Vita C Bright Eye Cream 30ml (1.01floz) onto the skin of the undereye area. Then, gently tap using your ring finger until the product fully absorbs.

description:
Dr. Botanicals Miracle Serum Rose & Lavendar Super Strength Anti-Ageing Eye Serum 15ml (0.51 fl oz) is a powerful serum that resorts to the power of nature to provide the delicate eye area with multiple benefits. That said, at the heart of this incredible formula lies the power of Rose and Lavender extracts. On one hand, Rose water increases skin vitality and helps rejuvenate the eye area. Lavender essential oil, on the other hand, soothes the skin and helps diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. This serum also contains Apricot Kernel oil and Grapeseed oil with both nourishing and antioxidant benefits. With this in mind, the antioxidant-rich formula provides protection from free radicals.
Besides, with regular use, this serum promotes a visible reduction in the appearance of dark circles, puffiness, and wrinkles. In this way, it helps reveal a brighter, more youthful, and vibrant eye area. As a last note, this serum contains a vegan and natural formula with 89,6% ingredients of natural origin. In conclusion, you can rely on the botanical wonders of this serum to deeply hydrate and protect the eye area.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Botanicals Miracle Serum Rose & Lavendar Super Strength Anti-Ageing Eye Serum 15ml (0.51 fl oz) to the eye contour in the morning and evening routine. Distribute evenly using your ring finger and light pressure.

description: Elizabeth Arden Moisturizing Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a luxurious skincare solution designed specifically for the eye area. Indeed, this incredible product is infused with a potent blend of ingredients that work to provide the delicate skin of this area with multiple benefits. To begin with, it boasts the power of an Advanced Filagronil Complex, Moisturizing Liposomes and Glycerin, to provide intense moisture. In addition, it features the anti-aging properties of Retinyl Linoleate and Peptides to create a rejuvenated appearance. And last but not least, the formula contains Vitamin C and Haloxyl which work to reduce dark circles and illuminate the eye area. In this way, this moisture-rich infusion helps to restore the skin's natural moisture barrier, promoting long-lasting hydration and preventing future moisture loss. At the same time, it targets dark circles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Elizabeth Arden Moisturizing Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) to the eye area and pat gently.

description: Collistar Perfecta Plus Eye Contour Perfection Cream is a prodigious eye cream that combines three functions in one. In a single gesture, it conceals dark circles, drains eye bags and puffiness, and creates a gentle lifting effect that awakens and revitalizes the eye contour area. Formulated with two exclusive complexes, Face-Rebuilding Complex® and BeautyfEye™, as well as universal color pigments that suit every skin tone, this is the ultimate ally for those who don't want a busy lifestyle to show on their face.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Collistar Perfecta Plus Eye Contour Perfection Cream to the eye contour area, both above and below the eye. Tap gently with the fingertips in order to facilitate the absorption of the product into the skin.

description: Elizabeth Arden Prevage Anti-Aging Eye Cream SPF15 is a multi-purpose product that targets signs of aging, as well as hydrates and protects the eye area from sun damage and environmental threats. This nourishing formula combines antioxidants, a botanical blend and also encapsulated sunscreen for a complete result. This creamy formula helps not only to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles, but also to reduce puffiness and promoting a firmer-looking skin. Free radicals are a real threat nowadays, since we are daily exposed to pollution and stress on urban centers. This is the essential shield to fight free-radicals and prevent future signs of aging.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, cleanse and tone your skin. Secondly, apply a small amount of Elizabeth Arden Prevage Anti-Aging Eye Cream SPF15 around the eye area in the morning, before sun exposure. To enhance results and comfort, apply your favorite eye serum first.

description:
Darphin Prédermine Wrinkle Corrective Eye Contour Cream 15ml (0.5floz) replaces Darphin Eye Care Wrinkle Corrective Eye Contour Cream, keeping the same formula. This eye cream offers a potent anti-aging action, targeting wrinkles as well as fine lines or crow's feet. For that purpose, the formula features a blend of core ingredients that includes Magnolia, Sigesbeckia, Hyaluronic Filling Spheres, Acetyl Glucosamine, and Acetyl Hexapeptide-8. All these ingredients work together to help smooth lines and wrinkles, leaving the skin softer and smoother. In addition, this silky-soft cream also boosts skin radiance around the eye area for a rejuvenated appearance. 
Therefore, this corrective eye cream fights skin aging signs around the eye area. If you're looking to achieve hydrated, nourished, and supple skin for a youthful look, this cream is worth giving a try.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small portion of Darphin Prédermine Wrinkle Corrective Eye Contour Cream 15ml (0.5floz) by gently dabbing the product onto the eye contour area and along the eyebrow arch. Distribute it from the inside to the outside of the eye, following the curve of the orbital bone.

description:
Sophieskin Be Young Glamour Contour 15ml (0.51 fl oz) is a vegan eye cream that tackles dark circles and signs of aging around the eye area, ridding it of expression lines. As such, it restores skin firmness and elasticity while plumping it up and filling it with volume. Moreover, it is great to diminish first wrinkles but also repair deep ones.
Due to the RETIXPERT active-ingredient complex present in its formula, it provides antioxidant action and boosts collagen production. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to stimulate its synthesis. Additionally, this cream has an anti-fatigue effect so that the skin feels renewed and revitalized. In the end, it is water resistant so it can be used by the pool or when practicing sports.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sophieskin Be Young Glamour Contour 15ml (0.51 fl oz) in the morning and evening, on previously cleansed skin. Firstly, take a small amount and apply with the fingertips to the eye contour area. Then, tap gently from the inside outwards so the product spreads evenly. Finally, let it absorb.

description: Juvena Master Care MasterCream Eye & Lip 20ml (0.7 oz) is suitable to protect the most sensitive areas of the skin, the eyes and lips. It leaves the skin rejuvenated and restored with its anti-aging properties. Besides providing intense moisturizing, the cream tackles fine lines and wrinkles. On top of that, it attenuates puffiness and evens the skin tone. In the end, it visually improves the quality of the skin and smooths the skin texture. It has been dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested, so it ensures the best treatment.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Juvena Master Care MasterCream Eye & Lip 20ml (0.7 oz) whenever necessary to the eye and lip contours. Then gently massage it. Let it absorb.

description:
Guerlain Abeille Royale Multi-Wrinkle Minimizer Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a luxurious honeyed eye cream designed to minimize wrinkles. From fine lines to frown lines, say goodbye to fatigued skin! This cream restores the youthfulness of the skin, reducing anything from dark circles to under-eye bags. Erasing and preventing their development are the keys. Therefore, the skin is soft and smooth.
This cream, made with 93% naturally-derived ingredients, has been clinically tested and the results are clear. Firstly, 43% indicate their eye are is more plumped. Secondly, under-eye bags, crow's feet and frown lines are reduced by 26%, 25% and 21%, respectively.
The making-off of this cream has been deeply researched to ensure a highly effective result. The secret of Guerlain Abeille Royale Multi-Wrinkle Minimizer Eye Cream lies in its Blackbee Eye Repair Technology, rich in different types of honey and exclusive royal jelly, which stimulates skin repairing processes from wrinkle to loss of firmness correction.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Guerlain Abeille Royale Multi-Wrinkle Minimizer Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) in the morning and/or evening. Firstly, to obtain a radiant eye contour, apply under the outer corner of the eye and pat gently from the outside to the inside. Then, move upwards towards the eyebrow and repeat the process from the inside out. Finish with a massage in a circular motion on the temples and repeat the process twice. Secondly, to smooth and even out frown lines, sweep the fingertips across the frown tines from bottom to top. Repeat the process six times. Thirdly, to energize the eye contour area, place the palms of the hands under each eye and smooth from the inside corner to the outside. Finally, if you wish for an intensive mask-like effect, you should apply a thick layer of the cream at night and leave it on without rinsing.

description: Sisley Paris Eye and Lip Contour Balm 30ml (1 fl oz) is a high-end balm that deeply moisturizes and smoothes the eye and lip areas. Due to its formula rich in natural plant extracts, it protects these delicate parts of the face. For instance, the decongesting Witch Hazel and the stimulating Tomato Extracts present in the formula, reduce under-eye puffiness while also correcting wrinkles and fine lines. As it moisturizes and hydrates the face it combats skin dryness. As a result, it leaves the skin around the eyes and lips soft and fresh. Due to its light and fresh gel texture and thanks to the spatula that comes with the balm, it applies easily and provides moments of comfort, leaving the skin soft. Additionally, its transparent texture makes its application convenient, as you can carry on with your day as soon as you apply it. In the end, this balm creates a special well-being moment in the skincare routine for both the face and mind. Expect a revitalized look!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sisley Paris Eye and Lip Contour Balm 30ml (1 fl oz) preferably in the morning on previously cleansed and dry skin, before any other product. Take a small amount of the balm with the help of the spatula, and smooth it lightly around the eyes and lips with the fingertips.

description:
Sisley Paris Supremÿa At Night The Supreme Anti-Aging Eye Serum 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a high-end night cream dedicated to rejuvenating the skin around the eyes. It mostly focuses on attenuating the signs of aging such as the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines.
It is during the night that the skin is able to rest and regenerate naturally. Due to Phyto-Complex LC12, a 12-hour longevity concentrate, this cream works wonders overnight. At the same time, its formula is made of ingredients such as Açai and Yeast extract which visibly reduce puffiness and dark circles. Additionally, Soy Peptide Extract acts on sagginess and restores firmness to this area.
Thanks to its light and creamy texture, it applies easily, providing moments of comfort that leave the skin soft. In the end, this night cream creates a special well-being moment in the skincare routine for both the skin and the mind!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply in the evening. First, apply one pump of Sisley Paris Supremÿa At Night The Supreme Anti-Aging Eye Serum 15ml (0.5 fl oz) on the fingertip and use half of the product for one eye and the rest for the other. Apply it at the crease of the eyelid and under the eyes, going from the inner to the outer corner. Then, let it absorb.

description:
StriVectin Multi-Action R&R Eye Cream is the antidote for the aging or fatigue signs around the eyes.
Environmental damage, long stressful days and lack of sleep all have a toll on the skin. The first signs that your skin might need some attention and gentle love are usually the eye bags and dark circles around the eyes. Following them, you may also find puffiness, sagging, and even skin dehydration. Not to worry, StriVectin developed a high-performance Eye Cream that visibly improves these signs while nurturing and protecting the skin. After continual use, the aging signs, such as the wrinkles and crow’s feet, showed visible improvement, alongside the skin’s puffiness.
With an expert blend of ingredients such as Hyaluronic Acid, Peptides, and NIA-114™, the skin regains its health and youthful back. No more dark circles and signs of dehydration, just a firm, toned and bright skin complexion.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply StriVectin Multi-Action R&R Eye Cream on already clean and dry skin, around the eye area, and including the orbital bone. Gently tap the cream with your ring finger until the skin fully absorbs it.

description:
StriVectin Super-C Dark Circle Brightening Eye Serum is a refreshing gel-serum that boosts the skin’s glow while visibly improving under-eye dark circles.
Dark circles are both one of the most common skin concerns and one of the most difficult to treat and improve. They can be cool-toned, blue, or violet, due to stress and fatigue, or warm-toned, such as brown, thanks to discoloration. Either way, they are relentless in our skin, and lifestyle and aging factors tend to worsen their look. Queue an eye serum rich in Vitamin C and other powerful botanical extracts, formulated specifically to correct both cool and warm dark circles. Lightweight and non-greasy, the skin easily absorbs it, leaving behind no residues but a brighten and more firm skin complexion.
Just one daily pump and voila, your skin will look more radiant and feel suppler and healthier with this quick treatment.
how_to_use:
How to use
Gently pat a small amount of StriVectin Super-C Dark Circle Brightening Eye Serum around your orbital bone using your fingertips.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Extra Intensive 10 Min Pads x20 promise to contribute to visibly revitalized, youthful and smooth skin in just 10 minutes. Specially developed for both the eye and lip contour, these innovative pads are able to offer instant results and tackle multiple concerns. On one side, this product works as an energy shot that instantly increases radiance and luminosity for a refreshed appearance. At the same time, the Extra Intensive 10 Min Pads prove to be efficient in addressing signs of aging such as wrinkles, fine lines and loss of firmness. Last but definitely not least, these pads are perfect to enjoy a deep moisturizing effect that provides silky skin to the touch. 
To summarize, resort to this multipurpose product every time you are in need of a boost of nourishment and vitality.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply SENSAI Cellular Performance Extra Intensive 10 Min Pads x20 by placing the pads on the eye or lip contour. Then, let it act for 10 minutes. Finally, remove the pad carefully and massage the remaining formula.

description:
SENSAI Ultimate The Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) brings the spark back into the eyes by lessening puffiness, dark circles, and even aging lines.
Thinner and softer than in any other area, the skin around the eyes needs a gentler type of care. With that in mind, SENSAI developed a nurturing and soft balm to brighten the eye area without causing irritation or abrasions. Packed full of stellar ingredients such as Niacinimide or Squalane, this eye cream aids in lessening puffiness and dark circles, for a youthful and rested look. Additionally, SENSAI’s proprietary Koishimaru Silk helps reduce early aging signs, such as fine lines or crow’s feet, by plumping the skin and boosting its elasticity.
As the eyes and the skin around them look increasingly more radiant and softer, so too will your whole complexion. Gentle care has that effect on the skin. And, since one of the secrets of youthfulness rests all in the eyes, their glow only adds beauty and magnetism to your face.
how_to_use:
How to use
After moisturizing the skin, apply SENSAI Ultimate The Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) around the eye area, gently tapping it with your fingertips until the skin fully absorbs it.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Wrinkle Repair Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) was specially developed to efficiently reduce deep lines and wrinkles around the eyes. With an innovative anti-aging approach, this eye treatment supplies deep moisture while easing the impressions that come with age. It does so, by accelerating the natural collagen turnover cycle and, therefore, ensuring a continuous and ample supply of fresh collagen. In other words, the Wrinkle Repair Eye Cream is able to improve not only the quantity but also the quality of collagen. As a result, the eye contour looks visibly smoother and firmer, as if years have been lifted away.  
Finally, the Wrinkle Repair Eye Cream has a creamy and pleasant texture that provides comfort through an easy application. The rich consistency blends easily into the skin, offering an instant calming effect, at the same time.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Wrinkle Repair Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) as part of your morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the eye contour. Then, tap gently for optimal absorption.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Lift Remodelling Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) is a potent anti-aging solution that focuses on creating a brighter ad plumper appearance on the delicate eye area. While most anti-aging formulas address mainly fine lines and wrinkles, this innovative composition targets the overall condition of the skin around the inner eye area. In fact, with age comes the loss of volume and the deterioration of microcirculation, which causes a hollowness from the inner eye to the cheek. This process creates a dark triangle appearance that affects the overall facial look. To counteract this, the Cellular Performance Lift Remodelling Eye Cream has plumping and boosting properties that strengthen and build up the skin's substance from within.  
Furthermore, this product also comes with an ergonomic massager that not only enhances the performance of the eye cream but also promotes blood flow.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Lift Remodelling Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) as the last step of your routine. First, apply an appropriate amount of formula around the eyes. Then, massage the upper and lower eyelids with your fingertips. Plus, with a back-and-forth motion, massage around the inner corner of the eyes. After this application, use the included massager. Resort to the lateral side of the massager’s head to stimulate the upper and lower eyelid at the inner corner. Next, glide the massager down the side of the nose. Finally, use the tip of the head to apply pressure to several points around the eyes.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Lifting Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) is a firming and refining cream that was specially developed to address the loss of firmness in the delicate eye area. As it happens, this smooth formula is able to boost the elasticity levels of the muscles, activating their energy metabolism, as well. Consequently, the facial contours look more tightened and supported. Like so, it is the perfect addition to the routine of those with a tendency to over-eyelids.  
In addition to all of this, the Cellular Performance Lifting Eye Cream proves to be equally effective when it comes to addressing signs of fatigue. Its revitalizing composition reduces the look of dark circles while providing optimal nourishment.  
Introduce this anti-aging solution as the final step of your routine using the SENSAI’s original massage method - a swift and easy way to maximize the product's efficacy.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Lifting Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) as the last step of your morning and evening routine. Apply by using the SENSAI’s original massage method. Start by pressing firmly and moving slowly outwards to the temples. Then, pinch the skin several times above and below the eyes.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Eye Contour Balm 15ml (0.52 oz) is a multipurpose treatment that promises to care for your delicate eye area in the mornings and evenings. In fact, with a fresh and light consistency, this cream blends easily on the skin and is especially beneficial for warm temperatures.  
To begin with, the Cellular Performance Eye Contour Cream is able to soothe and prevent irritation thanks to its anti-inflammatory properties. At the same time, this eye cream equally targets puffiness, reducing the appearance of dark circles, as well.  
Last but definitely not least, the Cellular Performance Eye Contour Cream proves to be efficient in reducing signs of aging. As part of the basic anti-aging line by SENSAI, this product smoothes, firms and illuminates the skin for a younger-looking result.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Eye Contour Balm 15ml (0.52 oz) as part of your morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the eye contour, tapping gently for optimal absorption.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Eye Contour Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) is a multipurpose treatment that promises to care for your delicate eye area in the mornings and evenings. In fact, with a rich and velvety consistency, this cream blends easily on the skin and is especially beneficial for dry complexions or when facing cold temperatures.  
To begin with, the Cellular Performance Eye Contour Cream is able to soothe and prevent irritation thanks to its anti-inflammatory properties. At the same time, this eye cream equally targets puffiness, reducing the appearance of dark circles, as well.  
Last but definitely not least, the Cellular Performance Eye Contour Cream proves to be efficient in reducing signs of aging. As part of the basic anti-aging line by SENSAI, this product smoothes, firms and illuminates the skin for a younger-looking result.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Eye Contour Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) as part of your morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the eye contour, tapping gently for optimal absorption.

description: Elizabeth Arden Prevage Anti-Aging + Intensive Repair Eye Serum is the secret to significantly reduce signs of aging around the eyes. Dark circles and puffiness are reduced, and at the same time, wrinkles are smoothed and the skin is firmer, hence promoting a younger look. This award-winner product is a blend of potent ingredients, from antioxidants to hyaluronic acid, that delivers an easy to use and effective solution for the main concerns to the eye area. Clinical tests showed that more than 76% of women saw a reduction of deep expression lines appearance and also noticed that eyes had a lifted look. Additionally, 81% noticed a reduction in the look of persistent under-eye bags. Add it to your facial routine to treat the most delicate area of the face and achieve the best results following the recommended application technics.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with, push the pump once to get the amount you need for both eyes. Apply Elizabeth Arden Prevage Anti-Aging + Intensive Repair Eye Serum using the ring finger to massage it on the brow bone, upper eyelid and complete eye area before your favorite eye cream.

description:
Missha Bee Pollen Renew Eye Ampouler 30ml (1.01fl oz) has a gentle formula perfectly designed for the eye contour. Namely, this cream works as a two-in-one product as it works on wrinkles and fine lines while brightening the entire eye area. In turn, it reveals a more youthful, radiant and hydrated skin. Furthermore, this is possible thanks to the presence of 50% of Bee Pollen which has shown proven improvements in skin elasticity. On the other hand, this ingredient revitalizes the tired skin around the eyes thanks to its strong antioxidant action. In this way, dark circles and puffiness are also prevented.
Furthermore, this composition also has the presence of Propolis Extract which improves blood circulation and provides a restorative and tonic effect throughout this area. Meanwhile, Edelweiss Callus Extract improves the overall appearance of the skin by diminishing signs of fatigue and evening out the skin tones. Thus, darker dark circles are easily revitalized. Finally, a strong presence of Niacinamide is equally responsible for fighting redness, irritation, and inflammation. Moreover, this component helps to reduce fine lines, wrinkles, puffiness, and dryness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Missha Bee Pollen Renew Eye Ampouler 30ml (1.01fl oz) around the eyes and massage gently with your ring finger until the product is absorbed into the skin.

description:
La Prairie Platinum Rare Haute-Rejuvenation Eye Elixir 15ml works as a rejuvenating serum that restores, smooths and comforts the whole eye area. As part of the La Prairie Platinum Rare range, this unique formula aims to address all major visible signs of aging while supplying nourishment. Like the remaining line, the Haute-Rejuvenation Eye Elixir resorts to precious Platinum as its star ingredient, harnessing the anti-aging benefits of this component to repair youthfulness.  

In fact, by addressing key rejuvenation processes in the skin layers, the Haute-Rejuvenation Eye Elixir is able to not only reduce lines and wrinkles but also protect the levels of firmness. Even more, this product proves to be also efficient in addressing signs of fatigue. On one side, it supplies a gentle tensing effect that immediately lifts the whole area. At the same time, it smooths out imperfections and delivers extra luminosity.  

As a last note, the Haute-Rejuvenation Eye Elixir has a fluid and pleasant texture that blends effortlessly on the skin through a luxurious experience. Introduce it to your morning and evening skincare ritual before applying your selected eye cream.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use La Prairie Platinum Rare Haute-Rejuvenation Eye Elixir 15ml as part of your morning and evening routine before your eye cream. Before opening, press the pump on the top of the vial’s lid a few times to draw up the serum into the pipette. Then, dot the formula under the eye, moving from the inner to the outer corner. Continue moving up to the temples and back along the brow bone to the inner corner. Finish by dotting between brows. To conclude, massage the whole area with gentle press-and-roll motions. Complement its action with the remaining La Prairie Platinum Rare collection.

description:
Codex Labs Antü Brightening Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) improves the overall appearance of the eye area addressing dryness and signs of fatigue simultaneously. Enriched with a powerful blend of firming, stimulating, and rejuvenating ingredients, this gel-cream offers a cooling and brightening effect with each application. In fact, the Antü Brightening Eye Cream proves to be effective when it comes to not only reducing dark circles and puffiness but also achieving a more even skin tone. Furthermore, this lightweight composition has notable hydrating properties contributing as well to plump and soft-looking skin.   
As a last note, this eye cream is part of the Antü collection, a line of products that focuses on protecting and repairing the skin from environmental exposure. By restoring and strengthening the natural barrier, the Antü Brightening Eye Cream shields the skin from pollution and other external aggressors.  

To conclude, the Antü Brightening Eye Cream has a vegan composition and is certificated as a cruelty-free product by the Leaping Bunny Program.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Codex Labs Antü Brightening Eye Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) as part of your regular morning and evening skincare routine. Apply a plump to clean fingers. Then, gently tap the formula under the eyes starting at the outer corner and moving inwards. Discover the remaining Antü Collection to improve your results.

description: Estée Lauder Re-Nutriv Ultimate Lift Regenerating Eye Cream is a luxurious treatment that visibly rejuvenates the eye area. The golden packaging perfectly mirrors the luxurious experience provided with a wonderfully balanced formula. The texture feels soft as velvet, creating a truly satisfying moment within every application. Two precious flowers that resist the most challenging environments, the parched highlands of Brazil and the frigid Himalayas, coupled with Re-Nutriv science, offer undeniable anti-aging results. To push the results one step further, the formula also has Hyaluronic Acid and Acetyl Glucosamine. These are skin-identical ingredients that improve hydration and moisturize, while helping to minimize the wrinkles' appearance. As an important anti-aging ingredient, Argireline is added to specifically address wrinkles caused by facial muscle movement. Argireline is an effective ingredient to minimize the wrinkles' depth, achieving impressive results often compared with cosmetic procedures. Equally important, the Milk Peptide Complex improves wrinkle-reducing results, while also improves firmness.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with your morning and evening regimen, thoroughly cleanse and tone the skin. The following step is to apply your facial serum and moisturizer. Lastly, apply Estée Lauder Re-Nutriv Ultimate Lift Regenerating Eye Cream gently to the eye area with your ring finger.

description: Estée Lauder Re-Nutriv Ultimate Lift Regenerating Eye Creme Rich 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a luxurious treatment that visibly rejuvenates the eye area. The golden packaging perfectly mirrors the luxurious experience provided with a perfectly balanced formula. The texture feels rich and nourishing, providing deep comfort to dry skin and creating a truly satisfying moment within every application. Two precious flowers that resist to the most challenging environments, the parched highlands of Brazil and the frigid Himalayas, coupled with Re-Nutriv science, present undeniable anti-aging results. Additionally, Hyaluronic Acid and Acetyl Glucosamine are skin-identical ingredients that improve hydration and moisturize, while helps to minimize wrinkles' appearance. As an important anti-aging ingredient, Argireline is added to specifically address wrinkles caused by facial muscle movement. Argireline is an effective ingredient to minimize wrinkles depth, due to its filler-like effect. Equally important, the Milk Peptide Complex takes wrinkle-reducing results a step further, while also improving firmness.
how_to_use:
How to use
To begin with your morning and evening regimen, thoroughly cleanse and tone the skin. The following step is to apply your facial serum and moisturizer. Lastly, apply Estée Lauder Re-Nutriv Ultimate Lift Regenerating Eye Creme Rich 15ml (0.51fl oz) gently to the eye area with your ring finger.

description:
Collistar Rigenera Smoothing Anti-Wrinkle Eye Contour 15ml (0.51fl oz) is specifically designed to combat signs of age around the eyes. That said, this luxurious gel-cream has an extremely light yet nourishing formula that regenerates the skin. At the same time, it gives you a rejuvenating effect by reducing wrinkles and fine lines around the eyes. Thus, this region of the face ends up looking younger, more relaxed, and even more awake.
The composition of this eye cream has active ingredients inspired by the science of bioregeneration. Specifically, it has super low molecular weight Hyaluronic Acid and two Biomimetic Peptides. These end up penetrating the skin very easily, stimulating cell regeneration in the lower layers of the epidermis and filling in the wrinkles from within. Furthermore, Meristematic Italian Echinacea cells repairs the skin's barrier and stimulates collagen production thus giving a rejuvenated appearance to the eye contour. Finally, thanks to exclusive Targeted Active Technology®, this cream encapsulates the ingredients and delivers them where needed, ensuring they penetrate deep down for optimal results. All in all, this cream ensures a visibly smoother and younger-looking eye contour day after day while hydrating, nourishing, and smoothing the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of Collistar Rigenera Smoothing Anti-Wrinkle Eye Contour 15ml (0.51fl oz) to the upper and lower eye contour morning and evening, massaging in gently.

description:
Biotherm Aquasource Total Eye Revitalizer Gel 15ml (0.51fl oz) is a best-selling eye cream that instantly provides an awakened and revitalized look thanks to its refreshing formula. In fact, with just one product, you will be able to tackle multiple concerns that are keeping you from flaunting radiant and fresh eyes. First and foremost, the Aquasource Total Eye Revitalizer provides a pleasant cooling effect that immediately counteracts bags, puffiness and signs of tiredness. Furthermore, its advanced composition contains a combination of different ingredients that prove to be efficient when it comes to fighting dark circles. Due to a mix of Vitamin C, Illuminating Micro Pearls and Cherry Blossom, after each application, the eyes will be visibly lighter and rejuvenated.
Last but not least, the Total Eye Revitalizer shares the same hydrating power as the rest of the Aquasource line. Formulated with hydrating agents, this eye cream targets dehydration lines, contributing, therefore, to a smoother and plumper result.
Finally, this composition has an ultra-light texture that instantly melts on the skin and creates a natural and silky finish. Dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested, this product is suitable for all skin types and contact lens wearers.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Biotherm Aquasource Total Eye Revitalizer Gel 15ml (0.51fl oz) to your eye area every morning and evening. Massage the formula in, moving from the inside outwards.

description:
The Saem Urban Eco Harakeke Deep Moisture Eye Cream 30ml (1.01fl oz) has a concentrated formula that focuses on revitalizing the eye area. If you struggle with dehydrated and tired-looking skin around your eyes, then this product is for you. In fact, this lightweight but powerful cream is able to deliver a shot of energy to the skin and, simultaneously, keep the area nourished for up to 24 hours. The result? A plump and equally radiant complexion with fewer fine lines.
All of these benefits are possible thanks to a potent composition with almost no chemical ingredients. In actuality, this eye cream is part of The Saem Urban Eco Harakeke line, a range of products that uses mostly natural ingredients for mild and ultra-hydrating compositions. Moreover, the main component of this collection is Harakeke, an indigenous plant that only grows in New Zealand. This extract offers three times more hydration than Aloe Vera or Olive Oil and contains many healing agents. Therefore, hand-harvested in a completely eco-friendly way, the Harekeke Extract is able to turn dehydrated skin into a smooth and plump surface.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Apply The Saem Urban Eco Harakeke Deep Moisture Eye Cream 30ml (1.01fl oz) as part of your morning and evening routine, after your selected toner. Gently tap the formula on the skin around your eyes for maximum absorption. Complement its use with other products from the same range for optimal results.

description:
Mizon Collagen Power Firming Eye Cream is a gentle moisturizing cream specifically designed for the eye contour. Its formula is indicated for more mature skin that suffer from some signs of age such as wrinkles and fine lines. In this way, this cream helps not only to prevent but also to fight these already existing signs. The skin is then more hydrated, smoothed, regenerated and more plumped. Furthermore, fine lines and wrinkles are much less visible as the skin becomes firmer and more elastic.
For these benefits to be successful on the skin around the eyes, this cream contains 42% of Marine Collagen in its composition. This ingredient provides the skin with a hydration boost and firming effect thus helping to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. On the other hand, it also has Hyaluronic Acid, a blend of Organic Argan Oil and Adenosine. In the end your eye area skin becomes firmer, nourished and much more hydrated. Finally, this product has an ideal size for you to always take it with you. It is also dermatologically tested and has no alcohol, fragrance and essential oils, making it ideal for all skin types.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a little dot of Mizon Collagen Power Firming Eye Cream around your eyes. Gently pat with your ring finger until the product is absorbed into the skin.

description:
Darphin Intral De-Puffing Anti-Oxidant Eye Cream 15ml is a multipurpose lightweight product specially developed to refresh and also nourish the delicate eye area. This gel-like cream has a multi-action formula that delivers numerous benefits to your skin. On one side, it reduces the appearance of dark circles and swelling offering you a more awake and refreshed look. Simultaneously, it provides soothing hydration as well, nourishing the whole area. Lastly, this eye cream also has an antioxidant effect thanks to the presence of Chamomile, Peony, and Hawthorn in the formula. In fact, the Darphin Intral De-Puffing Anti-Oxidant Eye Cream has 74% of natural ingredients. These botanical components offer much-needed protection against environmental damage to the eye’s delicate skin.
In addition to all of this, we are talking about a product free of parabens. Moreover it sits comfortably on the skin without clogging the pores and is ophthalmologically tested. In a nutshell, the De-Puffing Anti-Oxidant Eye Cream is a safe and easy-to-use product that moisturizes, protects, and improves the look of your eye area, at the same time.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Complex of Three Botanical Extracts (Hawthorn, Peony, and Chamomile) with soothing and calming properties that help to reduce and also prevent irritation.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Darphin Intral De-Puffing Anti-Oxidant Eye Cream 15ml in the morning and at nighttime. Apply gently on the skin around your eyes and massage delicately for maximum absorption. Complement it by introducing other products from the Darphin Intral range into your skincare routine.

description:
Estée Lauder Re-Nutriv Ultimate Diamond Transformative Eye Creme is a deluxe treatment that diminishes the appearance of wrinkles, improves firmness and reduces all signs of fatigue. The precious golden packaging unveils exceptional components and results. The formula is lush and rich, delivering an immediate and incomparable comfort sensation. Equally important, the golden wand provided offers a delightful massaging moment with a refreshing sensation.
The ingredients are as exclusive as they are efficient. The Black Diamond Truffle Extract is the most exquisite ingredient, withholding an unparalleled anti-aging and hydrating power. Identically refined, South Sea Pearl and 24K Gold add unique luminosity to achieve a radiant look. To further support the rejuvenating results, the formula is enriched with Argireline, Hyaluronic Acid and Indian Frankincense Extract. Hyaluronic Acid hydrates and protects the skin, and also enhances water-soluble actives penetration. When it comes to wrinkles, Argireline has impressive results reducing the depth of wrinkles caused by facial muscle movement, almost comparable to a cosmetic procedure. Lastly, the Indian Frankincense Extract protects the skin's natural elastane to improve firmness.
The eyes are the face's most remarkable feature. Keeping its youth, the entire face is enlightened and more radiant. Being that, intensive eye treatment is key to transform your entire skincare results. The massage instantly refreshes and activate your senses, while the formula works exhaustively to deliver visible results, day after day. Add this precious step to your routine, and find the eye area renewed with wrinkles' depth diminished, lifted skin with less puffiness and reduced dark circles.
how_to_use:
How to use
Use Estée Lauder Re-Nutriv Ultimate Diamond Transformative Eye Creme as the last step of your beauty routine. After moisturizing, use the flat end of the applicator provided to dot the product around the eyes, including over and between the brows. Then, tap the product gently using your ring finger. The following step is to massage using the rotating side of the wand while holding it vertically. Firstly, massage under the eyes, beginning on the inner corner and going to the temple. Secondly, glide the wand from the eyebrow and towards the temple. Thirdly, start from the inner corner above the eye and glide along the browbone to the temple. Lastly, move the wand gently from the inner corner under the eye, move around the temple and up above the eyebrow. Then move down under the brow bone and around the outer corner of the eye, returning to the start position. 
Check the images above to find a visual clue.

description: Clinique Moisture Surge Eye 96-Hour Hydro-Filler Concentrate is an ultra-light water-gel that helps the eye contour area re-hydrate itself. This innovative product combines two of Clinique's trademark technologies in the exclusive Auto-Replenishing Liquid-Sphere™ Technology, which keeps the skin hydrated for up to an incredible 96 hours. As a result, the skin is able to restore its own moisture barrier while breaking the cycle of environmental stress that can lead to premature aging. Immediately after application, the skin is re-plumped with moisture, while wrinkles and lines around the eyes become less visible. For an instantly awake and well-rested appearance, this water-gel may also be used as a 3-minute "flash effect" mask.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a pea-size amount of Clinique Moisture Surge Eye 96-Hour Hydro-Filler Concentrate to the eye contour area, then massage lightly. You may also use this product as a 3-minute mask, in order to instantly revitalize and refresh the eye contour.

description:
DR. GRANDEL Nutri Sensation Eye Cream & Mask is a regenerating eye treatment that hydrates the skin around the eyes all the while reducing puffiness and improving firmness. With a comfortable and soft texture, this treatment is suitable for combination to oily skin, including sensitive and reactive skin.
This complete formula resorts to effective ingredients to renew and revitalize the delicate skin around the eyes. Containing Red Algae extract and Contour Firmer complex, the formula smooths the skin while improving firmness. In addition, Raspberry Seed Oil - rich in Vitamin E and Omega-6 - contributes to regenerate the skin and to keep the skin hydrated. With continued use, the formula helps to regenerate and repair the skin around the eyes, minimizing puffiness all the while improving firmness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply the DR. GRANDEL Nutri Sensation Eye Cream & Mask onto cleansed skin. You can use it as your daily cream as well as your regenerating eye mask. To use as your daily treatment, apply a small amount with your ring finger and smooth it onto the eye - and lip - area, massaging gently to improve absorption. In order to use it as a regenerating mask, apply a generous amount around the eyes and allow it 15 minutes before removing the excess product with lukewarm water.

description:
Teaology Kombucha Tea Revitalizing Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a nourishing and fast-absorbing cream that addresses the delicate eye area's specific concerns. This eye cream's ingredients work together to diminish the appearance of dark circles, puffiness, and signs of fatigue, while also offering a filler-like effect. The cream is enriched with Kombucha, a fermented tea with a rich content of probiotics and B vitamins. It helps strengthen the skin and enhance the brightness of the eye contour, smoothing the skin around the eyes and contributing to a more youthful appearance. In addition to Kombucha, the formula includes an infusion of black tea. This is obtained using Teaology's patented Tea Infusion Skincare technology, to harness the maximum beneficial properties of the tea. Black tea is especially rich in antioxidants, such as epigallocatechin (EGCG), which play a role in protecting the skin from free radical damage and environmental stressors and enhancing collagen production.
Then, Niacinamide and Caffeine are also incorporated into the cream. These ingredients work together to rejuvenate the eye area, making it appear more rested and vibrant. They help to brighten the skin, reduce the visibility of dark circles, and depuff eye bags. Furthermore, the eye cream includes a special complex of six herbs that help stimulate collagen production, smooth the skin, and improve skin elasticity. This aids in reducing the appearance of fine lines around the eyes. Last but not least, the cream's yellow color offers a correcting effect, neutralizing the purple of capillaries and dark circles, thus enhancing the overall appearance of the eye area. All in all, this eye cream helps make the eye area rejuvenated, brightened, and revitalized.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply an appropriate amount of Teaology Kombucha Tea Revitalizing Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) onto clean skin of the eye contour. Then, gently massage it using light tapping movements.
