description: BeautyLab Cooling Eye Gel 15ml (0.50 fl oz) is ideal for tired and puffy-looking eyes, since it instantly relieves the skin. Due to the presence of Cucumber in its formula, this gel has an astringent effect that tackles puffiness and fatigue. At the same time, Aloe moisturizes and softens the skin, preventing dryness, while Chamomile comforts sensitive skin and repairs the skin. Then, Rosemary boosts cell renewal and smooths the skin tone and Seaweed deeply hydrates. In the end, its high antioxidant content allows the gel to shield the skin from any external aggression so the eye area is calm and brighter.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply BeautyLab Cooling Eye Gel 15ml (0.50 fl oz) in the morning and evening, or whenever necessary, to previously cleansed and toned skin. Firstly, take a small amount of the product and apply it around the eyes with your ring finger. Then, pat it in so it absorbs. Avoid direct eye contact. For a cooling effect, leave the gel in a fridge before using.

description: BeautyLab Essential Eye & Lip Care 15ml (0.50 fl oz) is ideal for skin exposed to a high level of urban pollution as it provides deep nourishment to the two most delicate areas of the face, the lips and the eyes. Therefore, you can say goodbye to dry and chapped lips and puffy eyes. Due to the presence of Rose in its formula, this cream fills the skin with hydration while Panthenol and Argan condition, soften and moisturize. On top of that, it strengthens the skin's protective barrier to fight any damage caused by environmental aggressors. In the end, the skin is protected and rejuvenated.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply BeautyLab Essential Eye & Lip Care 15ml (0.50 fl oz) twice a day or whenever necessary to previously cleansed and toned skin. Then, gently massage it by tapping small amounts of product on the lips and around and under the eyes. Avoid direct eye contact.

description: BeautyLab Youth Elixir Absolute Regenerative Eye Serum 15ml (0.50 fl oz) reclaims the firmness, strength, and brightness around the delicate eye area. Moreover, it lifts the eyelids and restores vitality by combining Orchid Stem Cell and a Stem Cell Peptide Complex that activate intense moisturization, stimulate cell renewal, and reduce pigmentation. Due to an antioxidant-rich peptide complex which includes Probiotics, Green Tea, and Caffeine, it specifically targets undereye bags and dark circles. Thus, brightening the skin. On top of that, it completely lifts the skin and reduces the visibility of wrinkles, while supporting collagen production. Lastly, Hyaluronic Acid ensures lasting hydration and plumpness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply BeautyLab Youth Elixir Absolute Regenerative Eye Serum 15ml (0.50 fl oz) in the morning and evening to previously cleansed and toned skin. Firstly, take a small amount and gently pat it around the eyes. Then, using your ring finger apply on the eyelids. Avoid direct eye contact.

description:
Mario Badescu Brightening Eye Serum 14g is specifically formulated to revitalize and illuminate the delicate skin around your eyes. Harnessing the power of exceptional ingredients, this eye serum offers a multitude of benefits that will leave you with a brighter, more youthful-looking gaze. First, the formula features Caffeine which visibly reduces eye puffiness, and Arnica Montana flower extract along with Niacinamide to help fight the appearance of dark circles. Then, Hyaluronic acid hydrates the skin and smooths fine lines whereas Centella asiatica provides anti-aging benefits. In this way, these ingredients work together to diminish signs of fatigue, unveiling a more radiant and fresh look. Another distinctive feature of this product is its texture, meant to be used as an eye serum, alone or before your regular eye cream. The texture is lightweight and fast-absorbing, infusing the skin with hydration and radiance without feeling heavy. 
Also important to note, this product is slightly tinted because of the presence of iron oxides and mica, but it blends seamlessly into the skin. As a last note, it is vegan and fragrance-free. In conclusion, whether you're dealing with dark circles, puffiness, or dullness, this serum offers a targeted solution that revitalizes and restores radiance to your delicate under-eye skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply one pump of Mario Badescu Brightening Eye Serum 14g to the eye contour, gently pressing along the orbital bone. In addition, you can apply it to the eyelids. Use alone or before your regular eye cream.

description:
Elizabeth Arden Retinol Ceramide Line Erasing Eye Cream is an intense moisturizing option that suits the needs of a delicate facial area. Thanks to a smoothing blend of Encapsulated Retinol, Ceramides, and Niacinamide this has brightening as well as de-puffing effects. In fact, the improvements are quick yet long-lasting, perfecting the epidermis' texture around the eyes. Meanwhile, the addition of a Peptide complex repairs collagen and elastin production, leading to firmer and increasingly toned skin. Moreover, a small portion of the cream also targets dark circles, diminishing aging/fatigue signs for the ultimate youthful look.
Ophthalmologist approved, this product includes Smart Retinol Technology on multiple levels. On the one hand, Smart Potency means its retinol penetrates five times more deeply and ensures an eight-hour non-stop release. On the other, its star ingredients produce Smart Results, keeping optimal hydration. Finally, Smart Dosage allows the right amount of cream to be applied with the help of an airless pump which safeguards the formula's strength.
how_to_use:
How to use
Start by gently pressing down on the Elizabeth Arden Retinol Ceramide Line Erasing Eye Cream's dispenser for the right amount of product. Once the formula comes out, resort to your ring finger to dab around the eye area without applying too much pressure. Move the finger in an upward motion, imitating a lifting effect. Make sure to cleanse the under-eye and eyelid sections with the same brand's Ceramide Replenishing Cleansing Oil before each application. Don't forget to use an anti-aging serum before the cream as well. Finally, finish off your skincare ritual by resorting to a small amount of the Elizabeth Arden Ceramide Lift & Firm Day Cream SPF30!

description:
TONYMOLY Floria Nutra Energy Eye Cream is an ideal eye cream for drier and dehydrated skin. It is normal day after day for our eyes to become more tired and heavy due to stress and even external agents such as pollution. In this way, this eye cream hydrates and nourishes this most sensitive skin. On the other hand, it helps to fill in wrinkles and fine lines around the eyes for a younger looking skin. 
For this gentle cream to work, it contains a composition of ingredients rich in moisturizing and nourishing properties. In this case it has 65% Safflower Extract and Organic Argan Oil, in addition to Chronoline Peptide and Resurrection Plant Extract. The latter also help the skin to become firmer and less sagging. Finally, this cream has a light formula and a balm-type texture that can be used on other areas of the face that show signs of age such as around the mouth, forehead and neck. In short, if you need a truly moisturizing and nourishing eye cream, this product is essential in your skin care routine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply TONYMOLY Floria Nutra Energy Eye Cream with your ring finger around the eye area. Pat gently until the cream is fully absorbed into skin.

description: Juvena Skin Specialists Miracle Eye Cream 20ml (0.6 oz) is an anti-aging eye cream that tackles the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. At the same time, it attenuates any signs of tiredness such as dark circles or under-eye bags. As a result, this cream provides intensive eye care aided by its relaxing massage head. In the end, with a lightweight and creamy texture, the cream strengthens the skin around the eyes and fully refreshes it.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Juvena Skin Specialists Miracle Eye Cream 20ml (0.6 oz) to previously cleansed skin. Apply it gently around the eye area.

description: Juvena Skin Energy Moisture Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 oz) cares for the sensitive skin around the eyes by fighting signs of fatigue and aging. As a result, it provides intense moisturizing and attenuates the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. At the same time, it tackles under-eye puffiness and dark circles. Due to Juvena's exclusive SkinNova SC Technology, this product visually improves the quality of the skin. Hence, you'll get a fresher and cleaner look with a new and sparkling radiance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Juvena Skin Energy Moisture Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 oz) whenever necessary, to the eye area and gently massage it. Let it absorb.

description: Juvena Juvedical Sensitive Optimizing Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 oz)  is perfect for sensitive skin that starts to show fine lines around the eye area. During our daily lives, the skin has to face many external factors that might cause it to stress and prematurely age. From sun exposure and pollution to blue light from screens, it's important that we diminish their damage as much as possible. As soon as the skin starts to age, the signs will be more and more visible. To contradict this, Juvena has an exclusive technology called SkinNova SC which fights the signs of aging and improves the skin texture. For instance, the cream reduces dark circles. Hence, the skin looks and feels soft and balanced.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Juvena Juvedical Sensitive Optimizing Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 oz) on previously cleansed and dry skin. Massage it gently in the eye area. Let it absorb.

description:
Guerlain Super Aqua-Eye Serum Intense Wrinkle Plumper Eye Reviver 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a luxurious anti-aging eye serum that provides 30 hours of intense hydration and protects the eye area against wrinkles and fine lines. Hence, it recovers radiance and plumpness.
This serum has been dermatologically tested and the results are clear. Firstly, after just one application, the levels of hydration increase by 52% and the amount of wrinkles reduces by 26%. Secondly, after one month of applying it, puffiness visibility attenuates by 49% and the intensity of dark circles minimizes by 35%.
The making-off of this serum has been deeply researched to ensure a highly effective result. One of the secrets of the Guerlain Super Aqua-Eye Serum Intense Wrinkle Plumper Eye Reviver lies in its Aquacomplex, which boosts hydration flows while purifying the skin. Thus, by infusing the skin in active water, it looks youthful and pure, free from pollution.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Guerlain Super Aqua-Eye Serum Intense Wrinkle Plumper Eye Reviver 15ml (0.5 fl oz) by dabbing the serum onto the upper and lower lid of each eye. Then, smooth the temples towards the inner corner of the eye and vice-versa. Follow by drawing circles over the temples and between the eyes and applying pressure in the end. Finally, with eyes closed, apply pressure over them with the palm of the hands and breath in and out.

description:
Decléor Cornflower Hydrating Eye Gel 15ml (0.5 oz) simultaneously fights signs of fatigue and dehydration with a unique composition that contains 98% of ingredients from a natural origin. Tested under dermatological and ophthalmological control, this eye treatment is suitable for all skin types, even sensitive ones. Its multipurpose composition focuses, on one side, on addressing tiredness through powerful revitalizing properties. In fact, ingredients like Cornflower and Caffeine prove to be efficient in reducing not only dark circles but also puffiness.  
At the same time, the Cornflower Hydrating Eye Gel also has some hydrating and protective benefits. As it happens, this gel resorts to nourishing and antioxidant agents to ensure optimal levels of hydration and a brighter finish. The result? With regular use, the Cornflower Hydrating Eye Gel promises to contribute to plumper and more radiant skin that looks fresh and also rested.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Decléor Cornflower Hydrating Eye Gel 15ml (0.5 oz) as part of your morning and evening routine, after serum. Apply a pea-sized amount with the help of your ring finger. Then, gently tap for maximum absorption.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

Sisley Paris Sisleÿa Day and Night Anti-Aging Face Care 50ml x1
Sisley Paris Firming Concentrated Serum 4ml x1
Sisley Paris Sisleÿa Anti-Wrinkle Concentrated Serum 4ml x1
Sisley Paris Sisleÿa Eye and Lip Contour Cream 2ml x1

Sisley Paris Sisleÿa Day and Night Anti-Aging Face Care 50ml is a high-end anti-aging day and night cream that targets visible signs of aging. It targets three dimensions of aging: genetic, environmental and behavioral. The last one is the one that affects the face more. Due to its rich formula, it has ingredients such as Rhatany Extract and Lady's Mantle Extract which deal with skin stimulation. At the same time, it regenerates the skin and boosts cellular rhythm and energy. Moreover, the Yeast and Soy Protein Complex present in the recipe ensures cellular longevity. In sum, these characteristics result in a major reduction in fine lines and wrinkles but also in an improvement in the levels of firmness, density, radiance and hydration.
Firming Concentrated Serum 4ml is a high-end anti-aging serum that focuses on restoring the firmness levels of the skin. It has two modes of action. The first one boosts the firming potential of the skin and the second one reactivates tensional forces. Thus, the cheekbones are full and the face has redefined contours. Besides toned, the skin is able to relax and look younger.
Sisley Paris Sisleÿa Anti-Wrinkle Concentrated Serum 4ml is an anti-aging high-end serum that tackles all types of wrinkles, from fine lines to deep wrinkles. Hence, it visibly smoothes the skin giving it a youthful appearance. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump and smooth, slows down. Hence, thanks to the Cacao Porcelana Extract present in the formula, this serum restores the powerful anti-wrinkle potential of the skin. At the same time, the serum acts on different levels of the skin to ensure a complete response that leaves the facial features rested.
Sisley Paris Sisleÿa Eye and Lip Contour Cream 2ml 4ml is a high-end anti-aging cream designed to act on the eye and lip areas. This cream targets three dimensions of aging: genetic, environmental and behavioral. The behavioral factors are the ones that impact the most and such vulnerable parts of the face do not escape. Due to the Yeast and Soy Protein Complex, this cream visibly reduces wrinkles and fine lines, while energizing the eye contour. Additionally, the Soy Peptide Extract restores firmness levels to the upper eyelids, opening up the eye area, and smoothes the vertical lines about the lips. At the same time, a combination of plant-based ingredients is working on lightening the coloration of dark circles and reducing under-eye puffiness.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Dermalogica Biolumin-C Eye Serum 15ml (0.5 fl oz) moisturizes, brightens, and protects the sensitive area around the eyes. This serum stars vitamin C, a powerful antioxidant that carries many benefits to the skin. In fact, it can not only brighten the skin but also prevent and reduce the first signs of aging. This is because vitamin C fights free radical damage but can also increase collagen production. Here we have an ultra-stable vitamin C complex that comprises two stable forms of vitamin C. Furthermore, the availability of vitamin C is increased by Papain which gently exfoliates the skin, thus enhancing its skin penetration. So this serum delivers three times more vitamin C!
Furthermore, a peptide further increases collagen production while Tremella mushroom extract hydrates the skin. Overall, this serum helps prevent aging signs and boosts radiance on the skin around the eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dermalogica Biolumin-C Eye Serum 15ml (0.5 fl oz) under the eye and along the orbital bone with light touches in both morning and evening.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Hydrachange Eye Essence 15ml (0.51 fl oz) was specially developed to provide deep hydration to the delicate eye area while counteracting some signs of fatigue, simultaneously. First and foremost, this is a powerful replenishing formula that promises to help you achieve optimal hydration levels. In fact, its sleek and dense consistency instantly replenishes the skin for a smoother and plumper finish. At the same time, the Cellular Performance Hydrachange Eye Essence also boosts microcirculation in the eye contour. As a result, it reduces the appearance of both dark circles and slight swelling.  
Introduce this unique treatment as part of your morning and evening routine. Use it by itself or as an enhancing complement to any other eye care product.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Hydrachange Eye Essence 15ml (0.51 fl oz) as part of your morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the eye contour, tapping gently for optimal absorption.

description:
SENSAI Cellular Performance Extra Intensive Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) is a smoothing treatment that addresses multiple signs of aging common to the eye area. With an advanced formula, this product provides quick results that also increase over time through prolonged application. On one side, the  Extra Intensive Eye Cream proves to be efficient in revitalizing the skin for a fresh and radiant look. Simultaneously, it indulges the eye contour with moisture for a silky smooth texture. Last but definitely not least, this eye cream focuses on enhancing firmness levels while reducing the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. 
To conclude, the  Extra Intensive Eye Cream has a creamy texture that smoothly penetrates the skin with immediate comfort. The silky consistency not only ensures a quick absorption process but also a pleasant user experience.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use SENSAI Cellular Performance Extra Intensive Eye Cream 15ml (0.52 oz) as part of your morning and evening routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the eye contour. Then, tap gently for optimal absorption.

description:
Atashi Anti-Aging Eye Contour 15ml is an anti-wrinkle eye contour cream that tackles puffiness and dark circles. At the same time, it corrects deep wrinkles. As we age, the production of collagen, an essential vitamin for keeping our complexion plump, slows down. Thus, it is important to stimulate its synthesis. Due to the Gardenia Jasminoide Extract present in its formula, this cream boosts collagen production by 33% and Retinol works on reducing the appearance and amount of wrinkles. As a result, the eye contour area is redefined and redensified with an even complexion.
Thanks to the Haloxyl in this cream, the eye bags reabsorb iron and bilirubin which brighten up the complexion. On top of that, its creamy texture provides moments of great comfort and a calming effect on the skin. Moreover, it is especially effective on very dry and stressed skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Atashi Anti-Aging Eye Contour 15ml in the morning and evening. Firstly, take a small amount onto the palms. Then, gently massage it all over the eye contour area from the tear duct to the temples without applying pressure.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

Skin Generics Lifting Serum Organic Silicium 30ml
Skin Generics Antiaging Eye Contour Serum Tetrapeptide 20ml

Skin Generics Lifting Serum Organic Silicium is a long-lasting and particularly effective option for the ultimate push-up effect on mature skin. Thanks to 22% active properties, this targets loss of firmness as well as deeper wrinkles and fine lines if used on a daily basis. While Hibiscus Extract pairs anti-aging qualities with intense moisturizing ones, Silicium visibly improves skin tissues' firmness. To the same extent, this component plays a pivotal role in shielding against harmful free radicals, building a trustworthy barrier. Moreover, Phospholipids Complex is responsible for establishing an enduring push-up result, restoring youthfulness within seconds. As per usual, Hawaiian Algae has a magnificent protective purpose, creating a film that helps you avoid dehydration. In other words, it preserves optimal hydration levels allowing Soy Protein to fully regenerate the skin. Besides, this last element adds a powerful anti-aging facet, noticeably minimizing the deeper wrinkles.
Skin Generics Antiaging Eye Contour Serum Tetrapeptide relies on 30% active properties to reduce dark circles, wrinkles, and puffiness in a very delicate skin area. Filled with rejuvenating qualities, a few drops of this serum promote natural collagen production, firming saggy sections around your eyes. Moreover, Meadowfoam Extract and Hyaluronic Acid join forces in order to moisturize deeply, revitalizing dull skin. To the same extent, Hygroplex restructures aging tissues, offering an effective push-up result. The inclusion of Argilerine elevates the formula due to a clear plumping, filler-like effect. Finally, you'll also notice a great increase in firmness thanks to the pairing of Collagener and Vitamin E. All in all, this last active component allows the product's complex to have an antioxidant facet. In other words, this serum ends up removing toxins, casting away damaging free radicals to prevent the appearance of further early aging signs.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
La Prairie Pure Gold Radiance Eye Cream 20ml is a luxurious eye cream that targets signs of aging around the eye area, puffiness and dark circles. The cream has a rich and silky texture that absorbs easily into the skin. It is infused with pure Gold, known for its luxurious and regenerating properties. Additionally, the eye cream contains a powerful blend of active ingredients, including a brightening complex, which reduces the appearance of spots and evens the skin tone. The hydration complex present in its formula plumps and hydrates the skin, and the antioxidants protect the delicate skin around the eyes from environmental damage.
At the same time, the cream is enriched with nourishing ingredients, such as Squalane and Shea Butter, which hydrate and protect the skin, leaving it soft and smooth. Moreover, with continued use, the cream improves the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and crow's feet around the eyes, while also improving overall skin texture, radiance, and firmness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply La Prairie Pure Gold Radiance Eye Cream 20ml to previously cleansed and dry skin in the morning and evening. Firstly, tap along the under-eye area and up toward the temples. Continue above the eyebrow towards the bridge of the nose and finish under the eyebrow line. Then, gently massage it into the skin with a press-and-roll motion until it absorbs.

description:
La Prairie Platinum Rare Haute-Rejuvenation Eye Cream 20ml is a rejuvenating formula that was specially developed to fight signs of aging in the sensitive eye area. With a luxurious creamy consistency, this product offers instant comfort while restoring a youthful look, as well. In fact, by addressing key rejuvenation processes in the skin layers, the Haute-Rejuvenation Eye Cream is able to not only reduce lines and wrinkles but also protect the levels of firmness. Even more, this product proves to be also efficient in addressing signs of fatigue. On one side, it supplies a gentle tensing effect that immediately lifts the whole area. At the same time, it smooths out imperfections and delivers extra luminosity. As a result, the skin around the eyes is left restored, smooth and nourished after every application. 

The Haute-Rejuvenation Eye Cream is part of the La Prairie Platinum Rare - a range of compositions that aims to simultaneously address all major visible signs of aging. With the rare and precious Platinum as its star ingredient, this line is the result of a bold scientific quest to harness the beneficial properties of this ingredient.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use La Prairie Platinum Rare Haute-Rejuvenation Eye Cream 20ml as part of your morning and evening routine. Start by dotting the formula under the eye, moving from the inner to the outer corner. Then continue moving up to the temples and back along the brow bone to the inner corner. Finish by dotting between brows. To conclude, massage the whole area with gentle press-and-roll motions. Complement its action with the remaining p>La Prairie Platinum Rare collection.

description:
Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix works not only to enhance the skin's hydration, but also signs of fatigue and signs of aging around the eyes. It has a light texture and offers great comfort. The unique applicator additionally offers a luxurious experience that perfectly complements a multi-purpose formula. It is enriched with Hyaluronic Acid to efficiently hydrate and protect the skin, and also to help water-soluble actives to penetrate deeper. To achieve anti-aging results, Soybean Extract stimulates both collagen and elastin synthesis.
Using an eye cream is key to improve the hydration and anti-aging results of your daily skincare routine. With this concentrate, you get not only a renewed eye area, but also an invigorating experience with the applicator. Add this booster to your skincare routine and find the look of lines, wrinkles, puffiness and dark circles significantly reduced. In addition, the skin is strengthened, more hydrated and nourished.
how_to_use:
How to use
Firstly, cleanse and tone the skin. Secondly, apply Estée Lauder Advanced Night Repair Eye Concentrate Matrix using the applicator and massaging in a 360° circle under the eye area and above the lid. After applying the product with the applicator, pat the product with your ring finger to improve the absorption.

description:
Shiseido Benefiance Nutriperfect Eye Serum is a specific care for the sensible area around the eyes, created especially for mature skin affected by hormonal changes. This eye serum targets the main concerns of mature skin, such as crow's feet, wrinkles, loss of firmness and dark circles. A combination of powerful ingredients turns the wish for a rejuvenated eye area into a real possibility. To begin with, Carnosine DP helps to protect the skin against environmental assaults and free-radical damage that accelerate signs of aging. Additionally, Multi-Vitamin B C E & P, as a potent nutritive supplement, helps to fortify the skin.
The eye area is the mainframe of your face. Correcting its visible signs of aging will rejuvenate not only your eyes, but the overall appearance of the face. Add this eye serum to you skincare routine and, as a result, the skin's elasticity is restored, the appearance of wrinkles and crow's feet is minimized, and the skin is more firm.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Shiseido Benefiance Nutriperfect Eye Serum as the last step of your routine, following your moisturizer. Use the fingertips to sweep the product across the eye area, and gently smooth it outwards.

description: Holika Holika Prime Youth Black Snail Repair Eye Cream has powerful antioxidant properties that shield the skin from external threats and minimize early aging signs. In fact, this soothing moisturizing formula features 30% Black Snail Mucin, nourishing deeply as well as restoring microcirculation. Relying on a type of Mucin that is four times more enriching than regular one, this strengthens capillary walls and brightens dark spots. Moreover, its delicate nature targets crow's feet, inhibiting the decrease in collagen as well as improving elasticity. Besides, thanks to the inclusion of Red Ginseng Stem Cells, this options eliminates harmful free radicals. All in all, dry to combination skin is bound to become extra youthful, both wrinkle-free and refreshed. After each application, you're likely to feel a push up effect along the entire eye area, as this penetrates easily/quickly!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a tiny portion of Holika Holika Prime Youth Black Snail Repair Eye Cream to your eyelids as well as all over the eye area, as delicately as possible. In order to do less pressure, tap with your ring finger until you smooth the formula evenly. Pay closer attention to both the internal and external corners of the eye, which tend to accumulate crow's feet or other small wrinkles. Finally, for optimal results, pair this with options from the same Prime Youth Black Snail Repair range.

description:
Mizon Intensive Firming Solution Collagen Power Firming Eye Cream is a gentle moisturizing cream specifically designed for the eye contour. Its formula is indicated for a more mature skin that suffers from some signs of age such as wrinkles and fine lines. In this way, this cream helps not only to prevent but also to fight these already existing signs. The skin is then more hydrated, smoothed, regenerated and more plumped. Furthermore, fine lines and wrinkles are much less visible as the skin becomes firm and more elastic.
For these benefits to be successful on the skin around the eyes, this cream contains 54% of Marine Collagen in its composition. This ingredient provides the skin with a deep hydration and firming effect thus helping to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. On the other hand, it also has Hyaluronic Acid, a blend of Organic Argan Oil and Adenosine. In the end your eye area skin becomes firmer, nourished and much more hydrated. It is also dermatologically tested and has no alcohol, fragrance and essential oils, making it ideal for all skin types.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a little dot of Mizon Intensive Firming Solution Collagen Power Firming Eye Cream around your eyes. Gently pat with your ring finger until the product is absorbed into the skin.

description:
La Prairie Essence of Skin Caviar Eye Complex protects a vulnerable area of your face, providing a slight push-up effect. By cooling down the under-eye section, this gel helps decrease puffiness, revitalizing as well as facilitating healthy blood flow. Thanks to a lightweight texture, the nourishing formula is not only easily absorbed but also minimizes skin irregularities. Soft and evenly toned, your eyes will benefit from target fine lines/wrinkles treatments. Thus, a combination of botanical and fruit extracts minimizes visible aging or fatigue signs effectively. Moreover, core elements such as Algae and Caviar boost hydration, plump less smooth areas, and stabilize mature skin types.
In fact, these seem to reverse the natural passage of time, preventing the breakdown of elastin, stimulating collagen production, or reducing inflammation. In other words, while this complex recharges the eye contouring zones, it also calms particularly easily irritated spots. As you feel the healing benefits penetrate the initial layers of your complexion, you'll also begin to see an increase in radiance. Plus, when working with other make-up products, this also enhances the endurance of full-coverage cosmetics. Finally, besides Caviar, La Prairie's Cellular Complex does a wonderful job awakening skin cells, so these can continue to thrive working at their very best. As per usual, La Prarie's lab-created products strike a balance between soft textures and active components, all in the name of a polished outcome.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a tiny portion of La Prairie Essence of Skin Caviar Eye Complex during the morning, in the under-eye area. Then, continue by going along the eyelid, in a gentle pressing motion. Do so until you feel the skin firmer and notice some improvements. Finally, explore the rest of La Prairie's Skin Caviar range in order to complete this rejuvenating as well as refreshing treatment.

description:
La Prairie Skin Caviar Luxe Eye Cream extends the benefits of a soothing, anti-aging, and lifting formula to a vulnerable section of your face. Thanks to the reimagination of Caviar Extract - enhanced by biotechnology - this eye cream provides the ultimate sensory experience. Thus, it brings strong push-up and strengthening effects, especially in conjunction with La Prairie's trademark Cellular Complex. Known for boosting the energy of dull or aging complexions, it aims to reverse the passage of time. Moreover, great attention to detail allows this cream to treat imperfections in skin texture/tone.
All in all, it instantly minimizes wrinkles, fine lines, crow's feet, and dark circles, facilitating a healthier blood flow. At the same time, by offering a nice cooling sensation, it decreases under-eye puffiness as well. With the decrease of natural collagen production, your skin tends to lose elasticity and firmness. As those shifts are particularly noticeable in the eye area, this section of your face needs focused/intensive care. In other words, this luxurious cream is perfect to respond to those needs, replenishing your complexion's moisture levels. Finally, a silky texture enables quick as well as effective penetrations, activating the smoothness/tightness that characterizes La Prairie's unique formulas.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a tiny portion of La Prairie Skin Caviar Luxe Eye Cream after cleansing and toning your face with the appropriate products. Use your favorite eye serum to prepare of area for the benefits of a soothing cream. With the help of the silver spatula included, smooth the formula on your fingertips. Then, tap it along the under-eye section, from the inner to the outer corners. Perform upward movements towards your temples and apply a bit of the product on the upper eyelid. Tap the surrounding eye area as delicately as possible, until the cream is fully absorbed.

description:
Collistar Magnifica Redensifying Repairing Eye Contour is an ideal moisturizing cream for mature skin that wants to obtain a rejuvenated eye contour area. This rich and velvety eye cream has anti-aging properties that help to reduce wrinkles, fine lines and signs of tiredness. In this way, the entire eye contour is brighter and with a youthful and radiant appearance. Furtermore, this cream is ideal for redensifying and repairing the tissues of the eyelids.
This creamy formula contains Gamma Aminobutyric Acid that helps in the reduction of wrinkles and expression lines. In addition, it is enriched with Chaga Mushroom extract that improves microcirculation, thus combating dark circles and minimize lines and signs of tiredness. All in all, this luxurious eye cream regenerates and redensifies the eye contour, providing greater elasticity and smoothness to the skin. The wrinkles became less intense and the whole look brighter and more radiant. Moreover, it reveals the complexion's natural luminosity while intensively moisturizing it.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

The combination of Gamma Aminobutyric Acid with Chaga Mushroom extract gives a boost of hydration to the skin. In addition, they work well together as they help not only combat signs of age such as wrinkles, fine lines and dark circles, but also provide a youthful and radiant look to the eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Collistar Magnifica Redensifying Repairing Eye Contour around the entire contour of the eye, massaging gently until the product is absorbed. Apply morning and evening. You can also use this cream as an eye mask once a week. Apply a generous layer of cream and leave it for 5 minutes. Wipe off excess product with tissue.

description:
Lancaster Skin Life Early-Age-Delay Eye Cream 15ml will transform your eye are into its most radiant and luminous version. This product comes with a gel-like consistency that not only reduces signs of fatigue but also decreases signs of premature aging. In fact, the contour of the eyes is one of the first areas where marks of fatigue, aging, and stress settle in. Therefore, the Early-Age-Delay Eye Cream helps to reverse that process by targeting dark circles, puffiness, fine lines, and dullness. After each application, the skin around your eyes will be smoother, nourished, and re-energized.
Lancaster is a high-end brand known for researching and implementing the latest skincare technology on its products. The brand has identified three types of pollution: outdoor pollution, indoor pollution, and digital pollution caused by the stress and fatigue of the over-connected modern life. These elements have an extremely damaging effect on the skin causing an increased production of free radicals. Exposure to pollution means, therefore, an acceleration in the skin aging process. In collecting efforts to prevent this premature aging, Lancaster has created the Skin Life range. This set of products focuses on delaying the first signs of aging caused by pollution and on boosting the skin’s natural glow and freshness.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use:
How to use 
Use Lancaster Skin Life Early-Age-Delay Eye Cream 15ml in the morning or at nighttime after an especially stressful day. Gently massage the product in the skin around your eyes to stimulate blood circulation. Use in combination with other products from the same range in order to obtain optimal results.

description: Clinique All About Eyes is a lightweight cream-gel that reduces the appearance of undereye puffiness and dark circles. Infused with the energizing properties of caffeine, this product visibly decongests the undereye area, contributing to a bright and well-rested appearance. The refreshing gel formula melts easily into the skin, creating a comfortable veil that also helps hold eye make-up in place.
how_to_use:
How to use
Using your ring finger, apply Clinique All About Eyes to the entire eye area with gentle patting motions.

description: Clinique Repairwear Laser Focus Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream is a potent anti-wrinkle cream for the eye contour area. The rich formula, which is infused with black tea ferment and yeast, encourages cell renewal and stimulates the skin's natural production of collagen and elastin; as a result, it is able to smooth out the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. At the same time, hyaluronic acid and trehalose moisturize and re-plump the skin, significantly brightening and revitalizing the appearance of the delicate area around the eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Clinique Repairwear Laser Focus Wrinkle Correcting Eye Cream to the entire eye area, including eyelids. Then, tap gently in order to increase absorption.

description:
The Saem Iceland Hydrating Collagen Eye Stick 7g is an eye care solution particularly designed to address common under-eye concerns such as puffiness, wrinkles, and loss of elasticity. Infused with the cooling and hydrating powers of Iceland water and seaweed extract, this eye stick provides instant relief and refreshment to tired, stressed skin around the eyes. Furthermore, the formula contains six types of collagen, which work synergistically to strengthen skin elasticity, making it an ideal choice for those looking to firm and rejuvenate the delicate eye area. At the same time, hyaluronic acid enhances the hydrating benefits, ensuring the skin remains moisturized and plump. In turn, this helps smooth out eye wrinkles and fine lines.
A standout feature of this product is its presentation. Its super lightweight and cooling texture glides smoothly over the skin, without any stickiness. While it ensures an easy application thanks to its practical stick format. Besides, it boasts a charming presentation with a polar bear on the packaging, making it a cute and practical addition to any skincare routine. The rose scent adds a touch of luxury to each application, transforming this skincare step into a soothing, sensorial experience. In summary, this eye product not only provides essential hydration and firming benefits but also delivers a cooling effect that helps relieve puffiness, leaving the eye area feeling refreshed and revitalized.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply The Saem Iceland Hydrating Collagen Eye Stick 7g over the eye contour with circular motions.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

1x Clarins Double Serum Eye 20ml
1x Clarins Wonder Perfect Mascara 4D 01 mini size
1x Clarins SOS Lashes Serum Mascara 3ml

Clarins Double Serum Eye is an eye serum that targets the main concerns of beauty consumers - the signs of aging and fatigue around the eyes. The texture is rich and silky, providing the skin with instant comfort and brightness. Concentrated and powerful, it works hard enough to reveal visible differences in just seven days. With the combined effort of 13 plant extracts, the skin around the eyes is about to experience rejuvenating results. To point out organic wild chervil extract, an ingredient that contributes to strengthening the skin around the eyes. In addition to wild chervil, 12 other plant extracts such as turmeric, organic leaf of life, organic kiwi, organic oat sugars and organic white horehound work to reduce the appearance of signs of aging and fatigue. 

Clarins Wonder Perfect Mascara 4D 01  is the key for long, curved and voluminous lashes with a high-definition result. It comes in a luxurious metallic pink tube and has a compact bristle brush, ideal for an easy application for all lash lengths. The combination of the formula and the wand results on a complete eyelash transformation. The mascara coats the lashes with intense volume and length all the while promoting a curled and defined result. The secret is the Rose wax, that helps not only to curve but also protects and strengthens the lashes. Additionally, the formula contains a lash-boosting serum that features Panthenol for longer and stronger lashes, day after day. To point out that a clinical study tested bare lashes for 28 days and observed a 7.7% increase in lash volume and a 5.5% increase in lashes length. Using this mascara, your lashes are instantly emphasized as well as nourished for amazing results in the long run. You can use it alone to highlight your eyes or after your eyeshadow or liner to finish and intensify your makeup look. 

Clarins SOS Lashes Serum Mascara is a lash-enhancing mascara that nourishes and strengthens your lashes while providing length, volume, and definition. It is ideal for damaged lashes from frequent use of an eyelash curler or poor makeup removal. Moreover, it protects and thickens your lashes, promoting healthy growth over time. In fact, its Lash Boosting Complex visibly lengthens and strengthens the lashes. In 28 days, you get revitalized eyelashes. It is composed of 94% natural ingredients, including Organic Castor Oil which strengthens and extends the lashes, Organic Oat Extract which covers the lashes naturally and Lentiscus Extract which strengthens the lashes from the base. Additionally, the mascara comes with a specially designed brush that coats every lash evenly and separates them for a natural and defined look. The formula is lightweight and buildable, allowing you to customize your lash look to your desired level of volume and length.

description: Sesderma Retisil Eye And Lip Pro-Aging Contour 30ml (1.01 fl oz) is a hydrating cream designed for the delicate eye and lip areas, suitable for all skin types. It is specifically formulated to address advanced signs of aging such as wrinkles, sagging, and other concerns like dark spots, uneven texture, and dehydration, as well as fatigue signs like dark circles. For that purpose, this cream includes a combination of hydroxypinacolone retinoate (HPR), organic silicon, progeline, hyaluronic acid, horsetail extract, and peptides. These ingredients offer firming and anti-wrinkle benefits. It also contains antioxidants Centella Asiatica and vitamin E. On the other hand, the formula works to reduce the appearance of vascular dark circles with vitamin K oxide and caffeine. Additionally, it ensures hydration through ingredients like hyaluronic acid, rosehip oil, sweet almond oil, and glycerin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sesderma Retisil Eye And Lip Pro-Aging Contour 30ml (1.01 fl oz) to the eye and lip contour in the morning and evening routine.

description:
Mad Beauty Disney Little Mermaid Hydrogel Under Eye Patches x3 is an enchanting skincare treat that celebrates the world of Disney's "The Little Mermaid." These hydrogel masks aim to revive the under-eye area, thereby providing relief and rejuvenation for tired eyes. The masks are crafted from a hydrogel material, that ensures that the under-eye area receives a substantial amount of hydration. The formula features hyaluronic acid, aloe vera, and niacinamide for an intense moisturizing action, crucial for minimizing the appearance of fatigue and for giving the skin a refreshed, more youthful look. Moreover, these patches also help reduce puffiness. Shaped to fit the contours of the under-eye area perfectly, these patches offer a cooling and soothing experience upon application. In detail, each pack inside contains one set of masks for practical application.
Additionally, the iridescent finish of the masks adds a touch of whimsy and magic, aligning with the playful and fantastical theme of "The Little Mermaid." This aesthetic appeal makes the hydrogel patches not only a skincare product but also a fun and delightful beauty experience. Whether you're looking to brighten your eyes before a special event, wind down after a long day, or simply indulge in a bit of self-care, these under-eye patches are an excellent choice. In summary, these under-eye patches provide a unique combination of effective skincare and enchanting design.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Mad Beauty Disney Little Mermaid Hydrogel Under Eye Patches x3 to the under-eye area and leave them for the time indicated. Remove and massage the remaining product on the skin.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

1x SVR [Collagen] Biotic Regenerating Bouncy Cream 50ml
1x SVR Ampoule Relax Eye Concentrate 15ml

SVR [Collagen] Biotic Regenerating Bouncy Cream is an anti-aging moisturizer specifically formulated to fight sagging skin. With this in mind, this cream associates Collagen of vegetable origin with three active ingredients to regenerate the skin. So, the star ingredient is Collagen which hydrates the skin and promotes natural collagen production. And collagen is a very important protein for skin elasticity, which gradually decreases with age. Then, Hyaluronic acid hydrates and plumps the skin while pasteurized Probiotics strengthen the skin barrier. In addition, the formula also contains Vitamin C which is a powerful antioxidant that can protect the skin from free radicals and boost collagen production. In short, these ingredients work synergically to reinforce and protect the skin, fighting aging signs. As a result, the skin is smoother, firmer, and more plumped and elastic. All these benefits in a natural formula with 96,5% ingredients of natural origin with a fresh and melting texture that unveils a fresh, floral, and musky scent.
SVR Ampoule Relax Eye Concentrate allies a powerful formula with a unique application method. To begin with, it contains Gaba, a Post-Biotic, and Silk Extract. Gaba relaxes the eye contour area and enhances the elasticity of the skin not only smoothing fine lines and wrinkles but also softening the skin. The Post-Biotic not only reduces dark circles and eye bags but also tones the eye contour area. And the Silk Extract helps detoxify and repair the skin revitalizing the eye contour. So, in essence, it can relax and repair the eye contour during the night lending you a firmer and younger look in the morning. But its efficacy is not only in its formula. With a smooth massaging tip in its application pipette, it provides a warm sensation that maximizes the relaxing and soothing effect. All in all, this eye concentrate can relax, tone, and smooth the eye contour. It not only reduces dark circles and eye bags but also fights aging signs restoring to the eye contour a rested and smoothed look in the morning.

description:
Dr. Althea To Be Eyeconic Eye Serum 25ml (0.84 fl oz) is a meticulously formulated product designed to address the delicate needs of the skin around the eyes. At the heart of its formulation is a commitment to deeply hydrate and nourish this sensitive area. The serum's unique gel texture is one of its standout features, ensuring a smooth and soothing application. One of the key aspects of this serum is its versatility. While primarily aimed at reducing the appearance of dark circles and under-eye bags, it is equally effective in targeting signs of aging, such as loss of elasticity and wrinkles. Moreover, it can be applied not only to the eye area but to other areas where this is a concern.
One of the key ingredients is adenosine, a notable ingredient known for its anti-aging properties, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. In addition to adenosine, the formula features Houttuynia Cordada, Centella Asiatica, licorice root, and lavender with soothing and anti-inflammatory effects. These ingredients work together to reduce puffiness. Hydration and nourishment are critical components of any eye care product, and this serum excels in these areas, featuring several moisturizing ingredients such as ceramides and shea butter. In summary, this eye product combines hydration, nourishment, and a targeted action.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dr. Althea To Be Eyeconic Eye Serum 25ml (0.84 fl oz) to the eye contour with your fingertips, using circular motions.

description:
This promotional pack contains the following products:

1x Neoretin Discrom Control Ultra Emulsion Pigment Corrector 30ml
1x Neoretin Discrom Control K-Eye Contour Pigment Corrector 15ml

Neoretin Discrom Control Ultra Emulsion Pigment Corrector is an intensive depigmenting treatment that acts on different mechanisms of dark spots formation. With a unique formula, it is able to stimulate cell renewal and protect the skin from external aggressors while reducing dark spots. The EDAFENCE® provides antioxidant and protective benefits shielding the skin from pollution and oxidative stress. The RetinSphere® Technology stimulates cell renewal and stimulates collagen production providing antiaging benefits for a radiant and smoother appearance. And the Whitening Booster System acts on all stages of melanin formation helping reduce the size and intensity of the dark spots. All in all, this ultra emulsion helps reduce dark spots and unify the skin tone lending the complexion an even and radiant look.
Neoretin Discrom Control K-Eye Contour Pigment Corrector is a depigmenting treatment specifically formulated for the eye area. This eye cream stars Tranexamic acid and Vitamin K oxide to act on all types of dark circles, whether genetic, pigmented, or vascular ones. This is because Tranexamic acid is a depigmenting ingredient that not only helps reduce melanin production but also acts on vascularization of the skin, whereas Vitamin K oxide helps decongest and reduce blood pigments. In this way, this cream will reduce the under-eye darkness. Additionally, Retinsphere Technology® in the formula helps unify the skin tone and reduce the appearance of wrinkles at the same time. Equally important, Edafence® provides protection against blue light and pollution, which can aggravate hyperpigmentation. This eye cream has a refreshing texture and is suitable even for higher prototypes. All in all, this powerful formula helps reduce and prevent pigmentation in the eye area in order to achieve a brighter and more even look.

description:
NUXE Crème Fraîche Eye Flash Reviving Moisturizing Eye Cream 15ml (0.51 oz) is a luxurious treat for the delicate skin around your eyes. With its organic formula, this "flash" effect eye treatment is designed to cater to all skin types and provides an immediate awakening effect for the eyes. With this in mind, it is infused with plant-based caffeine and buckwheat extract to deliver superb hydration that revitalizes tired eyes. Imagine the feeling of having had a full night's sleep, and that's precisely how your eyes will look – 95% of women agree! Indeed, you'll notice your dark circles, bags, and even fine lines look diminished. Day in and day out, as you continue to use this moisturizing eye cream, the signs of weariness will fade, leaving your eye area brighter and more youthful looking.
The texture is another highlight. Light and non-greasy, it quickly seeps into the skin, offering an immediate sensation of freshness. Furthermore, it is fragrance-free to respect the delicacy of this area. As a last note, this product boasts a vegan formula with 99% ingredients of natural origin. All in all, this eye cream not only moisturizes the eye contour but also works tirelessly to visibly reduce tiredness signs, giving your eyes a refreshed appearance.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of NUXE Crème Fraîche Eye Flash Reviving Moisturizing Eye Cream 15ml (0.51 oz) to the eye area with small touches and circular movements.

description:
APIVITA Beevine Elixir Wrinkle Lift Eye & Lip Cream 15ml (0.51floz) is an anti-aging solution specifically designed for the fragile area around the eyes and lips. To begin with, the formula features the revolutionary patented Propolift complex, coupled with plant-based collagen. The combination of these two ingredients helps restore collagen, consequently reducing the appearance of wrinkles and providing visibly firmer skin and lifted eyelids. At the same time, this formula includes marine biotech actives and goji berries to tackle both dark circles and puffiness around the eyes. With a luxurious texture, this potent cream not only brings a deep sense of nourishment but also delivers comfort to the delicate zones around the eyes and lips.
As a last note, this product presents responsible packaging that is 100% recyclable and contains a high percentage of recycled materials. In conclusion, this product addresses multiple challenges faced by the skin around the eyes and lips. Whether it's wrinkles, dark circles, puffiness, or the quest for hydration and brightness, this cream helps with all these concerns.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a small amount of APIVITA Beevine Elixir Wrinkle Lift Eye & Lip Cream 15ml (0.51floz) to the eye contour and around the lip area.

description:
MEDIHEAL E.G.T Timetox Gel Smile-Line Patch 2pc are gel-based patches designed to target and diminish the appearance of smile lines and wrinkles on the nasolabial folds. Infused with ingredients such as hydrolyzed collagen and adenosine, these patches help to improve skin elasticity and moisture. So, the result is a reduction in the appearance of smile lines and wrinkles around the mouth, leaving the skin looking more elastic, firmer, and more hydrated. Moreover, this product features the patented thermo-sensitive TCD technology. This feature means the patches respond to the skin temperature, ensuring they melt slowly upon contact with the skin's natural warmth. This allows for the even absorption of the ingredients into the skin, maximizing the effects of the product.
The patches are designed for ease of use and are easily incorporated into any skincare routine. They offer a convenient solution to address signs of aging, particularly around the mouth where smile lines are most prominent. However, they are also suitable for around the eyes or forehead where wrinkles are a concern, making them versatile. In summary, these patches offer a solution for those looking to minimize the appearance of smile lines and wrinkles, thanks to enhanced elasticity and hydration of the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply MEDIHEAL E.G.T Timetox Gel Smile-Line Patch 2pc to clean, dry skin. Remove the film and place the patch next to the corner of the mouth (in the nasolabial fold), with the concave part facing the tip of your nose. Repeat the process for the other patch. Then, remove the patches after 20 to 40 minutes. Finally, gently tap the remaining product until full absorption. The patches can also be used around the eyes or forehead where wrinkles are a concern.

description:
COSRX Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream 25ml is a non-heavy eye cream designed to care for the delicate eye area. Formulated with 73.6% Snail Secretion Filtrate, this eye cream is a hydration powerhouse. Snail Secretion Filtrate is renowned for its ability to moisturize, protect, and rejuvenate. As a result, this ingredient works to improve uneven skin tone, brighten the eye area, and improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. This action is complemented by niacinamide and a 5-peptide complex. At the same time, this eye cream fights puffiness and dark circles, leaving your eye area looking refreshed.
With a silky smooth texture and fast-absorbing formula, this eye cream is suitable for anyone, even for those with sensitive skin. All in all, this eye cream offers several benefits, leading to firmer, brighter, and more youthful-looking eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply COSRX Advanced Snail Peptide Eye Cream 25ml around the eye area in circular motions.

description: BeautyLab Instant Renewal Eye Complex 15ml is an anti-aging eye cream that restores vitality and moisture to the skin. Thus, it is ideal for puffy skin with fine lines, wrinkles and dark circles. In fact, thanks to advanced peptides, you can say goodbye to undereye bags, puffiness, dark circles and fine lines. They fill the skin with suppleness and restore its elasticity. On top of that, Hyaluronic Acid locks in the moisture while hydrating and improving collagen levels which contribute to smoothness and ideal levels of firmness. On another note, Papaya has antioxidants that protect the skin from external aggressors. In the end, the skin is even and definitely brighter!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply BeautyLab Instant Renewal Eye Complex 15ml in the morning and evening to previously cleansed and toned skin. Firstly, take a tiny amount and apply it around the eyes in small patting motions using your ring finger. Avoid direct eye contact.

description:
Payot Roselift Eye Lifting Patch x10 is the ultimate addition to your routine for rejuvenating and revitalizing the delicate skin around your eyes. Designed to fight visible fatigue signs, these innovative patches offer, indeed, a luxurious and effective treatment that will leave your eyes looking youthful, refreshed, and revitalized. For that purpose, these patches are infused with a powerful blend of active ingredients, including the patented Roseactive and a Pro-collagen peptide. The ingredients in the formula work in synergy to visibly lift, firm, and smooth the skin on the eye contour. In addition, they instantly help to decongest and refresh the eye area so you'll experience a noticeable reduction in puffiness and dark circles, consequently revealing a brighter complexion.
Furthermore, these patches offer an indulgent spa-like experience from the comfort of your own home. Whether you're getting ready for a special occasion or simply treating yourself to a self-care session, these patches are surely the perfect addition to your skincare routine. As a last note, they have a vegan formula with 99% ingredients of natural origin, and are fragrance-free, respecting even the most sensitive eyes.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Payot Roselift Eye Lifting Patch x10 to clean dry skin on the undereye area. Leave them on for 15 minutes. Then, remove and gently pat the remaining product onto the skin.

description:
Eve Lom Time Retreat Eye Treatment 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a fast-absorbing eye cream that revitalizes the appearance of the undereye area. This soft cream contains a blend of ingredients that target fine lines, firm the skin, make it softer and plumper, and brighten the skin tone. In fact, retinol, a tried and true anti-aging ingredient, is present in the formula to reduce wrinkles and fine lines, delivering all of its benefits in a gentle but effective way. By being encapsulated in liposomes, retinol is able to penetrate deeper into the skin, increasing its effectiveness. This also decreases the time it stays on the surface of the skin, therefore being less irritating. This is especially important for the delicate undereye area. 
 Soy isoflavones also help to firm the skin, and vitamins C and E protect from oxidative stress and help to brighten the skin tone. Finally, this cream leaves the skin smooth, nourished, and hydrated up to 24 hours after application, due to the addition of sodium hyaluronate and squalane. It is suited for all skin types, especially for mature skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply a pea-sized amount of Eve Lom Time Retreat Eye Treatment 15ml (0.5 fl oz) onto dry skin of the eye contour, after the cleansing ritual. Gently tap the skin using your ring fingers until the product is fully absorbed. Apply sunscreen before and during sun exposure.

description:
essence Hydro Gel Eye Patches x30 Pairs revitalize and refresh your delicate eye area in minutes! Indeed, these luxurious patches give your eyes a well-deserved boost of hydration. For that purpose, these patches are infused with the hydration power of Hyaluronic acid. As a result, they provide intense hydration for 24 hours and help plump up the skin. Furthermore, the innovative hydrogel technology makes these patches even more incredible. That said, they are made of a unique gel-like material that adheres comfortably to the contours of your under-eye area, allowing the formula to penetrate deeply and effectively. At the same time, it provides a cooling sensation that feels refreshing and relaxing.
Indeed, using these eye patches is a luxurious and pampering experience. Simply apply the patches to clean, dry skin and leave them on for 15 minutes. During this time, you can sit back, relax, and let the patches work their magic. In the end, your eyes will radiate with vitality and health. In conclusion, just elevate your skincare routine and give your eyes the attention they deserve with these patches. Suitable for all skin types, this product is your go-to solution for instantly recovering moisture in the under-eye area.
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Hyaluronic acid is a renowned ingredient for its hydrating power. It has the ability to retain water and, therefore, intensely hydrate and plump the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Using the spatula provided, take one pair of essence Hydro Gel Eye Patches x30 Pairs and place it onto the clean, dry skin of the under-eye area. Then, leave them on for 15 minutes. After that time, take off the patches and discard them. Gently massage the remaining product into the skin.

description:
Ondo Beauty 36.5 Caffeine & Green Tea Antioxidant Eye Patches 3g x2 (2x0.10 oz) are designed to hydrate, refresh, and illuminate the eye contour area, reducing puffiness and pigmentation. Additionally, they boast anti-aging properties, working to prevent and treat the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. So, a key ingredient in these eye patches is 5% South China Green Tea Extract. This extract is rich in antioxidants, which are crucial in protecting the skin from aging signs caused by free radicals. To ensure the skin remains hydrated and plump, the formula includes 14% glycerin. Glycerin is well-known for its moisturizing properties, helping to seal in hydration and keep the skin looking dewy and refreshed. Niacinamide is another important component, which delivers soothing properties and helps fight pigmented eye circles.
The formula is further enhanced with 1% caffeine and coffee extract. Caffeine helps improve blood microcirculation, reducing swelling and puffiness. And a fun fact - you can see little spots of coffee in the patches! To complete the formulation, the eye patches include a blend of hydrating, soothing, and calming ingredients, such as ginger extract, vitamin E, hyaluronic acid, and allantoin. Overall, these eye patches offer a multi-faceted approach to eye care. They combine revitalizing and anti-aging benefits in a convenient, easy-to-use format, making them ideal for anyone looking to give their eye area a boost of energy, like a morning coffee for the eyes!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Ondo Beauty 36.5 Caffeine & Green Tea Antioxidant Eye Patches 3g x2 (2x0.10 oz) to the eye contour area. Then, leave them on for about 20 to 30 minutes and relax. Finally, remove the patches and gently massage the remaining product onto the brow bone and upper eyelid. For an extra refreshing experience, store in the fridge before application.

description:
Lierac Hydragenist The Rehydrating Eye Care 15ml (0.50 fl oz) has a unique formula to provide intense hydration and luminosity specifically for the eye area. With 96% ingredients of natural origin, the formula has a double action thus providing immediate and lasting hydration. First and foremost, it stars an Extremophile Ferment, an exclusive ingredient with great hydrating capacity that sets this range apart. This is thanks to this ingredient's ability to reactivate the natural mechanisms of skin hydration. Firstly, it helps to capture water by activating NMFs which are natural moisturizing factors of the skin. Secondly, it boosts water circulation by activating the expression of aquaporins, channels in the skin that transport water. Lastly, it activates the synthesis of lipids and, consequently, improves the skin barrier function, therefore, limiting water evaporation. In this way, we get a 360º hydrating action!
In addition, the formula features Hyaluronic acid that immediately hydrates and plumps the skin, therefore smoothing fine lines. At the same time, the formula includes Caffeine for a decongesting action. To conclude, with a lightweight and refreshing texture, this eye cream provides hydration and comfort to the eye area, leaving the skin luminous and smooth.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Lierac Hydragenist The Rehydrating Eye Care 15ml (0.50 fl oz) both morning and evening, to the eye countour.

description:
Payot Source Adaptogen Moisturizing Eye Stick 4.5g (0.14 oz) is a moisturizing product specifically formulated for the eye area. With a biomimetic skincare formula, this eye stick features a powerful combination of Hyaluronic acid and two adaptogen plants to provide the skin with intense moisture. Composed of a Breton Algae and Reishi Mushroom, this formula resorts to the power of these plants to resist and adapt to environmental changes. In this way, this product recharges the skin on the eye contour with moisture and helps it fight daily environmental stress. As a matter of fact, it delivers lasting hydration for 48 hours. At the same time, it strengthens the skin's ability to adapt to a constantly changing environment. In addition, the formula features organic Cornflower floral water that soothes the skin. Equally amazing, the stick texture delivers a refreshing effect.
All in all, this eye stick not only hydrates the skin but also decongests the eye area in a single step. That said, it also helps reduce dark circles and puffiness. In conclusion, with 99% ingredients of natural origin, this incredible product rehydrates the eye area and reduces signs of fatigue, for a refreshed look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Payot Source Adaptogen Moisturizing Eye Stick 4.5g (0.14 oz) to the eye contour in the morning and/or evening routine by gliding the stick.

description:
Payot My Payot Tinted Anti-Fatigue Eye Stick 4.5g (0.14 oz) is a multipurpose eye treatment that efficiently targets and reduces signs of fatigue in the delicate eye area. Infused with 99% ingredients of natural origin, this 3-in-1 stick promises to deliver a refreshed and awakened look with one single application. On one hand, this eye stick has a decongestive effect that visibly addresses both dark circles and puffiness. At the same time, this vitamin-packed formula also offers protection from daily aggressions in order to increase levels of radiance. Last but definitely not least, this eye care contains natural pigments. These components are able to not only unify the complexion but also conceal signs of fatigue through a universal shade.
Finally, this product comes in a convenient stick format and has a pleasant melt-in consistency. In fact, its texture glides and blends easily on the skin, for an ultra-fresh finish every time. All in all, this product is the perfect care to awaken your eyes for a well-rested look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Payot My Payot Tinted Anti-Fatigue Eye Stick 4.5g (0.14 oz) on the eye area, in the morning routine.

description:
SKINFOOD Gold Caviar Lifting Eye Serum 32ml (1.08 fl oz) is a serum designed for the eye contour area. It nourishes the delicate skin around the eyes, increases its elasticity and firmness, and reduces the visibility of wrinkles and fine lines. 
 This product combines highly concentrated caviar extract and gold to deliver nourishment and anti-aging benefits to the skin. So, the caviar extract used in this serum is obtained through a process that uses low temperatures, preserving more of the caviar's beneficial ingredients and their properties. This extract is rich in omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids, which help to effectively nourish and moisturize the skin, as well as maintain a healthy skin barrier. Caviar also helps to increase the firmness and elasticity of the skin and to reduce wrinkles and fine lines around the eyes. Even more, adenosine helps to increase collagen production, also providing anti-aging benefits. Last but not least, gold present in the formula also helps to prevent free radical damage and signs of aging. In summary, this eye serum nourishes and rejuvenates the skin of the eye contour. It is suitable for all skin types.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply SKINFOOD Gold Caviar Lifting Eye Serum 32ml (1.08 fl oz) onto previously cleansed skin of the eye contour, after toning. Gently pat the skin, using your ring fingers, until the product completely absorbs.

description:
This gift set contains the following products:

Darphin Stimulskin Plus Absolute Renewal Serum 5ml
Darphin Stimulskin Plus Absolute Renewal Eye & Lip Contour Cream 15ml
Darphin Stimulskin Plus Absolute Renewal Cream 15ml

Darphin Stimulskin Plus Absolute Renewal Serum rearranges the facial structure, giving it a push-up effect and plumping areas that have suffered over time. Thus, this invigorating formula slows down the aging process, reducing signs of damage, whether genetic or circumstantial. By redesigning key sections, it ends up performing potent liposuctions resorting to the wonders of Sea Emerald. This core botanical ingredient ensures optimal face contouring, erasing signs of fatigue while also delivering a sensory experience. Besides, Commiphora Mukul joins forces with the Deep-Infusion Oil Technology to support the stimulation of cells in the right direction.
Darphin Stimulskin Plus Absolute Renewal Eye & Lip Contour Cream is a renewing cream that firms, lifts and smoothes the skin around the lips and eyes. The texture feels incredibly luxurious on the skin, leaving the skin feeling just as smooth as velvet after each use. It provides the skin with immediate comfort and allows an amazing application experience with the massaging tool. Technology and nature work hand in hand to deliver the best rejuvenating results. The formula contains 88% of natural ingredients that perfectly combine with technology. To point out the Volu-structure complex, which combines the power of peptides and date fruit extract to lift and plump the skin. At the same time, sea emerald algae extract replenishes the complexion with a high level of nutrients and minerals while Deep-Infusion oil technology manages to find a more direct path for the wholesome botanical components to find their way to deeper layers of the skin. Day after day, this concentrate works to minimize the appearance of lines and wrinkles, promoting plumper and firmer skin.
Darphin Stimulskin Plus Absolute Renewal Cream specializes in offering hydration for normal to combination skin types. Besides, it preserves the key trifecta of sculpting, soothing, and pushing up less firm complexions. Moreover, its 95% natural ingredients allow you to explore the power of Algae extracts and other nourishing botanical elements to rearrange facial structure. Thanks to the core Sea Emerald as well as a Youth-Boosting Trio Complex, it's easier to look extra jovial. To the same extent, a lightweight texture enables optimal penetration from the components mentioned, so you'll notice quick results. In fact, this moisturizer complements/intensifies the outcomes associated with the daily application of serums, leading your skin to long-lasting luminosity.
ingredients: Not found
how_to_use: Not found

description:
Sesderma Daeses Eye and Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) is indicated for loss of firmness on delicate areas like the skin around the eyes and the lips. Thanks to the unique composition, this cream is able to have an instant and long-lasting effect on skin firmness, especially in what concerns drooping eyelids and lip loss of volume. Furthermore, ideal for all skin types, but particularly mature skins, this cream deeply hydrates the skin and helps to boost firmness thanks to the ingredient known as DMAE, which has an incredible action on muscle tone and firmness. More specifically, this natural ingredient helps to boost the synthesis of acetylcholine, responsible for muscle contraction, and therefore boosting firmness. In turn, this results in an immediate lifting effect and recovery of the muscle tone over time.
On the other hand, the presence of Hydrolized Wheat Proteins have an immediate lifting effect and help to hydrate and reduce wrinkles. Finally, Hyaluronic Acid deeply hydrates the skin and helps to reduce the appearance of signs of aging on the skin. In summary, this cream becomes the perfect ally for mature skin, specifically for the contour of the eyes and lips with loss of firmness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sesderma Daeses Eye and Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.51fl oz) in the morning and evening with soft touches from the inside to the outside of the eye contour and around the lips. You can also apply directly on the lips to boost volume.

description:
Sisley Paris Sisleÿa Eye and Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) is a high-end anti-aging cream designed to act on the eye and lip areas. This cream targets three dimensions of aging: genetic, environmental and behavioral. The behavioral factors are the ones that impact the most and such vulnerable parts of the face do not escape. Due to the Yeast and Soy Protein Complex, this cream visibly reduces wrinkles and fine lines, while energizing the eye contour. Additionally, the Soy Peptide Extract restores firmness levels to the upper eyelids, opening up the eye area, and smoothes the vertical lines about the lips. At the same time, a combination of plant-based ingredients is working on lightening the coloration of dark circles and reducing under-eye puffiness. These results are immediate, but also long-term. Hence the skin around the eyes and lips appears smooth, firm and bright.
The Sisley Paris Sisleÿa Eye and Lip Contour Cream has been dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested and is suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
This cream comes with a massage tool that is ideal to prepare the skin prior to the application of the cream. With its cool-tip and with adequate movements it boosts microcirculation and smoothes the skin by attenuating puffiness and wrinkles.
Thanks to its light and creamy texture, it applies easily and provides moments of comfort, leaving the skin soft. In the end, it creates a special well-being moment in the skincare routine for both the skin and the mind. Expect rested and well-preserved skin!
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Sisley Paris Sisleÿa Eye and Lip Contour Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) in the morning and evening along the eye contour area, eyelids and the contours of the lips. Firstly, before applying the cream, prepare the area with the massage tool. Start by smoothing the areas above the eyebrow, over the eyelid and below the eye, moving from the inner eye outwards. Then, smooth around the lip area, beginning at the center and moving toward the outer edges. Secondly, apply light pressure on the eyelid and below the eye. Thirdly, use the tool in a zigzag pattern between the eyebrows and the under-eye area. Fourthly, do a back-and-forth movement on the eyebrows, along the outer corners of the eye and above the lip. Finally, apply the cream.

description: Dermalogica Awaken Peptide Depuffing Eye Gel 15ml (0.5 fl oz)  is an eye cream that addresses wrinkles and puffiness. In this way, this eye gel contains Caffeine combined with Tetrapeptides and Rosemary leaf extract to reduce puffiness and fine lines. Then, Succinic acid also contributes to minimize fine lines and wrinkles while Voandzeia subterranea seed extract leaves skin smoother and more luminous. lastly, Jojoba esters hydrate and strenghten the skin. Overall, this eye gel acts in minutes to firm, hydrate and de-puff your eyes for an energized and luminous look.
how_to_use:
How to use
Apply Dermalogica Awaken Peptide Depuffing Eye Gel 15ml (0.5 fl oz) on the eye contour area, with gentle touches using your ring finer. Massage in light motions until complete absorption. It should be applied before the moisturizer.

description:
StriVectin Advanced Retinol Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) gently nourishes and hydrates the skin around the eyes, boosting its glow and elasticity.
As we age, the skin slows the production of Hyaluronic Acid and Retinol, resulting in a dull and less firm complexion. The lack of elasticity also leads to the appearance of aging signs, like wrinkles or fine lines. Queue StriVectin's Eye Cream, which replenishes the skin's levels of moisture while also providing a rich yet gentle blend of Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid, and their patented NIA-114™. The eye contour will feel revitalized, free of dark circles and heavy bags. Meanwhile, the skin will also look visibly younger, firmer, and more elastic, as aging signs have been softened and reduced.
Bring your eye contour back to its youthful and glowing state with a light eye cream full of superstar ingredients. And, although powerful and highly effective, you can rest assured that this formula will protect your skin with the maximum care and gentleness.
how_to_use:
How to use
Gently apply a few drops of StriVectin Advanced Retinol Eye Cream 15ml (0.5 fl oz) on the eye contour area. Then, tap it with your fingers until the skin fully absorbs it.
